Why toss paper into a bin when you can toss a goldfish into a toilet bowl? Goldfish Toss is a simple but very addicting game. Use your finger to flick the goldfish into the toilet bowl, but pay close attention to the wind speed and direction or your goldfish will go splat.
release_text: - Game is now FREE! - Added ads.

description: Do you like hamburgers? I am sure you do. Then, for sure you will enjoy playing American Checkers! No matter if you are bored of Chess or regular Checkers. It's time for you to try the American version of this classic board game, which Checkers without a doubt are. In this version you can play against "a quite clever CPU" or your real-life friend - on one device! The big advantage of "American Checkers" is calm but colorful graphics, which will not disturb you while playing the game. The rules are quite simple: - the regular pieces can move one square forward diagonally - you can beat the opponent's piece by jumping over his or her pieces - if there are multiple jumps available, you have to make all available steps in this sequence - the regular piece becomes a king (is kinged) if you move him into the last row of your opponent's side - the king can move forward and backward by one square diagonally and beat only these pieces, which are adjacent diagonally - JUMPS are MANDATORY! - but you can choose the sequence Below more detailed description: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_draughts
release_text: 1.1 - HELP screen added (under OPTIONS screen). 1.2 - Framework updated to Cocos2dx 2.2.4 version. 1.3 - Google's library updated!

description: Territory Wars FREE is a free multiplayer turn-based game where strategy, tactics and risk are essential elements. HIGHLIGHTS * Play against your friends or play against random opponents from all around the world! * Crush your opponents with various tactics and strategies for growth, attack and defence! * Play with different game modes for a multitude of different game experiences! BE THE STRATEGIST Adapt your strategy for the various challenges while playing against one, two or three real human opponents. Different modes will require different tactics. You start with one green tile. Use the troops on this tile to attack its neighbor tiles. Attack success is randomly calculated, but the chance increases with numbers. Maybe your strategy is to rush and crush your opponents? Move and attack as much as you like each turn, only limited by the number of troops you have at your disposal. Optimize your strategy while it is your opponent's turn. Conquer all opponent tiles to win, or just their Capitals in Capital mode. MULTIPLE GAME MODES Alter the game play with game modes like Fog of War, Capital mode and Boosted tiles. Different modes will require different tactics. Creating new games with these modes require the premium version, but everyone can join existing games or be invited to games with these features. PLAY AT YOUR OWN PACE You're allowed 72 hours between each turn, so this is a casual game you can play for a short while at a time. SHOW YOUR SUPPORT We want to make Territory Wars the best strategy game on Android, so please show your support by giving us a rating. Territory Wars FREE contains ads. KNOW MORE To get more info about the mechanics of the game, strategy for rapid growth, and other advice; check out our blog on http://glaciallabs.com/blog Follow us on Facebook and Twitter and stay in touch to get all the latest information: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Glacial-Labs/208370112677388 https://twitter.com/GlacialLabs https://plus.google.com/+GlaciallabsTeam/
release_text: Fixed bug that disabled notifications of "Your turn"

description: Ein Deutsch-Polnisch und Polnisch-Deutsches Wörterbuch auf 31.500+ Wörter. Dieses einfache, sehr handliche Taschenwörterbuch wird zu Ihrem guten Helfer sowohl während einer Reise als auch bei Studium und bei der Arbeit. Ein Deutsch Polnisch Wörterbuch. Ein Polnisch Deutsches Wörterbuch. Unter Eigenarten unserer Anwendung kann man folgende erwähnen: - mit Hilfe von nur einem Knopf „Umschalten“ können Sie zwischen den Deutsch-Polnisch und Polnisch-Deutschen Wörterbüchern umschalten. - 31.500+ Wörter, die im ständigen Gebrauch sind! - das Wörterbuch ist für Touristen, Übersetzer, Schüler, Studenten, Fachleute und wissenschaftliche Arbeiter geeignet. - Das alles braucht keinen Internet-Zugang! Sie werden leicht das Benutzen des Wörterbuches erlernen und die Sprache wird zu keiner Störung in Ihrem Leben. A German-Polish and Polish-German dictionary on 31,500 + words. This simple and very handy pocket dictionary will be your good helper both during travel and in study and at work. A German Polish dictionary. A Polish German dictionary. Under peculiarities of our application can mention the following: - With the help of just one button "switch" you can switch between the German-Polish and Polish-German dictionaries. - 31,500 + words that are in constant use! - The dictionary is suitable for tourists, translators, students, professionals, and scientific workers. - This all takes no internet access! You will easily learn how to use the dictionary and the language will not interfere in your life.

We're glad to present you unique "English Language Test", intended to check your English language knowledge! Do you speak English? Do you understand English? Can you read in English? You can, but you aren't confident you do it well? In this case ESL Tests is right what you need! The features of our application: - Free 30 tests -The test consists of 3 levels: "Begginers", "Intermediate", "Advanced" - The best professionals in ESL-English as a Second Language training paricipated in development of this application - More than 500+ tests will help you improve your English language knowledge by means of regular lessons! - The questions were developed to test various aspects of language knowledge: grammar, vocabulary and language understanding! When you see your "English Language Test" results your confidence will achieve the next level!

Вы любите путешествовать? Вы хотите побывать в одной из старейших в мире цивилизаций-Китае? А при путешествии легко понимать китайцев и общаться с ними? Для этого Вам необходимо наше приложение "Китайский? ОК!" Это уникальная программа для свободного общения на китайском языке, аналогов которой Вы не найдете! В программу входят уроки, тесты, разговорник, словарь китайско-русский и русско-китайский, грамматика, полезная информация а так-же карта с лучшими достопримечательностями Китая и и все это не требует подключения к сети Интернет! Особенности нашего приложения: программа создана для русскоговорящих пользователей обучение 1500 слов происходит через флэш карты и разделены на разделы. Это позволит быстро и легко освоить китайский язык. - тестирование осуществляется как по разделам, так и по общей базе слов. - удобный разговорник для туристов с основными фразами необходимыми при путешествии по Китаю - словарь на 105.000 слов! Китайско-русский и русско-китайский, легок в применении - правила чтения для туристов(грамматика) - полезная информация для туристов ( транспорт, банки, особенности национальной кухни, обычаи, религия, таможня, города и провинции и много другое) - карта Китая с достопримечательностями. G4S Global Warning System provide you with early warnings, alerts and reliable real-time safety information wherever you are in the world. With state-of-the-art communication and localization technology you will get personal safety information before anyone else sent directly to you. Imminent threats such as: tsunamis, earthquakes, terrorist attacks, civil unrest, approaching storms, epidemics, major traffic disruptions are followed and analysed 24/7 by experts in Sweden Features: - Real-time alerts warnings, security information and expert advice sent directly to you when a threat emerges in your current region - SOS Emergency numbers for current location - Country specific security and transportation information The G4S Global Warning System require a subscription from G4S. Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. G4S Global Warning System provide you with early warnings, alerts and reliable real-time safety information wherever you are in the world.

The myChevrolet App gives you all the practical and functional features a car owner would ever want at the touch of a button. App features are available to owners of 1990 through current model year vehicles. The Find My Car feature lets you mark parking spots on a map so you’ll never have trouble finding your car. Easily schedule service, locate a dealer or get roadside assistance when you need it, fast. The Lights and Indicators reference will tell you what that warning light on your dashboard means. You can access OnStar RemoteLink(1) to get info on car operations, battery levels and remotely lock/unlocks doors. Plus, your Owner Manual and current national service offers can all be in the palm of your hand. The myChevrolet App. A perfect, everyday companion for you and your Chevrolet. US Owners By downloading, installing or using this application, you agree to the privacy statement, which may be updated from time to time. Please visit http://www.chevrolet.com/mychevroletappprivacystatement.html to view the privacy statement in its entirety. You must be a current subscriber to the OnStar service in order to use this functionality of the application. Canada Owners By downloading, installing or using this application, you agree to the privacy statement, which may be updated from time to time (visit http://gmmobileapps.gm.com.edgesuite.net/myChevrolet/en_ca/privacy.html to view the privacy statement in its entirety) , the end user license agreement (visit http://gmmobileapps.gm.com.edgesuite.net/myChevrolet/en_ca/eula.html ) and the Software Installation and Update Consent http://gmmobileapps.gm.com.edgesuite.net/myChevrolet/en_ca/software_consent.html . For more information regarding the RemoteLink mobile application and its collection practices, please visit https://www.onstar.com/web/portal/privacy?g=1 . IMPORTANT DISCLOSURE By clicking “install”, you consent to the installation of the app, and you also consent to us remotely delivering future updates or upgrades to the app to your smartphone, tablet or other internet-connected device without any further notice or consent. If we provide further notice or request further consent to an update or upgrade, the notice or consent may be received by or provided to you or any authorized user of your device, and you agree that such notice or consent is sufficient for you and all authorized users of your device. You acknowledge and understand that the app (and any updates or changes) may (i) affect or erase data or settings that you have stored in your device; (ii) collect personal information (as described in the privacy statement or as separately disclosed at the time of installation); or (iii) cause a system to communicate with our servers automatically to collect information from or about your device, identify if updates or upgrades are available and/or to deliver updates or upgrades. description: OnStar RemoteLink keeps you connected to your vehicle so you can remotely control your vehicle features all from your Android mobile device. Brand-new features plus a new user interface mean you can do amazing things because you drive a vehicle connected by OnStar: Send remote commands to the vehicle - Remote start/stop vehicle - Remote lock/unlock car doors - Remote horn & lights/cancel horn & lights View vehicle status - Monitor fuel level and economy - Check oil life and tire pressure (if equipped) - Retrieve electric vehicle-specific data (battery charging status & options) Map and plan trips - Pinpoint vehicle location - Search for destinations - Send directions to vehicle through OnStar Turn-by-Turn Navigation or in-dash navigation system (if equipped) Manage the OnStar Wi-Fi® hotspot (if equipped) - Turn hotspot ON/OFF and view or change hotspot name and password - View the status of the vehicle’s data package View important information about your OnStar account including: - OnStar account details - Available Hands-Free Calling minutes - Preferred dealer information Contact Support - OnStar Advisor - Roadside Assistance An active OnStar account is required to use RemoteLink. Some features require paid service plan. Features may vary by vehicle. For a list of supported vehicles, please visit onstar.com/remotelink. Privacy Statement: https://www.onstar.com/privacy
release_text: - Purchase links for Wi-Fi Data & Hands-Free Calling Minutes - Addition of Create Account & Need Help links (Canadian accounts) - Collection of app usage data (as outlined in the OnStar RemoteLink Privacy Statement) Bug fixes addressing: - OnStar Destination Download routing issues

This is an assignment book for students. Many students already carry their devices around school. This will save them the trouble of also having to carry an assignment book. This app lets the student enter their classes and assignments they receive in each class. The student can set the due date for each assignment, the priority, and set up reoccuring assignments.

Compete anywhere, anytime using your phone! ♥ Verified members gain 888 daily chips! = Newest Android Version = ♣ Updated table design ♣ New cool titles wait for you to be earned! = Rules = ♦ The player with the 3 of clubs begins by playing this card or any valid combination containing it. Then players go clockwise playing their combinations on top of the current one. If they don't have a valid combination they must pass. If all three other players pass you can either play another combination on top of the current one or start a new one. Whoever loses their hand first wins! ♦ Valid combinations are: (single, pair, Straight, Full House) < Four of a Kind < Straight Flush < Dragon. ♦ The last three combinations (Four of a Kind, Straight Flush, Dragon) are called Monsters because they can override smaller combinations of any type, whereas non-Monster combinations can only override smaller combinations of the same type. ♦ Once you choose to pass you can't play the current combination anymore and have to wait until a new one is started (this complies with the official Big Two regulations). = Additional Notes = ♦ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/bigtwoapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa - Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? app_name: 鬥地主 神來也斗地主
description: The No.1 Landlord Online - Everyone's Favorite Landlord Game ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players ♠ Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play free: Get as much as 1500 chips to start out with = Features = ♥ Authentic Landlord gameplay ♥ Over 20 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Bigger and clearer graphics ♥ Loads of achievements and prizes ♥ Never go bankrupt: always get more chips so you can continue to play! = What’s New = ♥ Landlord tournaments (Realtor, Tycoon, Magnate) ♥ Various new modes give you an awesome gaming experience = Rules = ♣ Classic gameplay: 1. Landlord is played with 3 players and one 52-card deck plus 2 jokers. 2. All but 3 cards are distributed among the 3 players. For the remaining 3 cards an auction is held to determine which player will be the landlord. 3. The possible bids during the auction are 1, 2 and 3. Players may bid higher than the current bid or pass. Whoever bids highest becomes the landlord, takes the 3 remaining cards, and will play alone against the other two. 4. If all 3 players pass, the cards will be reshuffled and the game restarted. 5. The landlord takes the 3 remaining cards and will play alone against the other two. The landlord plays first. 6. Players play anticlockwise. Each player must try to beat the currently played cards or select to pass. 7. Any player can choose to pass any time, but he must pass if he can't beat the previous play. 8. Whichever side (landlord or one of the two remaining players) runs out of cards first wins! ♣ “Rob the Landlord”: 1. After one player has called to be landlord, each other player has a one-time chance to rob the title from him. 2. If a player chooses to rob the title, that player will be landlord for that game. If no player chooses to rob the title, the landlord will stay the same. 3. Once chosen, players are not allowed to change their selection whether to rob the title or not. For full game rules please visit： http://www.godgame.com.tw/landlord/?op=teach = Additional Notes = ♦ You can use your existing GodGame, Facebook, or Yahoo account to play immediately ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for details: http://www.gamesofa.com/sevensapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa - Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time!

app_name: 十三支 神來也13支(Chinese Poker)
description: Everyone’s Favorite Chinese Poker! ♠ Over 23 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ New Card Exchange function lets you draw up to 3 new cards ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players = Features = ♥ Authentic Chinese Poker, also known as Pusoy or 13Poker ♥ Over 23 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ “Scoop” opponents for increased wins ♥ Smarter gameplay ensures you’ll be the best of them all ♥ Bonus card hands to make things interesting ♥ Loads of gifts, daily bonuses ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Easy-to-use controls you can use with just one finger ♥ Use Interactives (emoticons) to talk to friends ♥ Daily tournaments now available! Compete anywhere, anytime using your phone ♥ Verified members gain 888 daily chips = Newest Android Version = ♣ Completely new table design = Gameplay = ♦ Basic Rules 　．Each of the 4 players receives a 13-card hand from a standard 52-card deck.. 　．The players then divide their cards into three poker hands: two containing 5 cards each and one containing 3 cards. Each of these three hands is compared among the players. 　．One of the 5-card hands has to be the highest ranking hand and the 3-card hand the lowest ranking hand. 　．Should two hands have the same point value, the higher-suited hand wins. 　．Bonus card hands are higher than regular ones. ♦ Card Exchange Before a round begins, players have 15 seconds to exchange 0-3 cards from their hands with the other players. If time's up before you press "Confirm", the currently selected 3 cards will be exchanged. ♦ Hands from highest to lowest: Straight Flush > Four of a Kind > Full House > Flush > Straight > Triples > Two Pair > One Pair > Single ♦ Bonus Card Hands from highest to lowest: Dragon Flush > Dragon > Broadway Cards > Three Straight Flushes > Three Four of a Kinds > All High > All Low > One Color (black or red) > Four Triples > Six Pairs > Three Straights > Three Flushes = Additional Notes = ♦ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other accounts to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/13pokerapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa- Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? Gamesofa Website: http://www.gamesofa.com More Games: http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ 【最多玩家評鑑5顆星，台灣線上十三支No.1遊戲品牌】 2,300萬玩家，3秒入桌、隨時刁牌！正宗13支玩法，免註冊立刻玩！ ♠ 最多玩家評鑑5顆星 ♠ 免費遊戲：立刻下載可得1200神幣 ♠ 首創換牌局玩法：手牌換3張、一對變鐵支 －Android十三支 遊戲特色－ ♥ 正統13支遊戲(又稱十三張、中國撲克、Chinese poker、Pusoy) ♥ 全球2,300萬玩家，按兩下就入桌 ♥ 經典打槍玩法，神槍手最愛！ ♥ 智慧墩牌提示+手動選牌，輕鬆成為墩牌王！ ♥ 首創特殊牌型：三同花、三順子、湊一色，獎金UP！ ♥ 贈幣超多：步步高升連續登入，天天領獎勵 ♥ 斷線重連系統，網路斷線也不怕 ♥ 一指叼牌，操作直覺流暢，手感真實，爽度破表！ ♥ 互動道具表心意，跟朋友打Pusoy更有趣！ ♥ 每日中國撲克神槍賽登場！手機隨時拚排名、贏獎金！ ♥ 認證會員免費補幣至888，每天都能免費玩線上Chinese Poker －Android 十三張 改版內容－ ♣ 全新Chinese Poker牌桌，除舊佈新財神到！ －Android 13支 遊戲規則－ ♦ 一般規則 　．一副52張撲克牌均分給4位玩家，每家13張牌。 　．玩家將手中的十三張牌分為3張(第一墩)、5張(第二墩)、5張(第三墩)的牌組。一、二、三墩依序與其他3家比大小。 　．比大小的方式與梭哈相同，但第一墩必須小於第二墩，第二墩必須小於第三墩，否則為「相公」。 　．比牌時，先比「牌型」。若牌型相同時，再比點數，不比較花色。 　．「特殊牌型」大於「一般牌型」，不與「一般牌型」比牌 ♦ 換牌局玩法 牌局開始前，有15秒鐘可選擇0~3張牌與其他三位玩家交換。若在時間倒數完畢時，已選好牌，但來不及按下｢確定交換｣，則系統將交換已選好的3張牌。 ♦ 基本牌型說明 由大到小分別為：同花順> 鐵支> 葫蘆> 同花> 順子> 三條> 兩對>一對> 單張(烏龍) ♦ 特殊牌型說明 由大到小分別為：清龍＞一條龍＞十二皇族＞三同花順＞三分天下＞全大＞全小＞湊一色＞四套三條＞六對半＞三順子＞三同花 －其他說明－ ♦ 原「神來也會員」或「Facebook」、「Yahoo」帳號直接玩 ♦ 若您之前使用MSN, Google等帳號登入神來也遊戲，想在手機上繼續使用該帳號，請參考「帳號轉換及登入教學說明」 http://www.gamesofa.com/sevensapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa 5分鐘．想樂最輕鬆 ============================= 想玩更多？ Gamesofa官網 http://www.gamesofa.com 更多神來也遊戲 http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/

GoHour搵工App讓你即時於App內填寫個人檔案，申請工作，捉緊身邊每個機會！大量零售、餐飲荀工！ 知名僱主包括: Muji, I.T, G2000, Bossini, 牛角, euro go go , Fila ,香港賽馬會, Triple O’s, BreadTalk Concept , DHL Express (Hong Kong) Limited, 綠色和平 功能包括： - 利用GPS搜尋附近的職位空缺並即時申請工作。 - 利用職位掃瞄器，掃瞄僱主及招聘廣告的QR code。這便可以立即知道特定僱主的職位空缺並即時申請。 - 除了強勁的GPS好工搜尋系統外，GoHour App亦提供其他搜尋條件以便搜尋工作(如：職位名稱, 工作類別及聘用形式）。 - 搜尋時把心水工作儲存。 - 隨時查看申請記錄。 - 透過Email, SMS, Facebook 與朋友分享工作信息。 GoHour is a job app that let you build your personal profile, apply job instantly, and catch every job opportunity nearby you! Many Retail and Food & Beverage jobs! Featured Employers include: Lane Crawford，I.T，Muji，Cour Carre，G2000，Milan Station，Hong Kong Jockey Club，Tai Hing，Subway，Euro go go... Features: - Search nearby jobs using our GPS location system and apply instantly. - Scan the QR codes of employers or job advertisement to browse and apply jobs easily. - Besides searching through our GPS system, you can also search and browse jobs by job title, job category and employment type, according to your own preferences. - Save your favorite jobs using your GoHour account. - Check your application history anytime. - Share job details with friends via Email, SMS and Facebook. Our website 我們的網站: www.gohour.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/gohour Recruitment hotline 僱主招聘熱線: 3977-5177

You are a high flying pilot with the skies at your feet! Fly above the open sea and make headlines as you dodge enemy drones. Move quickly cause the enemy drones have a lock on you and they aim to kill. This obstacle style flyer game is SUPER ADDICTING and FUN! This is is one game that you'll love as much as your kids. Who will be better is the question?? Go for it and take a shot at the fighter lifestyle...be bold and do not get hit in order to survive the terrors of the skies! YOU'LL LOVE THIS GAME!!!

This little round gum all won't quit trying to make it through the tunes of death. Please show Darby that you are not hip to the tricks up his sleeve. It was A TON OF FUN creating this bouncy adventure...see for yourself how SMASHING of a game this can be by putting your skills to the test. Good luck! YOU'LL LOVE THIS GAME!!!

In this confined space you possess the world in your control! Carefully position your arch defenders to contain the infamous escape droid and protect the fate of the world. This droid is a descendent of the Circle Noid Galaxy, and he possesses a red matter agent that is capable of destroying an entire solar system!! He's sure to end the planet we love most, earth, as a result if his recent capture. Only you can ensure the safety of the human race...only you can help our people survive this horrible force sent to wipe our world off the grid through black hole warfare!! This game is a TRUE TEST of SKILL and in the same token can be ADDICTING and FUN!!
If you like jumping games and spooky games, here a good fit for you. Help the skeleton jumping is way out of Hell But watch out where you land.

This Liger Jumping sensation has an appetite for leaping over treacherous obstacles to include porcupines and bamboo shoots. But do not be too hasty, these prickly fellas are quite difficult to avoid when they come in groups rather than as individuals. Soar over the gaps in the open landscaping while you overcome each obstacle one at a time. Very FUN & COOL GAME!
Play for survival and prevent the Nerd head run aways from passing through the pipes n having to deal with the Nerd Bash Nation. VERY FUN and ADDICTIVE game!!!

Defend your passage from the star invasion! Don't let a single star bound challenger pass through to the other side of the smash tubes. All this little fun clone from space needs is a break. So why not have A TON OF FUN smashing as many as possible - exactly...be a smashing star, here's you're chance!! This game is SUPER ADDICTING!!!

Cyphr - Encrypted messaging simplified. Cyphr makes encrypted messaging easy. All messages are encrypted, private and 100% yours. Generate your public and private key pair so only you can read your messages, start group conversations with friends, and share attachments privately. ONLY YOU CAN READ YOUR MESSAGES. Cyphr generates a unique public and private key pair so only you and your friend can read your conversation - not us, not your phone company, and not a 3rd party. We take a zero-access approach, and give you total control of your data. BE AS PRIVATE AS YOU WANT TO BE. Whether you are a casual user or a privacy fanatic, you can adjust Cyphr's settings to fit your privacy needs. If a feature requires information sharing, you can choose to disable that feature. PRIVACY WITHOUT SACRIFICES. Cyphr doesn't sacrifice simplicity or features for privacy. Start single or group conversations, send attachments, and more. WE DON'T STORE DATA ABOUT YOUR MESSAGES. We do not needlessly store information about you, your recipients or your messages. MULTIPLE LAYERS OF SECURITY. Cyphr encrypts your messages using a combination of symmetric keys, and public and private key pairs. Cyphr also verifies messages with public key verification to ensure you and your friends know messages are from each other, not an impersonator. All messages are transmitted securely with SSL/TLS to protect your personal data, in addition to the message. YOUR MESSAGES. OUR SERVERS. NO 3RD PARTIES. At Golden Frog we own our servers, write our code, and manage our own network to deliver the highest levels of security, speed and privacy. Cyphr servers are located in Switzerland for maximum user privacy and protection. A COMPANY YOU CAN TRUST. Golden Frog's founders are Internet veterans who have fought to preserve online privacy, security and freedom since 1994. We arm users in 195+ countries with VyprVPN, a secure personal VPN, Dump Truck, a secure online storage solution, and Cyphr, the world's most secure messaging app. Together these tools allow users to protect themselves online, wherever they go. HELP US BUILD THE APP YOU WANT. Leave your Cyphr feedback and feature requests so we can make the best encrypted messaging app for you. UPCOMING FEATURES: • Multi-device capability • Desktop apps • Rotate encryption keys • Gigabyte attachments • Whatever you want! http://www.goldenfrog.com/cyphr
release_text: Version 0.7.0.811 -Multi-device support now available! Message with Cyphr on all your mobile devices. description: Magnetic stud finder app puts an handy stud finder in everyone's pocket at no cost. Even if already having your own stud finder, this app provides a valuable second source. Magnetic stud finder app consists of a customized metal detector with a bubble level view. It can be used for both metal and wood studs. Steel nails/screws are used to fix drywall to the wood studs. Magnetic stud finder finds wood studs by identifying the location of nails and screws. The bubble level is another tool for handyman. The app can also be used as detector for all ferromagnetic objects. To make the best out of it, it is very important to use this app properly. We provide help within the app. More information is provided in our website www.goldsequence.com. You can also see this instruction video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZmd5vkag7o We have tested this app in multiple buildings with different phones. It works pretty well for drywall if used properly. Even if you cover the drywall with a extra layer of 1/4 inch thick ceramic tile, the app can still work. That being said, the app is not without its limits. This app won't work well if the variation of magnetic field strength becomes too weak to pick up. For example, if you live in a old house with plaster wall and the plaster layer is more than 1/4 inch thick, the app will probably not work well. Even if your house uses drywall, if the size of the drywall screws is too small, it could generate problems for this app. So we agree that this app is not for every house. However, we do believe that it can do good things for many people in many houses.

However, geocoder service does not work well. Also modify location service and help. v0.6: Drop requirements for gps and Wifi location. Add user feedback form. Help information improvement.

description: This app connects Wii Remotes with your smart phone. It provides functions such as: * motion alarm: You can use it for baby monitor, security system etc. Compared with other similar apps in the market, our app requires only ONE phone, not TWO! For baby monitor, you can put Wii Remote in the crib and watch TV in another room. The phone will beep when your baby gets up and makes movements. Even in completely dark room, it works well. * real-time monitor: the app can display Wii Remote movement on the phone in real-time. * data collector: it generates records when alarm triggered. It can also collect accelerometer and gyroscope sensor data samples from all Wii Remotes. You can mount Wii Remotes on human body or objects to record the movement. System with similar feature can cost you 100x more even with less portability. With Wii coupled with smart phone, sky is the limit for its applications. If you discover new usage of this app or desire some new features, please let us know at support@goldsequence.com . We will be glad to serve. It works with up to two Wii Motionplus。 WARNING: 1. The machine has its limitations. For critical tasks such as baby monitor, please don't outsource all the responsibilities to the phone. 2. The Android bluetooth function does not support Wii. We have to create our own bluetooth function. Because of that, this app may not be supported by some vendors. 3. This app won't work with Wii Remote without Motionplus option. It only works with genuine products made by Nintendo. 4. The app relies on bluetooth connection. Bluetooth's range is about 30 feet. This app will be unreliable when the range gets larger. This app can't be used in: HTC phones with sense UI, Samsung Galaxy phones such as Verizon Charge and at&t infuse. Because of "rooted" phones, these devices are not excluded from app installation.

description: Send animated emoticons even with sounds!, encrypted text and other emoticons with your favourte chat app!! You can also send them as images so all your friends will see them (even if they have not this app installed)!! -Compatible with different Chat apps. Important: Your friends must have this app installed to see the animated emoticons and encrypted text. -How to use: After activating Animated Smileys service and keyboard (the keyboard is optional, you can also use the gallery). To send emoticons as images, select share image option of your chat app and select Animated Smileys as source of images. If you activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, type !ws and select "Animated Smileys Keyboard", writte your message if you want and send it! 2)To send encrypted text, choose they option "send encrypted text" in the Animated Smileys Keyboard, put your message and set the password. Encrypted message will be copied to clipboard, now paste it in your chat and send it! If you did not activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, open a chat with your friend, a floating icon will appear in top right corner of the screen. Touch it and choose your emoticon or the option to send encrypted text. Encrypted text and emoticons will be copied to clipboard, now just paste it in chat and send! To read an encrypted text just tap the message!! -Explanation: *Animated emotes will not be shown in chat, they will open in top of your chat in a floating invisible window (in chat you will see a command like "!ws12;". *Android version 4.0 or higher will automatically show animated emoticons, lower Android versions will have to tap the message to see the animation.

Get all your notifications instantly wherever you want. Do you have two phones? a tablet? are your sitting at your computer? Get all notifications where you want! App under Development. XDA-Developers post: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2745324 Report Bugs and Feature requests Never miss an important notification or just dont search your phone to check what notification you received...it will just show up in your computer or in your tablet! You can get notified in your computer, in your tablet or anywhere with a browser. The app uses your wifi network for best security. Future versions will implement an internet option. Requirements: To send notifications: android 4.3+ To receive notifications: android 2.2+ For the Desktop (computer) notification you need this program: http://www.golgorz.com/anywherenotificationserver.rar Download, unzip, and double click the file, it will start the server to receive notificaiton in your computer! Devices/computers must be in the same network to work. *Right now browser option is disabled.

description: "With over 50 ranches, the Apple Hill Growers Association (AHGA) farms have been a family destination since 1964. A family trip to visit the Apple Hill Growers means so much more than just apples and pies. It's memories that'll last a lifetime! It's berry farms, you-pick farms, and kid-friendly activities. For the grown-ups, it's fine wines and handcrafted beers in an incredible Sierra-soaked setting. It's Christmas trees for as far as your group can wander. On behalf of all the wonderful folks in the Apple Hill Grower area, we encourage you to make our little slice of heaven a part of your world. It's a tradition you'll cherish forever! Our farms are located in an area that stretches from Placerville to Camino to Pollock Pines, California--between Lake Tahoe and Sacramento on Highway 50. In addition to the AHGA ranch listings, events, and family fun, you'll find area restaurants, hotels, and other nearby adventure in this app."

Established in 1832, Bastrop’s historical roots run deep. Over 130 buildings listed in the National Register of Historic Places earned Bastrop the unofficial title of “Most Historic Small Town in Texas.” In 2010 the National Trust for Historic Preservation named Bastrop to its prestigious list of Distinctive Destinations™ in the United States. Nestled on the banks of the Colorado River, the historic district is filled with a variety of shops and restaurants. The quaint ambiance of downtown is complemented by nearby neighborhoods of well-preserved historic homes. Proud of its tie to early Texas history, Bastrop boasts three early settlers who signed the Texas Declaration of Independence, several died at the Alamo, the town evacuated during the Runaway Scrape, and 60 men are recorded as having fought at the Battle of San Jacinto. The town, destroyed during the Runaway Scrape and later rebuilt, was named Bastrop in 1837 by the newly established Congress of the Republic of Texas. Today, Main Street is lined with century-old structures housing antique shops, specialty stores and great restaurants. The 1889 Opera House continues to offer live entertainment. The ‘Old Town’ Visitor Center is located in the restored 1889 First National Bank Building and the Bastrop County Historical Museum is located in an 1850 historic home on the banks of the Colorado River. Fisherman’s Park provides access to the river for fishing or kayaking. Many of the historic homes house bed-and-breakfast inns that recall the elegance of another period. Bastrop State Park (also listed on the National Register) is nearby with majestic pine trees and Civilian Conservation Corps (CCC) buildings from the 1930s. The area is home to excellent golf courses, and the new Hyatt Regency Lost Pines Resort and Spa is minutes away. Bastrop, Texas…come for a visit, we’ll capture your heart!

Visit California Cheesemakers and Tour their Farms. * Find and visit a cheesemaker near you. * Plan a personal driving tour or follow a suggested itinerary. * Get the inside scoop on where to taste free cheese. * Learn about over 150 California cheeses, all sorted and searchable. * Find answers to those puzzling questions about cheese. * Browse details about 50+ cheesemakers. * Find out where to buy those obscure cheeses. * Includes cow, goat, sheep & water buffalo milk cheeses. * Read cheesemaker stories and so much more (with more to come). Have fun exploring and discovering both new and familiar cheeses. Oh yeah. It’s all about cheese!

Nestled in the heart of Santa Barbara’s wine country, Solvang combines old-world charm with contemporary amenities unlike anywhere else in the United States. Enjoy the experience of a European village with no passport required. While taking in the beautiful scenery and excellent weather, discover Solvang’s unique stores and boutiques. A shopper’s paradise, there are more than 100 shops offering old world antiques, Danish imports, collectibles, arts and crafts, books, shoes, clothing, jewelry, homemade candy, home goods, toys, souvenirs and art. Delight in a divine culinary experience at Solvang’s restaurants, cafes, bakeries and sweet shops. Discover some new favorite wines served at the wine bars and tasting rooms of the Solvang Wine Experience. There’s beer tasting with local brews and unique imports too. Museums and historical attractions reflect the fascinating rich multi-cultural background of the area. Every Third Wednesday, more than 60 stores, restaurants, wine establishments and professional offices offer special discounts and sales all day. In the summer there are outdoor concerts and movies in Solvang Park. Outdoor activities abound – golf, hiking, cycling, horseback riding, touring and more. Experience Solvang…..come for a day or stay for a while….you won’t be disappointed.

This app offers residents, visitors and people who work in Hackensack, New Jersey information on dining, retail, services, events, parking and real estate in Downtown Hackensack. The Hackensack Main Street Business Alliance (MSBA or Upper Main Alliance) is a public private partnership formed as an alliance between the business community and the City of Hackensack, New Jersey. We are responsible for various aspects of Main Street beautification, special events, parking and real estate availability. Our key area extends along Main Street from Atlantic Street to Clinton Place. There are 153 commercial properties and over 375 businesses within the district.

Just an hour drive from the San Francisco Bay. Harvest Time is a Non-Profit Organization that is dedicated to educating the general public and "foodies" about farming and its products while improving Agri-tourism in the Brentwood California Region of East Contra Costa County. Each year we produce a farm trail map that directs you to over 40 growers which sell direct to the consumer! Come learn how farm-fresh is just naturally more delicious and nutritious-and more economical too! Whether you prefer picked produce, or enjoy picking your own, we have educational programs, fresh, delicious fruits, vegetables, and nuts waiting for you. We also have wine, pies, gift baskets, gourmet treats, Alpaca clothing and nursery stock. Come visit some of the farms in Brentwood California's bountiful agricultural region to celebrate Harvest Time! Encounter our generous agricultural heritage and learn about farming and much more in our region of Northern California.

Less than an hour east of San Francisco, Livermore Valley Wine Country welcomes visitors with a flourish expanse of vineyards, wineries, and wine country experiences. Amid picturesque canyons, ridges and outposts of suburbia, the lush vines and convivial tasting rooms increasingly define the quality of life in the valley. To the delight of residents and visitors alike, the region is enjoying a wine renaissance harking back to the golden years of early California wine history. One of California's oldest wine regions, the Livermore Valley played a pivotal role in shaping California's wine industry. Spanish missionaries planted the first wine grapes in the Livermore Valley in the 1760s. In the 1840s, California pioneers looking for outstanding vineyard sites began planting grapes in the region. Robert Livermore planted the first commercial vines in the 1840s. Pioneer winemakers C. H. Wente, James Concannon, and Charles Wetmore recognized the area's winegrowing potential and founded their wineries in the early 1880s. Livermore Valley captured America's first international gold medal for wine in 1889 at the Paris Exposition, putting California on the world wine map. Livermore Valley wineries were the first to bottle varietal labeled Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Petite Sirah. Nearly 80% of California's Chardonnay vines trace their genetic roots to a Livermore Valley clone. Livermore Valley also boasted more than 50 wineries until Prohibition and contributed significantly to the state's enology and viticulture that lives on today. Innovations developed in the Livermore Valley include overhead irrigation, mechanical harvesting and roller crushing in the vineyard. Attracted to the rich winemaking tradition, climate, soil and geography, new winemakers and vineyardists are working alongside fifth generation winegrowers to create this Livermore Valley wine renaissance. The region now has over 40 wineries, with several more about to open, and more than 5,000 acres of vineyards. Wineries vary in size from limited release, 100-case labors of love to 400,000-case industry heavyweights, and grapes range from familiar Merlot and Chardonnay to Italian, Rhone and Spanish varieties. Welcoming tasting rooms showcase award-winning wines and offer year around activities. In addition to the myriad happenings at individual wineries, the Livermore Valley Winegrowers Association sponsors several consumer events each year, showcasing the talent, energy and fine wines of the region. The Livermore Valley iPhone app concentrates on the Livermore area wineries, along with a sampling of local businesses and events for the user. We don't try to be a comprehensive directory of restaurants, shopping or activities, but provide enough of a selection for wine lovers spending a day or weekend in Livermore to stay busy.

Twenty years ago there were eight Lodi wineries. Today, there are more than 80…and each year the number continues to grow. Whether you’re new to Lodi or a dedicated Lodi wine enthusiast, this app will allow you to maximize your wine tasting experience while visiting the Lodi appellation. You can search for a particular winery, find your favorite among the list, or discover new ones. You’ll also be able to get driving directions while navigating from one winery to the next using the integrated Mapping feature. The app also allows you to view tasting room hours, special events, local activities, wine specials, and more. About the region… Nestled between the San Francisco Bay and the Sierra Nevada Mountains lies Lodi Wine Country, a region fast becoming one of California's true wine stars. Lodi Wine Country offers a rural atmosphere and relaxed pace for you to enjoy its beautiful vineyards and exquisite wines. Lodi wines are tended by generations of farming families rooted to the land, yielding wines that are simply irresistible. They are full of flavor, yet soft and supple on the palate—delicious on their own or the perfect companion to food. Lodi has been a major winegrape growing region since the 1850’s. Today, the area has 100,000 acres of winegrapes, farmed by more than 750 growers. Lodi is best known for its full-bodied Old Vine Zinfandel wines. In addition to Zinfandel, Lodi leads all other California wine districts in the production of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, and Viognier. The App includes: Directory of the Lodi Wineries and local associated businesses: Wineries Restaurants Hotels Activities Tasting Rooms Listings include name, address, phone number and email, hours and a short description of the business. Website, pictures, Facebook, Twitter, Yelp and other links may be included if the information was provided by the business. Wineries can be sorted and filtered by: Varietal Amenities Calendar of Events Winery iPhone App Specials Trivia about Lodi Favorites folder to store frequently used entries Maps integration: Directions to the selected business Mapping of nearby similar businesses Social integration: Facebook & Twitter-enabled Find local friends using Facebook and Twitter Post directly from the app to Twitter and Facebook See where other users are gathering Full Privacy options to broadcast or hide your location

Mountain View Mobile puts the Mountain View, Arkansas, area business community at your fingertips -- listings, events calendar, photos, and more. It is produced by the Stone County Leader. The Stone County Leader is the hometown weekly newspaper serving Stone County, Arkansas, since 1952. An award-winning publication, the Leader has been recognized by the Arkansas Press Association as one of the top weekly newspapers in the state. Our office is located at 104 West Main in Mountain View. Subscribers enjoy free classified ads (non-business) and free access to our e-edition. Visit our website www.stonecountyleader.com for more information.

Coastal Wine Agency (www.coastalwineagency.com) is a multiple winery tasting wine club that allows wine connoisseurs to taste at different wineries across the Central Coast for one low flat rate. Each pass is valid for two adults. We offer two clubs, a quarterly pass at $40 and a weekly pass at $20. Our members are able to buy a pass and taste at multiple wineries from Paso Robles to Los Olivos without paying each tasting fee. Buy a pass today and taste at more than 15 wineries on the Central Coast!

When planning a visit to Tracy, you’ll want to come early and stay late! Once you arrive…relax and enjoy our warm temperatures and even warmer hospitality in our beautiful historic downtown. Tracy is known for its many hometown events including the annual Farmers’ Market on Saturdays on 10th Street, Block Parties in the newly renovated downtown 6th Street Plaza, Girls Night Out and the Fourth of July Day-In-the-Park which is a taste of true small town Americana with hot air balloons, arts and crafts, and a spectacular fireworks display. Later in July, the Tracy City Center Association and the City of Tracy will be co-sponsoring, for the first time ever in downtown Tracy, the “Then & Now” Car Show in late July; a fun filled day for the entire family. The annual Tracy Chamber of Commerce California Dry Bean Festival held in early September along with the Tracy City Center Association’s signature Fall Wine Stroll help to bring in the Fall season. And you won’t want to miss the Holidays in Downtown Tracy to kick off a fun filled holiday season.

Inspired by old 8 bit computer games "West Bank" on ZX Spectrum and "Bank Panic" on Commodore 64, the game Back to the West is a special tribute to hot hacker summers in mid 80’s. Take the role of an Old West Sheriff who must protect a bank and its customers from robbers. Sheriff must watch three bank doors. The doors will open to reveal a customer (who will drop a bag of money, making a deposit), a robber (who will attempt to shoot the player) or a … well, You can find out the rest… Meet the Gang: * Mary Louise Williams * Her father was a hardworking railroad man who delivered bread for a living to support his wife and Mary Lou. Don't kill her 'coz she is a good girl. She is single. * John Peters "Johnny" Ringo * Ringo was born in Greensfork, Indiana, of distant Dutch ancestry. Ringo was jailed in Burnet,Texas by Sheriff A. J. Strickland. He was broken out of jail by his friends shortly thereafter, but they parted company to evade the law. Ringo is surly, bad-tempered man. * William Magear Tweed* The greedy and corrupt mayor of Dodge City, Kansas, mayor Tweed rigs elections and makes taxes so high that some people compare it to stealing. He also serves as Dodge City's Bank President. * Nathaniel "Texas Jack" Reed * Reed gave up working as a cowboy and became an outlaw. He and his gang robbed trains, stagecoaches, banks and, on one occasion, captured a large shipment of bullion in California. The American Express Company offered a reward of $250 for his arrest and conviction. * "Dynamite Dan" Clifton * A cattle rustler and train robber in Oklahoma Indian Territory. Tale says that he lost three fingers while playing with dynamite as a child. Clifton accumulated a sizable bounty on his head—thirty-ﬁve hundred dollars, so make sure you shoot him TWICE! * John Horton Slaughter * After serving in the army of the Confederacy during the American Civil War, Slaughter was a member of the Texas Rangers before becoming a cattle business man. Slaughter, with penetrating black eyes, was often stuttered, but he wore a pearl-handled .44 * James B. “Killer” Miller * Miller is known to wear a black frock coat, making him hard to see in the darkness. His coat also concealed a steel plate he wore on his chest to protect him from opposing gunfire. Beware! Despite his piousness, he is actually one of the deadliest guns!

Phone Dialer is an assistant dialer for telephone. By the DTMF dialing, it can directly extract the number from the mobile phonebook, and then send it to telephone to dial out. Simply pick up the telephone, put the mobile speaker close to the mouthpiece of telephone, and press the “by phone” icon, then the dialing will be completed by Phone Dialer. After the call connected, you can directly talk on the telephone. In most country, using telephone to call to PSTN is much cheaper then using mobile to call to PSTN. Besides, it’s convenient and health to talk on telephone! If you talk on mobile for a long time, it will become heat. You will feel uncomfortable, and the electromagnetic waves may harm health. So just save all the contact numbers in the mobile phonebook, and let Phone Dialer dial for you when using telephone. 20 sets of Dial plan. It will add or delete code for phone number. In some country, the way you dial out by mobile or telephone will be different. For example, you will add the local code before the PSTN number if you dial out by mobile. But if you want to dial out by telephone, you should not add it. Dial plan can solve this issue! Or maybe you want the telephone use another telecom provider to dial out. For example, the number in the mobile phone book is 0093312345. Dial plan can automatically change the number to 0053312345 for you when the call is dial out by telephone. Notice: It may not works perfectly in every mobile phone because of the speaker quality. Please download the Free version to test before buying the Full version!! **If you have any suggestion to improve this app, please feel free to contact us!!**

SyncRoid is the best Android application to sync your Outlook Contacts, Calendars & Tasks with Android via Bluetooth & WiFi. Simple, efficient and secure! You need to download FREE SyncRoid PC Client on your computer from http://www.syncroid.com No need to use USB cable or pass your personal information through the cloud or internet any more just to sync your contacts, calendars and tasks between Microsoft Outlook and Android! You are welcome to try SyncRoid Lite version before deciding for the FULL version. SyncRoid Lite download: http://goo.gl/Cy1oL ========================= FEATURES ========================= • Bluetooth & WiFi connectivity • Synchronize between MS Outlook and Android - Contacts - Calendars - Tasks • Possible Sync Modes: - Phone to Outlook Sync - Outlook to Phone Sync - Two Way Sync • Auto Sync Feature (Bluetooth only) • No Content Duplication • No Content Deletion • Contacts; Following information is synced: - Full Name - Company Name and Job Title - Phone numbers: Mobile, Work, Work Fax, Home, Home Fax, Pager, Other - Mailing Addresses: Home, Business, Work and Other - Email address: 3 email addresses - Contact specific ‘Notes’ - Web page address • Calendars, Appointments & Events Sync; Following information is synced: - Subject / Title and Description - Location - Start and End date & time - Reminders - Recurring or Repeating Events (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly and Range of Recurrence) - All Day Events - Attendees and Guests - Event Privacy (Private or Public) - Availability State (Busy or Free) • Tasks Sync; Following information is synced: - Subject / Title and Description - Start and due date & time - Reminders - Recurring or Repeating Tasks (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly and Range of Recurrence) - Event Privacy (Private or Public) ========================= REQUIREMENTS ========================= • SyncRoid PC Client has to be installed on your PC from http://www.syncroid.com • Microsoft Outlook 2003, 2007, 2010 or 2013 installed on your computer (32 or 64-bits) • Bluetooth or WiFi enabled Windows PC and Android device ============================== SUPPORT / COMMENTS / FEEDBACK ============================== Our support team will be eager to assist you for any kind of questions, suggestions and feedback. Kindly contact us before posting a negative comment at care@syncroid.com Please also visit our FAQs section on our website www.syncroid.com. We will be looking forward for feedback, comments and your experience with this application. We can be reached through: • Email: care@syncroid.com • Twitter: @SyncRoidApp • Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Syncroid -------------------------------------- Keywords: Synchronize Outlook, Synch Android contacts, Sync Calendar Outlook, SyncRoid, Sync Tasks, Sync WiFi, Sync Bluetooth

description: Backgammon is a great game! You will love it from the beginning! Are you ready for the best game ever! Love backgammon but can't find a really good, fun and easy to use game app? Backgammon is one of the oldest board games for two players. As you may already know there are tricks and rules to follow in order to win and beat your opponent! The basic rules are to roll the dice and move your pieces across the board to win. Sound simple? It isn't! Features: GAME MODES: 2 difficulties to choose from; anyone can play and exercise their brain! Even if you have never played or have been doing it since you were a kid; this app is perfect for YOU! Single Player Soon we will do the multiplayer version. Now you can also choose to play against the computer or a friend; are you up for the challenge? This is it! With amazing graphics and developed to the last detail get ready to exercise your brain with this timeless game that has been capturing generations!

This handy application presents you several self-guided walking tours to see the best of the Bangkok, Thailand, and it comes with detailed tour route maps and powerful navigation features to guide you from one sight to the next. No need to hop on a tour bus or join a tour group; now you can explore all of the best attractions on your own, at your own pace, and at a cost that is only a fraction of what you would normally pay for a guided tour. Walking tours included in this application are: * Art Galleries in Bangkok (5 sights) * Famous Architecture (7 sights) * Wats and Temples (8 sights) * Places of Worship (7 sights) * Bangkok's Landmarks (7 sights) * Museums in Bangkok (7 sights) * Nightlife in Bangkok (5 sights) * Shopping in Bangkok (8 sights) * Chinatown (6 sights) * City Orientation Tour (12 sights) All the data used in this app is built into the software, so you can follow the walking tours or use the city map without internet access or cellular data plan. No need to pay the costly roaming charges when traveling to foreign cities. The app is optimized for Android phone and tablet. The powerful navigation assistance includes: * Touring routes clearly displayed on map. * Precise turn-by-turn walking directions from one sight to the next. * `FindMe` displays your exact location and Auto Tracking displays your movement on the map (this feature is not supported on device without built-in GPS function). * Built-in compass to show you the direction. * A detailed city map which can be used independently for your other traveling needs. Please visit our website at www.GPSmyCity.com to find city walks for over 470 cities worldwide.
release_text: - Enhanced the search function in city map.

Basic life support (BLS) is the level of medical care which is used for victims of life-threatening illnesses or injuries until they can be given full medical care at a hospital. It can be provided by trained medical personnel, including emergency medical technicians, paramedics, and by laypersons who have received BLS training. BLS is generally used in the pre-hospital setting, and can be provided without medical equipment.This test includes 30 questions of the BLS test (2008)

description: Gambling Addiction Help by Hani Al-Qasem. Is your gambling addiction totally out of control? Are your relationships and finances suffering because of your addiction? Is your addiction costing you your life? Would you like to stop your gambling addiction and take back control of your life; your health, your relationships, your finances? If you seriously want to conquer and be free of your gambling addiction, and if you genuinely want to take full control over your mind and your gambling urges, so you may appreciate your self-worth and the value of money, this audio is designed especially for you. With this audio you will: * Be sensible and in control of your mind and urges * Have the strength of mind to always be in total control of your thoughts and emotions * See the value of every dollar that you have, and you will also make wise spending decisions * Have full control over your urges and impulses Wouldn't it be great if you could remain strong over your temptation to gamble so you can eliminate gambling out of your life, so you may save money instead of burning money? Here's your chance to be responsible for your life. How this audio works: This 20 minute audio works on your subconscious mind to bring about the desired outcome. It starts off at a high level, just above 'alpha', and slowly descends to the lower end of 'alpha' over 5 minutes, designed to calm you. It is then kept constant at this lower end of 'alpha' for 10 minutes; during that period, the affirmations are being delivered directly to your receptive subconscious mind while you remain in this relaxed state. What makes this and every 'The Choices I Make' series of audios super-effective is that you will hear the carefully worded affirmations in triplicate, using the accelerated learning technique. On top of that, we utilise the immense clout that lies behind the three words, "I choose to…" Your incredibly powerful subconscious mind more readily accepts the words, "I choose to…" than "I am…", thereby bringing about change much faster than by using the traditional two worded phrase. After the messages are finished, there will be a short gap before we slowly move up the frequency, gradually ascending back to a level just above 'alpha', over the remaining 5 minutes so you will be fully alert, energised and refreshed. Once the session comes to an end, you open your eyes and continue with the rest of your day. "We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make our world." - Buddha The way you think is critical in every aspect of your life.

When a coin toss simply won't do and arm wrestling is out of the question, Duel! is the decider. An abstract single-screen multiplayer game of combat and total uncompromising obliteration for two or more opponents. Compete head to head on the same screen. Launch missiles to attack or block your rival. Duel! feels your touches through space age finger recognition technology and distills them into the pure concentrated essence of justice and destruction. This game is ABSOLUTELY FREE. NO ads and NO in-app purchases. ----- Some older devices only register 5 or fewer touches at one time. Should this affect your device, you will need to work out a gentleperson's agreement with your opponent on the field of battle.

The HAR.com Android app allows both consumers and HAR members to search for homes for sale or lease in greater Houston area. Consumers will be able to use the award-winning HAR.com residential property search engine to find a home, bookmark listings and view property search history. Members will be able to access MLS information (MLS subscribers only), their leads, their listings, as well as access their company's listing inventory. Features for Consumers & Members • Award-winning HAR.com residential property search engine to find homes for sale or lease in the greater Houston area. • Wide range of search filters such as proximity, price, square footage and more. • Map automatically refreshes to display listings when you pan/move across the map. • MLS listing information is updated every 15 minutes. • Most comprehensive listing details include price, room dimensions, interior and exterior features, open house schedule and more. • Easily slide through a photo gallery for each listing (including up to 32 photos,which is more than you may find on any other app). • Enhanced Google mapping with Street View. • Bookmark your favorite listings. • View a history of your searches. • Easily contact the listing agent or broker. Features for MLS Subscribers Only HAR MLS subscribers may log in to the password-protected member only area by using their HAR.com username and password. Members have access to their leads, their listings, and their company's listing inventory. Detailed listing information includes: • Complete listing details • Days on Market • Archive and agent full report (Listing price changes) • Access to Tax Profile Report • Showing instructions (if applicable) • Tax information (including values and tax rates)

This is Headset/Earphone/Bluetooth audio volume manager. It can set the sound volume of system. If headset(earphone, Bluetooth, etc.) is connected, it automatically detect and adjust the sound volume. In addition, the audio-related convenience functions are provided. [key features and preferences] * It's support Bluetooth Headset(HFP, HSP, A2DP, AVRCP). * Automatic Volume Control : It remember the volume of each status and adjust automatically. * Headset Etiquette Mode : When you connect the headset, it switch to vibrate or desired ringer mode automatically. It should set the ringer mode of profile to Etiquette Vibrate or Silent mode. * Silent Media Mode : If ringer mode is changed to silent or vibrate mode in normal state, it mute the media volume. Normal state is that you don't wear any headset. This mode is applicable only in the normal state. * Modify the system volume: Volume tab is possible to modify the total system volume. * Use incoming call volume for notifications : If checked, the ring volume is used in conjunction with the notification volume. * Play alarm in silent mode : If unchecked, don't alarm in silent or vibrate ringer mode. * Screen On: when connecting the headset, it turn on the screen. [NOTE] 1. For normal operation, the service must be executed. 2. Be careful not to kill the service by Advanced Task Killer or Task Manager. 3. the Screen On feature may not work in some devices.
release_text: v3.0.5 - Lollipop Silent mode support. v3.0.4 - Improve Bluetooth connection of some device.

description: OpenPGP Manager is an encryption client for Android, capable of: * Create/import/export/publish/search PGP keys * Send/receive encrypted mail with Gmail * PGP encryption/decryption of mail & files * Thunderbird integration (via gnupg + Enigmail plugin) * Password-based encryption/decryption (AES-256, 3DES, RC2...) * Sign & verify files and emails * Subkeys viewing and editing * Biometric words * Key armoring Public-key cryptography is in most cases the best choice to protect your mail and communications from being intercepted and/or sniffed by governments, NSA's PRISM surveillance program and such.

description: Free of charge for Michelin Pilot Sport Challenge participants Have you ever wished you could gauge your circuit performance? That is exactly what the MICHELIN Lap Timer offers with this application co-developed with the creator of Harry's Lap Timer for Michelin Pilot Sport Challenge participants. Because Michelin stands by your side regardless of your level of driving skill, we have organised a regularity race with several challenges on European circuits. The MICHELIN Lap Timer assesses your performance levels and generates individual and overall rankings. The three most consistent drivers will be rewarded at the winner's podium. At the end of the season, a European title is awarded to the most consistent racers. The MICHELIN Lap Timer is a high-precision tool that improves your practice sessions and Challenge ranking. Its many features are designed with you in mind. - Check your practice and challenge times via your smartphone. - Take advantage of all the indicators needed to get closer to your reference time and keep improving every time you hit the track. - Receive the official ranking of the most consistent drivers for challenge and European events. - Share your driving experience and ranking with your friends. - Record videos of your driving sessions and share them with your friends - Get access to highly accurate driving performance data by adding external sensors. Want to achieve your full driving potential? Meet us at the starting line: sign up at MICHELIN Pilot Sport Challenge! Check out https://auto.weareallracers.michelin.com/gb/eng for detailed information. Join the MICHELIN Pilot Sport Challenge community at https://auto.weareallracers.michelin.com/gb/eng/club

Meme World Cup is a game of skill. You are "Me gusta" meme and you have to pick up all the footballs to win the Meme World Cup. As you probably know, most of the memes don't have legs, and they are round!. To move yourself around the pitch you will have to twist the gravity of the world. There are some arrows on the left side of the screen that will allow you to do this. The further you push from the center of the screen, the faster the world will spin, but take care, because if you go too fast, you can go out of play, and then it will be game over. Your biggest fan is watching the game, and if you beat your own record, he will raise his arm as a sign of success and happiness. Practice with Meme World Cup and make your friends bite the dust beating their records!

description: Business Card is a digital business card that you can carry on your portable device. The main idea is to replace your traditional business card in the simplest possible way. You won't have to deal again with the problems of paper business cards: What if you run out of cards? What happens if you change jobs? What if you have several jobs? Will you have to order new cards and notify all your contacts? All these problems are solved with digital Business Card. Synchronize your data with your LinkedIn account, and after only 3 single steps, you will be able to share your data: - Open the application - Press share menu - Enter the other person's email And that's it! Main features: - You can import your professional contact data from your LinkedIn profile (you need a LinkedIn account) - You can show up to 3 current jobs. - The data is stored locally on your mobile phone, so you won't need connectivity all the time. - You can refresh your local data if you modify your LinkedIn profile. - You can share your professional data. You will only have to write the other person's email and Business Card will write a template for you with all your info. You can always edit it before sharing. If there is no internet connection, the email will be sent when connectivity is available. - You can show your professional data on the screen of your device (vertical and horizontal format), as if it was a traditional paper Business Card. - If your contact has CamCard Lite installed, or any other Business Card Reader app. then he/she can take a picture of your digital Business Card, and your data will be automatically imported to his/her contact agenda. - You can take a screenshot of your business card and print it, or share it. *Business Card stores and shows your own professional data. It does not store or share data from your contacts *Your personal data will never be accessed or processed by 3rd parties. *If you are using a tablet, Business Card will work only with the main account. *No Ads version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hdrs.businesscard
release_text: Telephone number added: You will be able now to show your telephone number, and it will be used also in your QR code. QR reader added: you will be able to scan QR codes, just go to menu, then read, and you will be able to scan a QR code. If there are any contact data in the QR code, you will be able to add a new contact in your agenda. description: The official 2015 Head2Head Fantasy Football Salary Cap app is here to provide you with everything you need to keep track of your Head2Head Fantasy team on the go. Easy to Play Using a salary cap of $100 Million, pick your team of 10 NFL football players who you think will rack up the most points each week using our Head2Head (or "H2H") scoring system. All players have been assigned a salary based on past performance and expected performance this season. You must choose 1 Quarterback, 3 Running Backs, 3 Wide Receivers/Tight Ends, 1 Kicker, 1 Defense/Special Team and 1 Flex Position (any position except a D/ST). Your players will earn H2H Fantasy Points based on their actual on-field performance. Go Head2Head All entries will be placed in a 32-team league made up of eight 4-team divisions - just like the NFL. You'll have the option to create or join a buddy pool (2 up to 32 players) with your friends, family, or co-workers. Or, if you prefer, join a public league! During the H2H regular season that runs for 17 weeks from Thursday, Sept. 10th through Sunday, January 3rd, 2016, you will compete Head2Head each week against a new opponent. Score more points than your opponent and you will post a win for that week! Score Big Points Each week, your players earn points for their actual on-field performance. Points are awarded according to the official H2H scoring system. Making Trades During the season, your players may get injured, suspended or fall into your doghouse. To maintain the strongest lineup possible you can make trades. Dump Romo for Brady or Lynch for McCoy... You make call! H2H Playoffs The top 18 teams in your league will qualify for the H2H Playoffs with the top teams from other leagues. The H2H Playoffs will run Saturday, January 9th, 2016 through Super Bowl Sunday, February 7th, 2016. Winners, including league and overall, will be determined by most cumulative points earned during the H2H Playoffs. Talk some smack! Use league messaging to talk some smack to your opponents or buddies in your league. You'll receive a message indicator on your team account and an email alert that you've been sent a message. This is a great way to talk up your game and get to know your opponents! Important tips! Have fun!! H2H Fantasy Baseball is intended solely for entertainment purposes. But we all know that losing sucks. Try any combination of asking for our advice, throwing objects or even some 12 ounce curls to bring back your sanity. Keep an eye out for good values, aka the "sleeper" (players who have low salaries and yield high H2H point totals). Take note that the salaries may change twice during the season. Once in the middle of the season some salaries will decrease only. Just prior to the playoffs, all player salaries may go both up or down. The National Football League and Google Play and its affiliates are not sponsors or otherwise affiliated with this fantasy game in any way.

From Bodybuilding-Apps.com: Ready to jumpstart your own body transformation? Get your best body in 90 days! Our three-month training program and meal plan will burn fat, build muscle and transform your body. Month One This month, we give you the first four weeks of an amazing 12-week training program that you can do in your living room. Combine it with our high-protein meal plan and nothing can stop you from getting the body of your dreams Month Two Last month, you committed to a 12-week plan to put yourself on the path to personal transformation. Four weeks into Month One of the amazing program, we’re guessing you’ve already enjoyed some notable progress: stronger arms, tighter legs, better endurance. Let’s see what else your body can do. Welcome to Month Two of your 12-week personal renovation. During this second month, we’re introducing you to one of the simplest yet greatest fitness inventions of all time: the resistance band. Month Three In just eight weeks, you’ve made significant progress. Month One was the instrumental tune-up, using your body weight as resistance. Month Two added the melody in the form of resistance bands and plyo. Now, it’s time to end on a high note. This month, you’ll challenge yourself head to toe with a mix of dumbbell-based exercises and high-intensity cardio. We’ve selected dumbbells as our tools of choice because they provide tons of tactical advantages: 1. Balance 2. Creativity 3. Stability 4. Range of motion 5. Convenience “HIIT” it! Exercisers often fall into bad habits when doing cardio – think trudging it out on the treadmill for an hour, day after day, at the same speed. There is a better option. High-intensity interval training, or “HIIT” for short provides exactly what you need to hit your fitness goals: fat burning that lasts all day long. HIIT involves intervals of high-intensity exercise, such as running at 90 percent of your maximum heart rate, followed by intervals of low-intensity recovery. Scientific studies reveal that there is an increase in your excess post-exercise oxygen consumption, or “EPOC” for short, following a HIIT session. What does that mean in plain English? Basically, that your body continuously burns calories and fat at an elevated rate long after you’ve stepped off the treadmill. Also, because a HIIT session is so intense, the time you save is invaluable over the course of a training cycle. One study conducted by scientists at the University of Western Ontario drives home the value of HIIT. They found that subjects who performed four to six 30-second sprints three times per week burned more than twice as much fat as those who jogged for 30 to 60 minutes at a steady pace. That’s an incredible difference, and one that we want to put to immediate use. In this program, we suggest that you do your cardio after weight training, as research has shown that your results may be hindered if you precede strength training with intense cardio, but not vice versa.

With this convenient remote app gone are the days of multi-tasking electronic gadgets with your hearing instruments. When used in combination with the Siemens miniTek, the Remote App easily and seamlessly allows you to control your hearing instruments and how they interact with all of your favorite electronic devices right from your smartphone. Whether it is watching TV, listening to your favorite song, or talking to a friend on your mobile phone – control is right at your finger tips. Note: Siemens miniTek is required in order to utilize this app. Compatible with Android versions 2.3 and higher Why use the miniTek remote app: REMOTE CONTROL: With the app all of the functions available to you on the Siemens miniTek can now be controlled directly on your mobile phone. NO MORE JUGGLING: Who wants to juggle multiple electronic devices? With the app you can easily switch between taking a call, listening to your MP3 player, watching television, or simply enjoying your surroundings all from the convenience of your mobile phone. VISUALIZE YOUR WORLD: Using the screen of your mobile phone the app creates a visual display of your hearing instrument’s status. You can easily see which memory program you have selected with one quick glance at your phone. DIRECT ACCESS: With the app users can directly switch between memory programs. The memory display on your phone allows you to directly select the desired memory program, no more cycling through the programs to find the one you want. So if you are taking a walk and want to listen to music one touch is all it takes to jump to your desired program. EASE OF USE: The app is great for people who have dexterity issues. Small buttons inherent in today’s tiny electronic devices can be a challenge for those of us with poor eye sight or who have trouble manipulating small things. Nice large buttons on your phone’s display make operating your hearing instruments and electronic devices a breeze. DISCRETION: For the self-conscious users the app allows for discreet control of your hearing instruments. Some users don’t want others to know they use hearing instruments and the app provides an extra layer of discretion. IT’S FREE: No further explanation needed!!! Sivantos GmbH is a trademark licensee of Siemens AG Sivantos GmbH, Henri-Dunant-Strasse 100, 91058 Erlangen, Germany

description: Hello Dialer is the Mobile Dialer that allows to make VoIP calls from any of the android devices and it uses 3G/Edge/Wi-Fi Internet connectivity. It is developed based on the requirements of VoIP Providers business needs. Hello Dialer Features:- It uses SIP protocol based for signaling Supports G729, PCMU, and PCMA codecs Runs behind NAT or Private IP User Friendly Interface Auto Sync of Balance Real Time Sip status messages Call History Address book integration Compatible with all sip standard switches Hello Dialer has very efficient implementation of jitter buffer to play voice smoothly. Silent suppression and comfort noise generation has been used to reduce the bandwidth usage, and this makes the dialer more efficient in making VoIP calls. It easily integrates with mobile phonebook and auto detects (+) sign when contact is picked from phonebook.”
