description: Let your smartphone more comfortable! This application is a simple, high functionality, secure and comfortable password manager. In addition, you can also use as a tool to manage boilerplate. Corresponding to the backup of the data to the SD card, of course, also supports data backup to online storage integrated with Google Drive ™ , Dropbox, Box . https://www.dropbox.com/ https://drive.google.com/ https://www.box.com/ **** Supported Languages **** Icelandic, Gaeilge, Azərbaycan, Afrikaans, العربية shqiptar, հայերեն, italiano, ייִדיש, Indonesia, Nederlands español, ภาษาไทย, Tagalog, Deutsch, Türk, हिंदी, suomalainen français, português, русский, English, 한국어, 中文(简体), 中文(繁體), 日本語 Please let me know If there is a mistake in the translation. **** Main Features **** - Intuitive user interface that can be operated intuitively - Automatic input to your browser. - You can sort the list freely by drag and drop. - Categorization feature is useful to organize the password list. - Supports three or more input fields ! - Retrieve the input form of the web page from URL - You can lock the app by the protection key. - Data is immediately encrypted by AES-256bit algorithm. - The ability to copy data to the clipboard that can be launched from the status bar. - Collaboration with "Mushroom" - Supports the backup to SD cards, Google Drive, and Dropbox - Supports the restoration from SD cards, Google Drive, and Dropbox * 1: Only input items that has been retrieved from the URL, and is in the top page. * 2: This function can also be started from the "Share page" in your browser. * 3: Caution: If you forget a protection key, the data can never be restored. * 4: The data that has been copied to clipboard is cleared after 30 seconds. You can open a web page from a URL with any browser ! However, the automatic input function will not work at some browser. **** The Difference from the Free Version **** - The categorization features is enable in the paid version. - There are no ads in the paid version. **** Permissions **** - FULL NETWORK ACCESS This will be used only to display ads, and to retrieve the input form of the web page and. - MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR USB STORAGE MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR SD CARD This is necessary for the function of backup. - DRAW OVER OTHER APPS This is necessary for display a dialog overlay. - RUN AT STARTUP This is necessary to reside in the application status bar.

TriMet transit+ is an ad-free version of TriMet transit with a few additional features. TriMet transit allows riders to take advantage of the the API for tracking TriMet buses in the Portland area. TriMet transit also includes the ability to download route schedules. TriMet transit allows you to define alerts for TriMet routes and stops; get a notification when a vehicle on a specific route is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. Please send me an email if you find a problem or if you have any comments or suggestions. TRACKING - Put in one or more route numbers, separated by spaces or commas, and see all buses on those routes or put in an individual bus number (printed on the side of TriMet buses). ROUTE SCHEDULES - You can request a route schedule for any TriMet route by entering its number. Schedules can be viewed as origin/destination tables or on a map. On the map, see when the next bus is scheduled to arrive by tapping on a stop. See all times for that stop by tapping on the info window that appears. CLOSE STOPS - Select your current location or an address you enter or select on a map as a search location for TriMet stops that are nearby. You can specify a maximum number of stops to return as well as an optional route filter. ALERTS - You can define alerts for when a TriMet vehicle is approaching or arriving at a particular stop. These alerts are based on distance from the stop, using the shape of the route defined by TriMet. - Because these alerts depend on the vehicle following the shape defineUd by TriMet, if the vehicle is on detour, or if the vehicle isn't following the defined route for some other reason, your alert may not trigger as expected. DIRECTIONS - Choose an origin, a destination, and the time you would like to either depart or arrive, and the Google Maps app will display the different options available using TriMet's buses and trains. TWITTER - TriMet transit displays the latest updates from @TriMet. Other features: - Choose a light or dark theme. - Show satellite imagery and/or color-coded traffic data on the map. - Optionally keep the map screen from dimming and shutting off. - Adjust the update interval of TriMet vehicle locations. - Choose a custom ringtone for TriMet alerts. - Add track and route widgets and shortcuts to your home screen to go straight to the map or schedule you want. This is not an official TriMet app; I am not affiliated with TriMet in any way.

description: Make offers on farm equipment, fine art, motor vehicles, classic cars and more with KY Auctions, the premier auction app that connects you to auction sales and auctioneers throughout the entire state of Kentucky! Auctions for real estate, storage, land, paintings, homes for sale, collectables and more are available through this easy to use sales finder. If there’s an auction in Kentucky, you’ll find it with KY Auctions! KY Auctions is a leading bidding app that allows you to connect to auctioneers and collectors and make bids online, straight from your phone! Our app lets you search the entire state of Kentucky for a sale with a press of a finger. Auction time is all the time! Make offers in the bidding app for live auctions. • Auction access, instantly. Bid on an auction item right from your phone! • Auction notifications keep you up to date. • Online auctions available for farm equipment, motor vehicles, property and more. Once you find what you like you can start bidding from there. • Buying, selling and trading are easy when you can do it in person or online! Collect antiques and more – It’s easy to find antiques for sale! • Antiques and collectables can be found around your location through live auction map. • Auctioneers and auction types can be tracked via your favorites list to keep track of what you’re looking for. Make offers in live auctions today! • Auctions wherever you are. With the live auction map, you can find an auction nearby. • Get auction times to plan your schedule. Be notified when and where your chosen auction will be held. - View photos of what you’re leaving offers for. Auction access to 20+ categories! Make offers on anything! - Online Auctions - Real Estate - Estate Auction - Personal Property - Motor vehicles - Classic cars - Homes for sale - Land for sale - Car buying - Farms - Antiques and Collectables - Livestock - Produce - Farm Equipment - Paintings and fine art - Knives - Guns - Coins - School District Surplus - Classic books - Government Surplus - Foreclosures - Bankruptcy - Chancery Court Auctions - Benefit Auction Estate sales finder helps you find your ideal estate! • Property finder – KY Auctions offers an estate sales finder to help you find where the nearest estate is located. • Estate for sale is one of many specific categories that KY Auctions offers in their auction categories lists. • Auction times listed! You can view the date and time when the auction is taking place! • Maps and driving directions for when you want to check out the location yourself. KY Auctions upholds a standard of authenticity and legitimacy. Auctions on KY Auctions are run by licensed and trained auctioneers who review merchandise from collectors for you at their designated auction sites, so you know you’ll be buying, selling and trading the real deal. Auctioneers offer assurance that others don’t. • Buying feels secure when each item is personally authenticated to be legitimate and fairly priced. From classic cars to farm equipment, our auctioneers know how to fairly price what they’re selling • Auctioneers available at the tap of a finger. Contact any of our hundreds of professionally licensed auctioneers if you have questions or concerns. • KY Auctions is one of the best buying and selling tools in the auction and sales industry! KY Auctions makes it easy to search all of Kentucky for the best purchases. With all of our categories and our network of the most qualified auctioneers in the business, you can find everything you need and feel confident about making offers. Download KY Auctions and start bidding on real estates, collectables, motor vehicles and more today! For questions or comments about the sale and auction finding app KY Auctions, contact us at: support@auctionlook.com For more information about our app or to find auctions across the country, visit our website at: www.auctionlook.com

Goat Runner Infinite is an infinite runner starring a goat! The game is simple... Run as far as you can to try and beat your own high score. You can also compete against all other players around the world by trying to become the top ranked player in the in-game leaderboard! Access the leaderboard by simply using the Google+ account already linked to your phone. To play: -Tilt your phone or device left or right to move left / right -Swipe up to jump -Swipe down to slide under obstacles -Don't let the evil red goat chase you down! There are power speed, shield, and double coin power ups to help you along your way. Your coin total will be added to your distance total at the end of the game to calculate your score. Your high score automatically saves so you can always come back to try and beat your own high score or improve your position on the leaderboard. Watch out for all of the incoming obstacles in Goat Runner Infinite!

description: Was macht ein Hotel erfolgreich? Welches Produkt verlangt der Markt? Wie erreiche ich meine Kunden? Mit diesen Fragen muss sich der Spieler in Hotel Manager II herumschlagen: es gilt den Markt genau zu analysieren, den richtigen Preis zu finden, sorgfältig zu kalkulieren - kurzum erfolgreich zu managen. In Hotel Manager II hat der Spieler nicht nur die Möglichkeit verschiedene Szenarien zu spielen, sondern auch diese zu kreieren. Jedes Szenario konfrontiert den Spieler mit neuen Gästegruppen und veränderten Rahmenbedingungen. What makes a hotel successful? Which product the market wants? How do I reach my customers? With these questions, the player manager II must grapple in the hotel: it is necessary to analyze the market carefully to find the right price to carefully calculate - in short, to manage successfully. In Hotel Manager II, the player has the opportunity not only to play different scenarios, but also to create them. Each scenario confronts the player with new guest groups and changing conditions.
release_text: Several bugs fixed. Customers can now be adressed through different channels (sales-menu). Different prices can be applied to consumer groups (logis-menu).

Thank you. The app was incorrectly asking for Superuser access because of the ads we were running. It was performing a check to see if the device was rooted, but in a way that was triggering the superuser dialog. We apologize for this. The latest version has this fixed, we were not trying to do anything malicious with your device. Thanks.

description: A unique physics-based game like no other! Use the environment and quick timing to help save the chickens and liberate their nest of the evil monkeys. Chicken Story 2 features new gameplay mechanics, all new graphics, and hundreds of hours worth of user generated content. • 125 unique and challenging levels to introduce you to the game. • Unlimited replayability, with thousands of user-created levels. • Health Pack Network with cross-platform achievments and medals. • Localization in 10 different languages including English, Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish
release_text: Version 2.0.6: - 75 new levels (125 total) - Fixed a number of crashes with newer devices - Removed support for very old devices - Removed VIP in-app purchase - Fixed pink backgrounds on a few devices including Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 Version 1.0.7: - 25 New levels - Removed unnecessary phone permissions requirements (gps)

description: This "Maths for Kids" or "Kids Maths" or "Junior Maths" mobile application was conceptualized and designed after long and extensive analysis of kid’s learning behavior and progression pattern. It is always a difficult task to provide the fundamental concepts of mathematics to little kids in such a way that they can visualize and relate it to the real world. On the other hand, kids learn very fast and they have a steep learning curve. In this period they should be taught step by step and they should be exposed gradually from simple to complex mathematics concept. This app provide the platform to kids to learn basic mathematics. This is helpful for a kindergarten, grade 1 and grade 2 kids. It includes different tools like 1) Learn Numbers 2) Learn Counting 3) Backward Counting 4) What comes after, what comes before and between concept 5) Familiarization of Mathematics Signs like greater than, less than and equal 6) Learn Addition 7) Learn Subtraction 8) Simple Solution 9) Descriptive Problems (Addition and Subtraction) 10) Table of Addition 11) Table of Subtraction This app will be useful for kindergarten to grade 2 or 3 kids. Key Words: ------------------ Key Word: Kids Maths, Kids Mathematics, Maths for Kids, Teach Mathematics, Junior Maths, Teach Maths, Maths Quiz, Kindergarten Maths, grade 1 maths, grade 2 maths, Kindergarten Mathematics

If you are looking for information about the United States of America starting from US History, general knowledge on US, USA Presidents, detail about 50 States of the United States, States Capital, States Moto and many more then this is the application where you will get all. This information is provided in quiz format. You have the option of selection for any and all sections. You can bookmark your favorite question, you can always revisit your last quiz sessions. By playing quiz like a game you will gain the important information about the glorious USA.Have fun. This is the 4th app of my dream series. Hope you will like it.
Count your beers/shots and see your beer/shots stats. It works offline.
release_text: Version 1.0.7: App can be now only in portrait mode. Removed transitions between app screens. Upgraded code, so vibration notification should work on newer devices. Version 1.0.6: Added wine counter Version 1.0.5: Repaired bug when you added new drink after midnight and graph showed count of drinks from previous day.

description: HSC Biology is an application which gives you quick and efficient access to the entire HSC Biology Syllabus content from the HSC Online website. It contains the dot points of every single core topic, as well as the options! All dot points are answered and all information is accurate and valid, directly from HSC Online (hsc.csu.edu.au) itself. This app is for students in Year 12 studying Biology as a part of their HSC subjects. Key Features: - Structured syllabus outcomes - Content directly from HSC Online (hsc.csu.edu.au) - Covers entire HSC Biology + Options - Easy to read, mobile interface - Slick GUI with appealing colours - Free with no ads
release_text: Update: 2/2/13 Fixes: jQuery Style Sheet Referenced locally - Complete styling do-over for phones that couldn't connect to the internet Fixes: No more crashes Fixes: All images are now referenced locally Fixes: Splash screen makeover and timeout increased

description: Hello HSK is a product researched and developed by the HSChinese team to specially provide training for Chinese learning and Chinese proficiency test. Hello HSK includes levels 1 through 6 and provides website, APP and offline teaching materials. [Honors] ●Since its launch in 2014, Hello HSK has been on the outstanding new APP board several times, and the number of registered learners throughout the globe has reached hundreds of thousands of people within one year. [Instruction for APP functions] ●Hello HSK 4 provides HSK Chinese vocabulary, listening, reading, practice and mock HSK tests to help learners pass the level 4 Chinese test; it is a good helper for foreigners learning Chinese. ●Hello HSK provides not only the Chinese teaching materials for learners, but also the function of consulting Chinese teachers at any time in APP; so it is convenient for students to ask teachers for help and essay correction. ●Hello HSK utilizes a speech forum. Therefore, the Chinese learners can practice for the oral Chinese test (HSKK); practice pronunciation and consult teachers at any time in the forum. ●Hello HSK also provides Chinese teaching materials and after-class exercises for teachers. [Instruction for Course Content] ●Chinese HSK listening course: It is classified into 8 categories and 42 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 865 outline words and 704 phrases, 636 listening exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. ● Chinese HSK reading course: It is classified into three question types and 18 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 229 outline words and 45 phrases, 425 reading exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. ● Chinese HSK writing course: It is classified into 2 question types and 26 types of topics according to HSK testing questions and common Chinese topics, including 892 outline words and 9 core sentence patterns, 1272 writing exercises, mock HSK tests and detailed answer analysis. [R & D Team] The HSChinese team devotes itself to establishing practical and useful online and offline products and services for global Chinese learners. In addition to the Hello HSK Chinese test series, HSChinese also provides: ●“Hello Daily”, a product that assists Chinese learners to systematically go from zero to intermediate, and advanced levels ●“Yep! Chinese”, a product that breaks traditional learning models and allows for fragmentized and interesting Chinese learning ●“Chinese Sound”, the product that focuses on correcting Chinese pronunciation ●“Hello Words”, focusing on Chinese vocabulary learning ●“西游汉语乐园”, “Pop Chinese”, game products for Chinese learning For more free learning and teaching materials provided by HSChinese, please visit us at: www.hschinese.com. Where there is Internet, there is HSChinese. [Contact Information] HSChinese Hotline: 400-821-7565 HSChinese Email: service@hschinese.com Address of Shanghai headquarters: Room 205, No. 22 Boxia Road, Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park, Shanghai. Public account of HSChinese: WeChat-HSChinese Website: www.hschinese.com Key words: HSK 4，dictionary，exam, mock test, Chinese learning, mandarin, hanyu, words, vocabulary, listening, reading, writing, HSChinese, Shanghai Hansheng Info-Tech Co.,Ltd.

韓語單詞天天記是Android下的韓語/韓文單詞記憶軟件。 韓語/韓文單詞發持，需要網絡接入。 可以將單詞添加到我的收藏夾，以進強化記憶。 提供的詞庫包括 1.韓國語能力考試TOPIK初級 2.韓國語能力考試TOPIK中級 3.韓國語能力考試TOPIK高級 =========================== 3.0版本更新更換了新的詞庫，更新的時候請註意。 - 新的用戶界面 - 應用提供了離線發音庫，大部分單詞無須聯網即可發音（部分單詞還是需要網絡，發音非真人發音，如果有錯誤，敬請諒解） - 單詞查詢功能 Korean word every note is Korean / Korean word memory software under Android. Korean / Korean word hair hold, you need network access. You can add words to my favorites to progress to strengthen memory. Thesaurus include 1 junior TOPIK Korean Language Proficiency Test 2 Intermediate TOPIK Korean Language Proficiency Test 3 Senior TOPIK Korean Language Proficiency Test =========================== Version 3.0 update to replace a new thesaurus, please note the updated time. - New User Interface - Application provides offline pronunciation library without networking to pronounce most of the words (some words still need to network, non-human voice pronunciation, if there is an error, please forgive me) - Word search function

description: Lines 98 Deluxe is an fun game for killing time. It is easy to play but really challenge to master. You have to move same color ball to make horiontal, vertical, cross up or cross down line to make point. The more ball in the same line the more points you get. ------ Lines 98 là một trò chơi đơn giản dựa trên bản Lines 98 cũ trên PC. Luật chơi đơn giản, xếp các loại bóng cùng màu trên một hàng (ngang, dọc, chéo) để ăn điểm. Điểm càng cao nếu bạn ăn combo được càng nhiều hàng. Số điểm combo có thể lên tới hàng nghìn. Game có chức năng tự động lưu lại quá trình chơi.
release_text: Add more options and fix some bugs.

description: Child Desktop is a tool designed to prevent harmful material that your child may be exposed to while online. Secluding age inappropriate content, Child Desktop will help you protect your little one. Built to give you the right tools to protect your child’s online internet activity, Child Desktop is the best way you can control the digital content your children is exposed to daily. Child Desktop is efficient and easy to use. Built in features that disable/ diverts certain incoming calls/ text messages/ chain letters and customizable options that allow you to carefully select online trustworthy sources. Child Desktop is the app you need to have in order to provide full comfort and security while online, for your child.

Expecting important emails? Stop wasting time checking your emails every 5 minutes. Setup multiple email alerts to get push notifications for important messages without having to constantly keep an eye on your email accounts. Monitor Alert it's an application that can be used to MONITOR different services based on user predefined rules. For example an user receives emails which contain important information such as: - service down - nagios alerts - email from a bank - email from girlfriend - user defined scripts which can monitor business important metrics - zoneminder new events This app can be used to read this email or URL links and based on user defined filters will PUSH a notification to your mobile device. The application needs internet access and should not be used as a sole application monitor. Free version featurs: - 1 server with 1 mail alert - 1 server with 1 URL alert Pro version features:: - unlimited servers - unlimited alerts - no ads
release_text: 1.3.1 - libs upgrade - bug fixes 1.3.0 - added Cloud Monitoring, now you can move your alarms in cloud and you will receive push notification on your device.

description: mPower is an application specially created to be used with the Ubiquiti MFI MPower products ( http://www.ubnt.com/mfi#m-Power ). Application automatically connects to your mpower devices and collects the needed information. From within the application you can: - visualize the power consumption on all connected outlets - start/stop an outlet - tag outlet name - save configuration - schedulers
release_text: 1.2.1 - changed ads libs - bug fixes 1.2.0 - added fast ON option, now you can start/stop the outlets automatically after any predefined time. This way you don't have to remember in X minutes that you need to switch on/off your outlet 1.1.0 - added scheduler option, you now able to create timers and start your devices at certain times

Humanoid est une galaxie de médias dédiés aux nouvelles technologies mobiles. Sur cette application vous pourrez retrouver l’ensemble des sites du réseau : FrAndroid, FraWin ou encore iAddict . Tous trois membres du réseau Humanoid, ces sites d’actualités spécialisés dans les domaines touchant à la mobilité traitent à la fois du monde d’Android (notamment sur FrAndroid), des iPhone & iPad (iAddict) sous Android, iOS ou Windows, tandis que FraWin se concentre sur l’univers de Microsoft, qu’il s’agisse de Windows Phone, de Windows ou des consoles Xbox. L’actualité high-tech n’est pas sans créer son lot de surprises au quotidien : suivez l’essentiel de l’information liée aux domaines qui vous passionnent, et bien plus encore ! Au programme, un flux RSS d’actualité en continu, mais aussi des tests complets réalisés par des spécialistes dans chaque domaine, des éditos, des interviews auprès des différentes marques et opérateurs, des reportages, et bien sûr des prises en main lors des principaux salons consacrés aux nouvelles technologies. L’actualité de vos opérateurs, Orange, SFR, Bouygues Telecom, Free Mobile et des MVNO, mais aussi celles de vos marques favorites, des principaux smartphones du moment (HTC One, Samsung Galaxy S4 et bien d’autres) sont au rendez-vous. Avis aux gamers : les jeux vidéo mobiles ne sont pas oubliés, et bien d’autres surprises vous attendent... Les sites du réseau Humanoid sont participatifs : tous les articles publiés sont ouverts aux commentaires, une large communauté autorisant de riches échanges entre les mobinautes. Lisez-nous, parlez-nous : Humanoid est une galaxie de passionnés dont vous faites également partie ! N’oubliez pas qu’Humanoid est présent sur les réseaux sociaux (Facebook, Twitter, Google+) par le biais de chacun de ses sites. N’hésitez pas à nous suivre ! Fonctionnalités : - Lecture des articles des différents sites de la galaxie Humanoid (FrAndroid, Frawin et iAddict) - Les crossposts s’ouvriront en un clin d’oeil, plus de prise de tête - Accès aux articles complets optimisés pour un affichage sur smartphone et tablette - Voir et répondre aux commentaires en un clin d’oeil - Ouvrir les liens des sites (frandroid.com, iaddict.com...) directement dans l’application - Affichage des dossiers de manière optimisée (table des matières, ergonomie...) - Possibilité de zoomer sur les images - Souvent oubliées, les tablettes ne seront pas laissées sur le côté de 7 à 10 pouces. - Des surprises pour les semaines à venir, car nous aimons vous étonner ! Permissions : - Accès à Internet - Etat du réseau (pour savoir si le WiFi, la 3G sont activées) - Ecriture/lecture sur la mémoire (pour stocker les images temporaires...) Humanoid is a galaxy of new mobile technologies dedicated to media. On this application you can find all the network sites: FrAndroid, FraWin or iAddict . All three members of Humanoid network, these news sites specialize in areas related to mobility deal with both the world of Android (including FrAndroid), iPhone & iPad (iAddict) Android, iOS or Windows, while FraWin that focuses on the world of Microsoft, whether it's Windows Phone, Windows or Xbox. The high-tech news is not without creating a lot of surprises in everyday life: follow the essential information related to the areas you care about, and much more! Program, a RSS news continuously, but also complete testing by specialists in each field, editorials, interviews with different brands and operators, reports, and of course taken in hand at major exhibitions devoted to new technologies. The news of your operators, Orange, SFR, Bouygues Telecom, Free Mobile and MVNO, but also those of your favorite brands, leading smartphones of the moment (HTC One, Samsung Galaxy S4 and many others) are waiting you. Notice to gamers: mobile video games are not forgotten, and many other surprises await you ... Humanoid network sites are participatory All articles are open to feedback, allowing a wide community of rich exchanges between mobile users. Read us, tell us: Humanoid is a galaxy of passionate you are also part! Remember qu'Humanoid is present on social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google+) through each of its sites. Feel free to follow us! Features: - Read articles from different sites of the galaxy Humanoid (FrAndroid, Frawin and iAddict) - The crossposts will open in a wink, more than headlock - Access to full-text articles optimized for display on smartphone and tablet - View and respond to comments in a wink - Open links sites (frandroid.com, iaddict.com ...) directly in the application - Viewing files optimized manner (table of contents, ergonomics ...) - Ability to zoom in on image - Often forgotten, tablets will not be left on the side of 7 to 10 inches. - Surprises for the coming weeks, as we like to surprise you! permissions: - Access to Internet - Network Status (whether WiFi, 3G enabled) - Read / write to memory (for storing temporary images ...)

description: HuntStand Lite, provided to you for free, is a must-have tool for hunting and land management. HuntStand was carefully designed to work in both online and offline environments. Using this app you will have access to offline weather and maps of your hunt areas. Our app's interface is simple, yet powerful, and puts many useful tools right at your fingertips. Create an account and gain the ability to sync Hunting Area maps with HuntStand.com, view and edit maps using advanced on-line mapping features, share maps with friends, and sync maps with other devices. HuntStand features our revolutionary patent pending HuntZone technology. The HuntZone scent tool shows wind speed, direction, distance, and time in the most streamlined and efficient way possible. You can “slide” through wind forecasts and view the effects on your desired hunting area. The HuntZone tracks where your scent will be both at specific time and throughout your hunt, allowing you to plan accordingly. Fully map your property using 43 easily discernible custom icons including game sightings, scouting marks, stands, as well as numerous important objects of interest. Attach notes to your icons and sort them by time and type. Be aware of distances and area measurements using our advanced measurement tools. Our app will give you extremely accurate map-based distances in feet, meters, and yards and area measurements in acres. Have access to highly detailed weather and solunar information including a current weather page, (with useful charts) a 72 hour forecast, and a 5 day outlook. Customize various features on the app's Settings page and read useful tips and hints on how to use the app offline and how to maximize your time in the field. HuntStand, powered by TerraStride, will revolutionize the way people hunt and operate in the outdoors.
release_text: Create an account and gain the ability to sync Hunting Area maps with HuntStand.com, view and edit maps using advanced on-line mapping features, share maps with friends, and sync maps with other devices. Changes in version 2.92: Minor bug fixes

description: “减肥健身好指南，跑步训练好帮手”。风格最小清新的跑步软件就在这里！ 虎扑跑步，同万千跑者共同追求时尚健康运动！ 用虎扑跑步，您可以精确记录每次跑步的数据（时间、距离、卡路里），秒速打开、即时定位，无需等待让你随时随地畅快跑步！ 主要功能 - 单次跑步目标设置，实时查询完成进度 - 真人语音播报提醒，边跑边有妹子给你加油 - 离线地图下载，增加跑步路线起终点标识 - 有问题来「跑步有道」，装备训练比赛信息一网打尽 - PM2.5和天气实时查询，带给你贴心的运动建议 - 实时配速表，记录跑步过程配速变化 - 微信，QQ，人人帐号多个平台登录 - 拍照记录沿途风景，一键分享更方便
release_text: V2.4.1更新说明 1、首度采用下沉式通知栏，精彩内容不再错过！ 2、添加消息功能，好友聊天，想聊就聊！ 3、新增推送功能，回复点赞，随时查看！ 4、添加收藏功能，喜欢什么都统统存起来！ 5、卡路里计算方法修改，获得更加准确的减肥数据！ 6、优化群组功能，让你能更好的管理自己的跑步群； 7、修复部分GPS无法打点的问题，让你跑的更顺畅。 联系我们：微信帐号：puniu20140522；QQ群：78845982。

GarminHUD Korea app은 스마트폰 Bluetooth 기능을 통하여 GarminHUD와 T-map, Olleh-navi를 연동하는 서비스 프로그램입니다. HUD는 운전자의 진행방향 시야에 네비게이션 정보를 알려줌으써 기존 네비게이션 정보를 보기 위해 시선을 진행방향에서 이탈해 발생할 수 있는 사고를 방지하여 안전한 운전을 가능하게 해줍니다. HUD란 Head Up Display의 약자로 자동차 전면 유리에 투명필름이나 장비에 반사렌즈를 설치하여 네비게이션 정보를 보는 방식으로 미국에 본사를 둔 GPS/네비게이션 분야 1위, 글로벌 기업인 GARMIN에서 만든 제품입니다. 현재 국내 헤드업디스플레이는 일부 고급 차량의 옵션으로만 제공 되어왔지만 GARMIN의 HUD는 고품질에 합리적인 가격으로 어떠한 차량에도 장착이 가능한 에프터마켓 액세서리로 사용이 가능한 제품입니다. ※ 어플 장점 및 기능 ※ - GarminHUD는 기존 속도등 단순한 정보만 보여주던 기존 휴대용 HUD보다 많은 네비게이션 세부정보를 제공합니다. 대략적인 도착시간 뿐만 아니라, 다음 턴 방향을 나타내는 화살표, 다음 턴까지 거리 및 현재속도 정보를 운전자의 시야안에서 보여줍니다. - 속도제한 구간에서 속도 제한 주의 표시와, 안전 카메라 위치 근방에서는 경고 표시는 보여줍니다. - 통화중에도 네비정보 표시가 가능하며 메시지 및 전화 카카오 수신시 M, C, K 등으로 표시해 운전자에게 알려줍니다. - 눈의 피로를 최소화 한 은은한 녹색의 디스플레이 장치는 자동적으로 밝기를 조절해 주어 직사광선이나 야간운전시에도 선명한 네비게이션 정보를 보여줍니다. ※ 참고 ※ - 현재 안드로이드 기반의 스마트폰을 지원하고 있습니다. - 지속적인 업데이트를 통하여 좀 더 편리하고 쾌적한 운전환경을 만들겠습니다. ※ 고객문의 ※ - (주) 한스비전 - E-MAIL: master@hvision.net - TEL: 1600-2653 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 서울시 구로구 구로동 235번지 한신IT타워 1101호 02-2108-8123 T map *** This version is version 4.3.2 or later to normal operation.      Low if the installed version of the T map T map to the latest version (4.3.2 or later), or Garmin HUD Korea v1.0 upgrade by installing the app, please. description: Road Trip Planner aims to provide the user unique features that current map / direction applications lack. By providing the user with the ability to plan ahead and set different pit stops between their set origin and destination, this is one of the many reason how Road Trip Planner stands out from the rest. These pit stops include food, gas stations, lodging options, and many attractions. Road Trip Planner also takes into account your vehicle information to provide you with specific gas station results and how much money you will spend on gas during your trip. This is calculated by using your specific vehicle's city and highway miles per gallon. It also helps the average person to be more aware of their carbon footprint by tracking the CO2 emissions outputted by their vehicle over the course of their trip. Key features: • Trip information: Total Cost Of Gas, Total C02 Output, Total Miles (City / Highway) and more. • Adding points of interests to your route that will be labeled with a specific marker on the map. • Marker, when tapped, will give you the option to call and visit the website along with displaying other information. • Turn by turn direction list. • List of points of interests that were added to your route.
release_text: Republished app due to technical issues. Sorry for the inconvenience! Update 1.0.3 • General bug fixes Update 1.0.1 - 1.0.2 • Road Trip Planner now available to tablets • Fixed bug associated with loading saved trips

El Recetario una aplicación desarrollada por voluntarios de IBM Argentina, en el marco del programa On Demand Community de Ciudadanía Corporativa. Esta aplicación desarrollada para ASDRA (Asociación Síndrome de Down de la República Argentina) busca desarrollar capacidades cognitivas mediante la enseñanza y preparación de productos de panadería y pastelería, siguiendo recetas en forma guiada. La aplicación cuenta con escenarios dibujados a mano por el equipo de voluntarios, coloreados dándole un toque artístico e interdisciplinario al proyecto. The Cookbook an application developed by volunteers from IBM Argentina, in the framework of the On Demand Community Corporate Citizenship. This application developed for ASDRA (Down Syndrome Association of Argentina) seeks to develop cognitive skills through education and preparation of bakery products, following recipes in a guided manner. The application features hand-drawn scenarios by the team of volunteers, giving colored and interdisciplinary artistic flair to the project.

description: IBM Mobile Systems Remote (IBM Remote) is an application that allows system administrators to monitor and manage IBM BladeCenters along with their installed blades and components, System x rack mounted systems, or zEnterprise ensembles and CPCs. Machines can be added to a list kept on the mobile device simply by specifying the hostname of the management module along with the user credentials (userid and password). Once this information is entered, the app will connect to those systems and provide an intuitive, drill-down user interface used to monitor their health and configuration. The app can also be used to perform some management functions such as: Powering systems on/off Clearing the event logs Changing ownership of the KVM or Media Tray Toggling the system locator lights Mobile security is a primary concern with business applications. All machine credentials are kept in a secur data store. The app also requires the user to specify an application password on startup. This password is used to avoid unintended access to your machines and as a confirmation step for any significant action that will alter your machines. This app was developed by IBM Research as an exploration vehicle for using mobile devices to manage IBM servers. Please provide feedback on our website or via email, so we can continue to adapt this app to better meet your needs. See http://www.ibmremote.com for a walk-through description of the different views and features.
release_text: new in Version 1.2: * Support for IBM System z * Creation and scanning of QR codes that identify a machine/view to be displayed * Swipe-based navigation

description: Esta aplicación presenta los medicamentos genéricos más utilizados actualmente en medicina. Incluye información del grupo farmacéutico al que pertenecen, sus indicaciones terapéuticas y equivalencias en especialidad farmacéutica. Se puede filtrar por grupo farmacéutico y buscar por nombre del medicamento genérico. En caso de duda, es importante consultar con su farmacéutico. genericum es una app de Llar i Salut. This application presents the generic drugs used in medicine today. Includes information pharmaceutical group they belong to, their therapeutic indications and specialty pharmaceutical equivalents. You can filter by pharmaceutical group and search for generic drug name. If in doubt, it is important to consult your pharmacist. genericum Llar is an app i Salut.

Productivity is an app, based on the activity based costing method, to estimate customer – product profitability taking into account direct and indirect costs, variable and fixed. With this tool you can also know cost per unit of each cost driver and cost of excess of capacity. Available in main currencies.

Do you always take your medicine as scheduled? Sometimes, people on a medical treatment do not take one of the doses, either because they just forget or because they feel better and simply decide to stop taking it without seeing their doctor first. The MedsOnTime mobile app has been designed to improve user quality of life by providing them with a platform that sends out warnings and monitors the intake of medicines. This platform contributes to the safety and the efficiency of treatments by sending out graphical, flexible and user-friendly messages to iPhone or iPad devices. MedsOnTime can manage up to three profiles at the same time and is intended for anyone on any kind of medical treatment, or for caregivers of elderly, young or sick people. Thousands of people all over the world are already making the most of MedsOnTime monitoring. MedsOnTime® by Medicactive. The information contained on this website is not medical advice. See your doctor about diagnosis and treatment.

description: Aplicación de Incidencias Nunca la comunicación con su Administrador había sido tan fácil y directa. En cualquier lugar o momento podrá dar de alta una incidencia, desde su smartphone, consiguiendo una mayor celeridad a la hora de su resolución. Una vez introducidos los datos la primera vez, podrá comunicar cuantas incidencias surjan en su Comunidad de un manera ágil y sencilla. También, si lo desea puede llamarnos con 2 pulsaciones y comunicar una emergencia a la Generalitat, si se encuentra en necesidad de ello, usted o un familiar. App exclusiva para clientes y sus familias, propietarios en una finca administrada por Olivares. Implementation Issues   Never communicating with your manager been so easy and straightforward. In any place or time you can enlist an incident from your smartphone, achieving greater speed when it comes to its resolution.   Once the data is entered the first time, communicate any incidents arising in Your Community a quick and easy way.   Also, if you want you can call us with 2 taps and report an emergency to the Government, if you are in need of it, you or a family.   App exclusively for clients and their families, owners of a farm run by Olivares.

Use your device as media server with the UPnP Server. Set the UPnP Server Pro to start when you get connected to a specified WIFI network and start enjoying all the media from your device on the television or other UPnP enabled device! Specify what folder should be public for UPnP clients and more! ★This product works with DLNA devices!★ Note. If you find a bug or have a problem please contact us by email since we cannot help you if you post it in the reviews. But we haven’t mentioned all features yet; you can even set a dynamic DNS updater! So you can always access your device from everywhere, even if the IP changed! It also has extensive logging functionality, and you can even set the app to email you the log automatically! Features summary: - Start/Stop a UPnP server automatically when connected/disconnected from a specified WIFI network, or on boot - Verbose log (filter, email, etc) - Add multiple folders which will be shared over UPnP - Set the name of the UPnP Server - Add a Dynamic DNS Updater using the local or public IP of your device All features: - Add a UPnP Server, and set the following: name, port (for HTTP files serving), enable extra data for Samsung devices, enable logging, only log errors, start the server when connected to a specific WIFI network and disconnect when the WIFI network is lost, or start on boot, add multiple roots (folder which will be shared) - Add multiple dynamic DNS updaters (set a custom URL, or choose from ChangeIP, DNSdynamic, DNSexit, DNSMadeEasy, DNS-O-Matic, DNSPark, DtDNS, DynDNS, easyDNS, eNom, HE.net, Joker, Namecheap, No-IP, ZoneEdit) - For every dynamic DNS updater set the name, timeout (in minutes), hostname, username, password and whether to update with the local or public IP address, start the Dynamic DNS Updater when connected to a specific WIFI network, update on connectivity change, start on boot - On the settings page of the app you can set the maximum log items to keep, whether to keep a WIFI lock (prevent WIFI from disconnecting automatically), keep the device alive, keep the device alive full (keep the screen on, battery intensive), set to start the app on boot - You can search/filter the log, or set it to be automatically sent when the log limit is reached. For questions, comments or feature requests just contact us! Visit us on: http://www.icecoldapps.com/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceColdApps Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IceColdApps

description: This app is your guide to choosing the right NHS service if you become ill or injured. It will help you find local NHS services and explain what each service does and when it should be used.

AtHome Camera is a video surveillance app that turns your unused computer, smartphone, tablet or smart TV into a video monitoring system for your home in minutes. Using AtHome Camera, you are able to keep an eye on your home when you are outside, and receive alerts right away in case of any incident. The App has been installed on more than 4 million devices worldwide, acting as baby monitor, pet camera, nanny cameras etc. ******* Main Features ******** 1. Remote monitoring on the go: watch live streaming via 3G/4G or WiFi network from anywhere at anytime; 2. Motion detection: get emails or push notifications instantly when motion is triggered; 3. Scheduled recording: you can specify two time intervals each day to automatically start/stop video recording; 4. Two-way Talk: communicate with people and pets using the built-in mic and speaker; 5. Secure and private: all connections between your phone and the video streaming device are encrypted; 6. Pan/Tilt: remotely control your IP camera left and right or up and down to capture an entire room; 7. Run at startup and hide on startup: option to run the AtHome Video Streamer in background mode; 8. Multiple platforms: support Windows PC、Mac、iPhone、iPad、iPod, Android phone and Android tablet. ******* Three Steps to setup ******** Step 1: Download the AtHome Video Streamer App from Apple App Store or Google Play and install it onto your device. A unique Connection ID (also referred to as CID) will be assigned to the device after the AtHome Video Streamer is launched at the first time; Step 2: Download and install the AtHome Camera app onto another device which you want to use as a viewer, open the app, sign up and login; Step 3: Select "Add by CID" or "By QR Code" to add a camera, you are all set to enjoy the live streaming! ******** Supporting ********* Facebook: http://facebook.com/AthomeCamera Twitter: https://twitter.com/athomecamera @athomecamera Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/1/b/108167516628708822330/ Email: support@iChano.com Skype:support_ichano Website: http://www.ichano.com

description: Continue the Adventure in Chapter 3: Teslas Electric Mist is a classic point and click adventure game revolving around the mysterious Nikola Tesla, a time traveling device he invented, and a big experiment gone wrong for the citizens of Colorado Springs in the late 1800s. The elegant graphics of the game really bring the creative puzzles and story to life. Search for clues and solve the puzzles as the imaginative story unfolds. In the game, you are the hero. Your family has a history with the great Nikola Tesla, inventor of the radio, alternating current, and patent holder of hundreds of electrical inventions. Your great-great-grandfather worked for Tesla in Colorado Springs around the turn of the century. A family secret has been passed down over the generations since then, that some day Tesla would need your familys help once more. What this means, no one in your family really knows. But the time has come, and you will be the one to answer the call. Using a time traveling device invented by Tesla, you travel back in time to Colorado Springs, and only you will have it in your power to save the people of Colorado Springs, and in fact, Tesla himself, from an experiment gone terribly wrong. Features: * The classic point and click adventure game re-imagined for touch devices * Elegant artwork in every scene * A story line that draws you into the mystery * Almost 200 scenes with dozens of puzzles that build upon each other * Beautiful soundtrack and sound effects * In-game hint guide, for those tough to beat puzzles * A dynamic map that keeps track of your progress * Important clues you come across are recorded automatically in your trusty notepad * Professionally translated into several languages - with more to come This family friendly game is a joy to play for individuals of all ages.

description: Overal inzicht in de uitgaven met uw ANWB Creditcard? Dat kan met de ANWB Creditcard App! Belangrijk: • De ANWB Creditcard App is alleen beschikbaar als u een ANWB Creditcard heeft. Heeft u Mijn Card Online nog niet geactiveerd? Ga dan eerst naar www.mijnanwbcreditcard.nl om Mijn Card Online te activeren. Let op: dit geldt alleen voor de Hoofd Card-houder. Als Extra Card-houder kunt u de ANWB Creditcard App activeren zonder Mijn Card Online. • Bent u een Bijenkorf-, ICS- of ABN AMRO Card-houder? Dan kunt u geen gebruikmaken van deze app. • De ANWB Creditcard App is alleen beschikbaar voor uw smartphone. ICS werkt aan een ondersteuning voor tablets. Download de gratis app en profiteer van de volgende voordelen: • Actueel inzicht in uw bestedingen en bestedingsruimte, ook voor de Extra Card-houder. • Gemakkelijk en veilig uw online transacties afronden met een unieke e-Code. • Locatie van geldautomaten in uw directe omgeving. • Aanbiedingen en kortingsacties. Hoe activeer ik de ANWB Creditcard App? Na het downloaden van de ANWB Creditcard App activeert u de app met uw Card-gegevens. Daarna kiest u een toegangscode. Daarmee is de app klaar voor gebruik. Veiligheid De ANWB Creditcard App is door International Card Services (ICS) in samenwerking met ANWB ontwikkeld volgens de strengste veiligheidsnormen. Deze app is bovendien zeer veilig doordat de app alleen toegankelijk is via de door u gekozen toegangscode. Ook via de app streven ICS en ANWB ernaar u een excellente service te verlenen. Wij gaan dan ook door met het ontwikkelen van handige en slimme functies. Everywhere insight into spending your AA Credit Card? You can with the AA Credit Card App Important: • The AA Credit Card App is available only if you have a AA credit card. If you have not activated My Card Online? Go to first www.mijnanwbcreditcard.nl to Activate My Card Online. Please note that this only applies to the Main Card holder. If Additional Cardholder, you can activate the AA Credit Card App Without My Card Online. • Are you a Bijenkorf, ICS or ABN AMRO Cardholder? You can not use this app. • The AA Credit Card App is available for your smartphone. ICS is working on support for tablets. Download the free app and enjoy the following benefits: • Current understanding of your spending and disposable income, also for the Additional Cardholder. • Easily and safely complete your online transactions with a unique e-Code. • Location of ATMs in your immediate vicinity. • Special offers and discounts. How do I activate the AA Credit Card App? After downloading the AA Credit Card App activate the app with your card data. Then you choose a password. Thus the app is ready for use. Safety The AA Credit Card App by International Card Services (ICS) developed in collaboration with AA to the highest safety standards. This app is also very secure because the app is only accessible via the password you chose. Also work through the app ICS and AA to ensure that you provide an excellent service. We therefore continue to develop useful and smart functions.
release_text: · In de statusbalk vindt u, naast het openstaand saldo en het nog te besteden bedrag, nu ook de som van eventuele gereserveerde transacties terug. · Het design van de app heeft een facelift gekregen. · De ANWB Creditcard App is nu geschikt voor meerdere gebruikers. Ook uw gezinsleden kunnen met hun eigen ANWB Card inloggen op de ANWB Creditcard App. Ga naar instellingen > gebruikers en volg de procedure. · Er zijn een aantal bugfixes uitgevoerd in deze release.

description: Finally... txt-book app lets you convert text-message (SMS + MMS) conversations into a creative and personalized text message book. Two unique PDF export styles: CONVERSATION or STORYBOOK. You can add a title, cover photo, nicknames, and back-cover note. Save it. Send it. File it. Print it. Keep for your records. Keep as a diary...or we'll bind it for the perfect gift! See below for helpful tips! · Download the app and start creating your first txt-book · Create your txt-book and decide to keep your book for $0.99 or upgrade to the UNLIMITED package to create, edit and send as many books as you like. · Convert SMS and MMS texts · Display large crisp photos · Videos appear as enhanced thumbnails · Select any date range ( For long text threads you can create several shorter books as Volume 1, 2, 3... ) · Remove unwanted messages and photos · Edit nicknames to personalize your txt-book · Privacy Guaranteed - All books are created locally on your phone - no data leaves your phone. · Create a book in as little as 30 seconds (if you have many texts/images it can take several minutes) · Print your book yourself -or- we'll professionally bind it for you. Visit www.txt-book.com for details and discounts. · Your txt-book arrives as a PDF file via your own e-mail service, a copy of the txt-book PDF file is also saved to your phone's memory card. If you do not receive your e-mail simply locate the file on your phone. - Not all foreign language characters and emoticons are supported. A txt-book is a perfect and easy gift for anniversaries, birthdays, graduations, Valentine’s Day, long-distance relationships or just...because. Text message conversations chronicle our modern lives. With txt-book now you can preserve the jokes, fights and photos that we share every day. Two Unique Export Styles: CONVERSATION: Displays the texts and photos in bubbles similar to the way it appears on your phone. The date and time, if chosen, are displayed above each bubble as well as the speaker's name. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. STORYBOOK: Adds phrases to the beginning and end of text messages so that your text conversations look and read like a novel. Text messages are always shown in quotes, and words like, "replied Kristin" are added after a text message. Sentences are used to introduce a new day such as, "On July 4, 2013 Mark texted Kristin," so your txt-book flows like a story. Photos appear larger than they do in your text-message conversation. You don't have to choose between one - if you get the UNLIMITED package, you can make as many books as you want. Change the way names appear in your book. You may decide to change your Father's name to, "Dad." Or your boyfriend's name to, "Boo." Your Cover Page features a photo that you select and a title that you create. The Back-Cover Note allows you to write a description that explains the book's meaning, or create a special message to the recipient such as, "To Kristin - I hope this book has a second volume. Please keep this to remind you of our first three months. Love, Mark." If you don't want a Title, Cover Photo or back-cover note then you can simply leave them out. Txt-book was created so people can transform the conversations between friends, family and lovers into a book. Many people simply use txt-book to keep a personal record of easy-to-read volumes of their day-to-day conversations. You can be the author of hundreds of txt-books...get started now!
release_text: Have your txt-book bound. Visit www.txt-book.com for information on how to bind your txt-book.

description: Individually Designed Optimum Dosing Strategies, or ID – ODS, is a simulation resource tool with extensive model library built from population pharmacokinetic models published in high quality, peer reviewed literature. The application is designed to aid health care professionals in the optimal dosing and continuous therapeutic monitoring of medications at the bedside. Enter all clinically relevant information through a user friendly interface to generate priori dosing regimens or to supply concentration data for posteriori dose adjustments in the adult patient population via Monte Carlo simulation and individual pharmacokinetic parameter optimization via Bayesian feedback.

★★★ Топ лучших бесплатных головоломок России ★★★ ★★★ Угадай цвет! ★★★ Помнишь ли ты цвета самых наиболее повторяющихся образов в твоей жизни? Отвлекись немного от игр где нужно угадывать слова, попробуй угадать цвет и раскрасить картинки! Это игра где вы должны угадать цвет образа на картинке. Эти цвета мы видим каждый день, на улице, в метро, магазине, дома, на работе. Сколько цветов Вы запомнили? На протяжении всей игры вам будет представлено множество различных сборников уровней, каждый из которых содержит множество бесцветных картинок которым нужно присвоить цвет(раскраска). Игра также подойдет детям, обучение в форме игры позволяет развивать абстрактное и логическое мышление - это очень эффективным способ развить логическое мышление в форме игры головоломки или раскраски. 110 различных картинок! Для каждой загадки 2 подсказки. ОСОБЕННОСТИ ★ все на русском языке ★ это бесплатно! ★ без регистрации ★ для всех возрастов ★ викторина - раскраска ★ 11 уровней! ★ 110 картинок ★ для каждой загадки, есть подсказка ★ подробная статистика! ★ частые обновления приложения! Больше уровней в ближайшее время! ★ ★ ★ Top Best Free puzzles Russia ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Guess the color! ★ ★ ★ Do you remember the color most recurring images of the most in your life? Distract a bit from the games where you have to guess words, try to guess the color and paint pictures! This is a game where you have to guess the color of the image in the picture. These are the colors we see every day on the street, in the subway, store, home, work. How many colors do you remember? Throughout the game you will be a lot of different collections of levels, each of which comprises a plurality of colorless images that you want to assign a color (coloring). The game is also suitable for children, training in the form of the game allows you to develop an abstract and logical thinking - this is a very effective way to develop logical thinking in the form of puzzle or coloring. 110 different pictures! 2 for each puzzle clues. FEATURES ★ all in Russian ★ It's free! ★ without registering ★ for all ages ★ Quiz - Coloring ★ 11 levels! ★ 110 pictures ★ for each puzzle, there is a hint ★ detailed statistics! ★ frequent application updates! More levels coming soon!

★ Logo Quiz 2: Guess the Brand ★ Guess the logos of different brands! This is a quiz game where you have to guess the logos of different brands.We can see various company logos every day and everywhere: how many of the logos do you know? Throughout the game you'll be presented with a bunch of different level packs, each containing logos of various brands or companies. If you like our game, "Guess the word", "What the Riddle", "True | False", "Logo Quiz" this game you will love it! For every logo you can use 2 hints. FEATURES ★ it's free! ★ no registration ★ for every logo in the quiz, there are 2 hints that help you ★ detailed statistics! ★ many hours of fun gameplay ★ frequent application updates! More levels coming soon! All logos shown or represented in this game are copyright and or trademark of their respective corporations.

app_name: Верю не верю - Правда или ложь
description: ★ Веришь нет? ★ Хочешь узнать множество фактов которые ты раньше не знал? Веришь ли ты в утверждение или сомневаешься? Правда это или ложь? Проверь себя на что ты способен, начни интеллектуальный поединок! Это игра где вы должны угадать истинно ли утверждение или нет. Не нужно читать нудные инструкции, в игре просто две кнопки, 20 секунд и несколько жизней(попыток). Вы узнаете очень много нового. В игре собраны очень много различных фактов, загадок и парадоксов со всего мира. На протяжении всей игры вам будет представлены различные уровни, которые нужно пройти поэтапно, заранее неизвестно сколько уровней в игре(в дальнейшем будут добавляться уровни). Игра также подойдет детям, обучение в форме игры позволяет развивать абстрактное и логическое мышление - это очень эффективным способ развить логическое мышление в форме игры головоломки. Если тебе понравились игры "Угадай слово", "100 загадок" то эта игра обязательно понравится! ОСОБЕННОСТИ ★ все на русском языке ★ это бесплатно! ★ без регистрации ★ нет никаких правил, сразу вливаешься в игру! ★ множество уровней! ★ для каждого ответа дается 20 секунд ★ долгие часы приятного геймплея ★ частые обновления приложения! Больше уровней в ближайшее время! ★ Believe it not? ★ Want to know a lot of facts that you did not know before? Do you believe in the statement or doubt? True or false? Test yourself on what you can do, begin an intellectual duel! This is a game where you have to guess whether the statement is true or not. No need to read boring instructions in the game just two buttons, 20 seconds and a few lives (attempts). You learn a lot. In the game there were a lot of different facts, mysteries and paradoxes from around the world. Throughout the game you will be presented with a variety of levels that need to go step by step, not known in advance how many levels in the game (in the future will be added levels). The game is also suitable for children, teaching in the form of the game allows you to develop an abstract and logical thinking - this is a very effective way to develop logical thinking in the form of a puzzle game. If you liked the game "Guess the word", "100 puzzles" then this game is sure to enjoy! FEATURES ★ all in Russian ★ It's free! ★ without registration ★ There are no rules, just pouring into the game! ★ many levels! ★ for each answer given 20 seconds ★ many hours of fun gameplay ★ frequent application updates! More levels coming soon!

description: Make your Flight Simulator experience a more realistic one. iFMS will provides you with a nearly fully functional "Boeing style" Flight Management System and HSI display on your mobile device. The FMS display and functionality simulates the "Boeing style" Flight Management System accurately. Apart from all the standard flight planning and tracking (LNAV and VNAV) functionality, all the more complex functions such as hold programming, custom waypoint programming by coordinates, heading/distance calculation or waypoints radial/intersection calculation and abeam route waypoint calculations are available as well, along with much, much more. The HSI display was developed to equally realistic standards. Like the real Boeing HSI display it has a moving "MAP" mode and "PLAN" mode which allows for stepping through the active route. Your programmed route, the waypoints, the fixes, the navaids, the airports etc. are all programmed to be displayed using the standard symbolization rules of the industry. The route is properly drawn as a rounded track with turns calculated based on ground speed and configurable parameters in your aircraft file. The visible range of the HSI can be set in the usual intervals between 5NM to 320NM. Toggling display of airports, navaids, fixes, and visual reporting points (if present in the navigation data) is off course possible as well and these functions respond depending on the current visible range, just they would in the real Boeing system. iFMS also includes an LNAV/VNAV engine which will control your aircraft's autopilot to fly the programmed LNAV/VNAV route. iFMS uses Wi-Fi to connect to your favorite Flight Simulator over your local network, alternatively iFMS can also use the device GPS (if present) as a data source, you can be a passenger in the car and practice your FMS programming skills. Be aware though, iFMS cannot be used for real world aviation navigation as this is strictly against the terms of use of this product. iFMS can be configured for use with almost any of your favorite Flight Simulator's standard aircraft and most add-on aircraft, 6 default aircraft configuration files are included but you can easily make your own on your computer and transfer them to iFMS. Features summary: - Realistic Flight Planning/Tracking/Navigation - Realistic Boeing style Flight Management System - Realistic Boeing style HSI display - LNAV & VNAV calculation - LNAV & VNAV engine to control your Flight Simulator autopilot - Single portrait or side by side landscape view - Configurable aircraft - Use your own created aircraft files - Loading and saving of flight plans - Import flight plans and aircraft from your PC - Updatable navigation data through Navigraph Memory Requirements: - Android mobile device with at least 512MB of RAM and 350MB free internal storage space Compatible flight simulators: - Microsoft Flight Simulator X - Prepar3D - X-Plane Win32 - X-Plane Win64 - X-Plane Mac Please visit http://www.ifms-fs.com for more details about iFMS, supported flight simulator packages and how to connect iFMS to them.

Marble Solitaire / Peg Solitaire is a board game for one player involving movement of Marbles on a board with holes. The Game is Known by the name Brainvita in India . Marble Solitaire is a classic marble solitaire strategic game. You need to remove as many marbles as possible. Our aim is to remove all marbles till there is no valid move remaining and end up with one marble in minimum time and movements. The one who can make one marble remaining in the board within the shortest time and movements will be the Master in the Score. ★★★★Game Play★★★★ 1. Start the marble solitaire game by moving any of the marbles behind the center hole to the center hole. 2. Then the marble which is jumped over get removed from the marble solitaire board. 3. Moving one marble over other marbles to remove all the remaining marbles. 4. You can move marbles vertically and horizontally but you cannot move marbles diagonally. 5. If One Marble is Left in the board then You will be the Toper in Google Play Leader Board . ★★★★★Game Features★★★★★ ✔ Three Difficulty Level : Easy, Medium and Hard . ✔ Brain Challenging game but Easy and Fun to Play . ✔ Google Play Game Features Like Leaderboard and Achievements . ✔ Score is Calculated on the basis of Time and Marbles Left in the Board . ✔ Simple Design and Easy to play . ✔ Remove Ad's by Purchasing the Ad Removal in-app . We are happy to see your suggestions and feed backs. android@igosttech.com
release_text: Version >>> 1.0.7 Support added for more devices. Performance improvements. In-app Purchase for Removing Ad

description: 最受華人喜愛的捕魚遊戲《開心捕魚》， 在玩家瘋狂期盼下推出《開心捕魚 2》！ ☆十四個各具特色關卡 『獵戶座』『星靈界』『天龍國』等您闖關！ ☆六大副本全面開放 『大魚吃小魚』『金龍降世』，豐厚獎勵等您挑戰！ ☆全新模式「深海尋寶」 百萬寶石、九千水晶，豐厚獎勵、等您挑戰！ ☆關卡獎勵大方送 解鎖關卡再送獎勵，最高獎勵「百萬金幣」！ ☆商城道具大方送 每日簽到即可領取，包您 100% 得獎！ ☆儲值滿額送金幣 首次儲值雙倍回饋，水晶加倍奉還！絕不手軟！ 【最受歡迎的捕魚遊戲】 ★明星三缺一專業團隊最新力作，最奇幻的深海冒險！ ★風行日、韓經典機台全面移植，讓您走到哪，玩到哪! ★奇幻風格、精緻亮麗的畫面，操作簡單、輕鬆上手! ★多樣關卡、魚種、強力武器任您體驗，海量金幣賺不完! ★豐富賽制隨開即玩!是您上班偷閒、捷運通勤的最好消遣! 【遊戲特色】 ☆每日獎勵、定時補幣，讓您開心捕魚無負擔! ☆突破傳統！開著船艦悠遊大海，享受一砲捕魚的快感！ ☆絢麗多變的魚群！特殊陣型組合，考驗您的射擊策略！ ☆雷射、砲彈、天女散花！快選擇喜歡的武器進行攻擊！ ☆特殊劇情！海底尋寶、美人魚兒、禮物交換等您挑戰！ ☆激烈競賽！快速掌握冰火能量，您就是大海之王！ 還在等什麼？快點擊「安裝」一起加入《開心捕魚 2》吧！ 更多開心捕魚遊戲內容請至 官方FB粉絲團： http://goo.gl/DW1K2X 喜愛捕魚的就要玩《開心捕魚 2》， 不愛捕魚的更要玩《開心捕魚 2》， 《開心捕魚 2》絕對讓您有不一樣的捕魚體驗！

Einen freien Parkplatz suchen und finden - ab sofort mobil mit der neuen ADAC ParkInfo App leicht gemacht. ADAC ParkInfo bietet eine nahezu vollständige flächendeckende Übersicht über die Parkeinrichtungen (Parkplätze, Parkhäuser sowie P+R Anlagen) in Deutschland: mit mehr als 5.500 Adressen, Infos zu Parkpreisen und Öffnungszeiten sowie vieles mehr. Besonders attraktiv: Für mehr als 900 Parkanlagen erhält man online den aktuellen Belegungsstatus, d.h. die Angabe wie viele Stellplätze aktuell noch frei sind. Mit Hilfe der farblich gekennzeichneten Anzeigen auf der Karte erhalten Sie einen Überblick über die aktuelle Situation im innerstädtischen Bereich oder auch an Flughäfen und können sich den schnellsten Weg (Route) zum nächsten freien Parkplatz berechnen und anzeigen lassen. Sie ersparen sich unnötige Zeitverluste und lästigen Parksuchverkehr und fahren zielgerichtet einen freien Stellplatz an. Mit dem integrierten Parkfinder finden Sie immer wieder auf direktem Weg zu Ihrem abgestellten Fahrzeug zurück. Achtung: Für eine korrekte Anzeige der dynamischen Parkhausinformationen sowie der aktuellen Belegungsdaten ist eine Internetverbindung notwendig! Search and find a parking space - immediately mobilized with the new ADAC Park Info app easily. ADAC Park Info provides almost complete coverage overview of the parking facilities (parking lots, parking garages and P + R facilities) in Germany: with more than 5,500 addresses, information about parking prices and opening times and much more. Especially attractive: For more than 900 parks to get online the current occupancy status, ie specifying how many spaces are currently still free. With the help of color-coded indicators on the map to get an overview of the current situation in urban areas or even at airports and can calculate the quickest route (route) to the next available parking space and display. This will save you wasting time and annoying parking search traffic and drive targeted to a free parking space. With the integrated parking Finder you can always find back straight to your parked vehicle. Attention: For proper display of dynamic parking information and the current occupancy data an Internet connection is required!

With ImperiHome, control your home automation systems and connected objects from a single and highly customizable interface. No need for a central server or dedicated setup. The application directly connects to your systems using APIs and allows you to remotely interact with all your devices. Currently, ImperiHome is able to connect to: - Fibaro Home Center 2 (ZWave controller by Fibaro) - Myfox Home Control 2 (security and home control system) - Philips Hue (lighting system) - Vera, VeraLite (ZWave controller by Micasaverde / Vera Control) UI5, UI6 and UI7 - ZiBase (Multi-protocol controller by Zodianet) - eedomus (ZWave controller by Connected Object) - IPX800 (Relay controller by GCE Electronics) - Eco-Devices (Teleinfo energy counter by GCE Electronics) - Netatmo Weather Station - Koubachi Plant Sensor - LightManager (Controller by JBMedia) - Zipabox (Multi-protocol controller by Zipato) / Cameras and security features not yet supported - Systems implementing the ISS API (ImperiHome Standard System) - MJPEG, MPEG4, h264 IP cameras - … more will come! At home using your wall-mounted tablet or outside using your smartphone, take benefit of ImperiHome features to control your smart home the way you want: - fast and responsive user interface - voice recognition - NFC tags actions - charts module - customizable dashboards with smart widgets (limited in free version) - Android shortcuts - local or remote network auto detection - layouts for both smartphones and tablets - several options to fine-tune the application - import/export preferences (only in pro version) - Sony SmartWatch2 integration - Automatic wake-up using front camera move detection. WARNING: this feature is highly dependent on the type of device and camera. We can't guarantee it will work wit all devices. - Tasker Plugin (pro version only) - REST Control API (pro version only) - Android Wear support (voice commands and camera viewing) This is the free version of ImperiHome. Unlock pro features by installing also the ImperiHome Pro Unlocker: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imperihome.lite.unlockerpro Check out more on ImperiHome webite ( http://www.imperihome.com ) and contact us at support@imperihome.com should you encounter any issue. description: Manage your online Flickr content: photos, photosets, collections, favorites, galleries, groups, contacts. FEATURES * Photostream - view and manage the photos in your Flickr photostream. You can download photos, add photos to photosets, add photos to a group, share, view/add comments or delete photos. * Photosets - view and manage the photos in your Flickr photosets. You can create new photosets, delete existing ones or remove photos from photosets. * Local media - view and upload your local photos to Flickr. You can upload them directly to an album, or just to your photostream. * Interesting - view, download, add to favorites or to galleries, share or comment on interesting photos. * Favorites - manage your favorite Flickr photos: add or remove favorites, add photos to galleries, download them to your SD card or share them. * Contacts - add or remove contacts, view their photostream, photosets, favorites and galleries. * Groups - view your groups, search for public groups, join or leave groups. Download photos from any group to your SD card, comment on them or share them. * Galleries - manage your photo galleries, add or remove photos, download and share photos. While you can create new galleries, you cannot delete them from the app due to an issue in Yahoo's Flickr API. * Search - search public photos based on keywords. Add to favorites, galleries, share or download any photo you find. * Multiple accounts - you can switch between all your Flickr accounts. * Video support (playback, download, upload) * Slideshow - view photos in any section of the app as a slideshow. DISCLAIMER * This product uses the Flickr API but is not endorsed or certified by Flickr. * Flickr is a registered trademark of Yahoo Inc. * Imprologic Inc is not not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Yahoo Inc. OTHER CONSIDERATIONS * We stand by our product - if you encounter any issue or if you are not satisfied with the app, we will either fix it or fully refund your money. You can send us your feedback at imprologic@gmail.com . * Free and continuous software updates: we will be releasing new features often, based on user feedback. * Detailed online help and FAQ: http://imprologic.com/flickr/android/help/ ----------------- Flippr for Flickr was developed in Ontario, Canada.
release_text: 1.5.2 Chromecast support (experimental, full screen online media only) 1.3.1 Changed to comply with upcoming changes in Yahoo's API. Please upgrade to this version, or your app will stop working after June 27. 1.2.8 Activity from contacts, random slideshow, optionally override upload visibility settings, minor fixes. 1.2.3 Added EXIF info. Improved rendering on xhdpi devices. 1.1.5 Added "recent activity", collections support

description: The English language is full of rules and exceptions to those rules. Learning them all can be tedious and frustrating for younger students. That’s why The Interactive Studio created English Quest, a fun and interactive game that uses 3-D incentives to help students work towards mastery. English Quest targets learners in the second grades, and offers age-appropriate lessons to help them build language skills. Teachers will delight in the array of features that allow them to adjust the game’s difficulty and to customize quizzes. Students will stay engaged as they attempt to build their own 3-D zoos by earning new animals for correct answers. English Quest is a "Ten Year Series" collection of high quality english questions crafted for the students. It differs from the traditional collection of Ten Year Series questions as it is infused with learning pedagogy to engage the learner and accelerate his assimilation. English Quest is designed by educators to allow the young learner to be motivated in learning and enjoys the learning journey. There are a total of 500 high quality English questions that are distributed randomly over 15 different Safari animals. The main aim of the app is to encourage the learner to attempt each set of the quiz so that he can collect each of the 15 safari animals in order to populate his very own 3D Safari Zoo. The adult or teacher can adjust the level of difficulties such as the quiz duration/passing score to cater to the varying needs of the learner. The safari animals serve as a source of motivation and end goals to encourage the young learner to keep on practicing the quizzes. In addition, the quiz format has also been given an extreme make-over. There are 3 different themes that the quiz is based on. The themes are the "Deadly Sharks", "Monster Crocs" and the "Giant Piranhas". The different themes, interactivity and animation of the quizzes aim to provide a fun and engaging learning environment for the young learner to enjoy the learning process. In the end, beside having the ability to review the correct and wrong attempts by the learner, the adult/teacher can simply look into the 3D Safari to see the number of animals collected. We are confident that your child will certainly enjoy the theme-based quizzes and on his way to improving his command of the English language

- Collect 10 amazing interactive marine creatures and improve your Science. - 300 high quality Primary 4 | Grade 4| Fourth Grade Science questions compiled from renowned schools in Singapore. - 3 different theme-based quizzes to encourage learning. - Intuitive quizzes with drag and drop to engage learner for deeper learning - Customize quiz settings to cater to different learner’s abilities. -10 amazing interactive marine animals to be collected. - Design your very own ocean and show off your achievements. - The most innovative Ten Year Series Science Quiz Science Quest - Fourth Grade is a "Ten Year Series" collection of high quality Grade 4 Science questions crafted for the fourth graders. It differs from the traditional collection of Ten Year Series questions as it is infused with learning pedagogy to engage the learner and accelerate his assimilation. Science Quest is designed by educators to allow the young learner to be motivated in learning and enjoys solving Science problems. There are a total of 300 high quality Science questions that are distributed randomly over 10 different marine animals. The main aim of the app is to encourage the learner to attempt each set of the quiz so that he can collect all of the 10 marine animals to populate his very own 3D Ocean Aquarium. The adult or teacher can adjust the level of difficulties such as the quiz duration/passing score to cater to the varying needs of the learner. The marine animals serve as a source of motivation and end goals to encourage the young learner to keep on practicing the quizzes. In addition, the quiz format has also been given an extreme make-over. There are 3 different themes that the quiz is based on. The themes are the "Deadly Sharks", "Monster Crocs" and the "Giant Piranhas". The different themes, interactivity and animation of the quizzes aim to provide a fun and engaging learning environment for the young learner to enjoy the learning process. In the end, beside having the ability to review the correct and wrong attempts by the learner, the adult/teacher can simply look into the 3D Ocean to see the number of marine animals collected. We are confident that your child will certainly enjoy the theme-based quizzes and on his way to improving his Science.

App Audience Perfect for SAR, Geo-caching, Aviation, or anyone simply interested in mapping. App Description Primarily, this App just performs simple math. More importantly, It first detects which one of the possible formats the coordinate was entered as. This prevents the user from having to spend time tapping between multiple input boxes, or wading through a plethora of configuration options. Once the App determines the input type, it then converts that number into other formats. App Background A couple of our developers volunteer with a local Search and Rescue organization and others do the same with an Aero Squadron. It became clear that, even though within a local area, neither group used the same coordinate system. In most areas, Search and Rescue typically use one GPS coordinate system, while another Search and Rescue Team, Law Enforcement Agency, Fire Department, other First Responder Groups, may use another. However, when this App first became available, it was quickly learned that this problem was not isolated to these teams. For example, one agency inside any given city / county may use one GPS coordinate system, while another may use something different. Additionally, when one of these agencies travels outside of its local area, they are sure to want to communicate easily with an agency that uses another system. Of course, there are a multitude of other personal and commercial entities that need to communicate a location in a format different that what it is currently stored in. Innovative Concepts is proud to offer this free App to help solve this communications hardship... App Details Press the "Get Current Location" icon or manually enter any coordinate and this App will convert whatever was entered into other commonly used coordinate formats. The input boxes auto-detect the entry from the following formats: ✔ Decimal Degrees (D.d) → Enter as 12.345678 ✔ Degrees, Decimal Minutes (D M.m) → Enter as 12 34.5678 ✔ Degrees, Minutes, Seconds (D M S.s) → Enter as 12 34 56.78 ✔ UTM → Enter as 12 + 123456 1234567 Upon pressing "Go", the App will convert the coordinates entered into: ✔ Decimal Degrees → 12.345678° ✔ Degrees, Decimal Minutes → 12° 34.5678' ✔ Degrees, Minutes, Seconds → 12° 34' 56.78" ✔ UTM → 12 N 123456 1234567 App Features ✔ Automatically detects input format ✔ Multiple keyboard shortcuts ✔ You can copy the results ✔ You can select which output formats are displayed ✔ You can override all coordinate symbols ✔ You can specify the latitude / longitude separator text ✔ You have the option to automatically load and convert the current GPS location on App start ✔ You can transfer the results to Google Maps (or any other capable mapping app) App Future ✔ Add option to continuously update / convert current location. ✔ Add more input/output formats.(Such as MGRS)
