description: First Grade Kids Word Play is a set of 250+ exercises using 250+ words to teach 5-7 year old kids phonics, spelling and reading. Images and spoken words help advance kids' learning. Kids learn to read as they play. The games are - * Word Search Kids look for words for the pictures shown in a word grid. They can hear the word sound and see the spelling by tapping on any image, but, they have to memorize the letters in the word to find it. * Sight Words Kids match first and second grade level sight words in a memory game by tapping on cards. * Phonics Kids learn the sounds made by vowel-combinations and complex consonant-combinations within the context of a word. * Spelling Kids practice spelling 4, 5, and 6 letter words. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

First Grade Word Play Lite is a set of 25 exercises using 20 words to teach 5-7 year old kids phonics, spelling and reading. The full version has 250+ exercises using 250+ words. Images and spoken words help advance kids' learning. Lite version has 5 exercises of each game - * Word Search Kids look for words for the pictures shown in a word grid. They can hear the word sound and see the spelling by tapping on any image, but, they have to memorize the letters in the word to find it. * Sight Words Kids match first and second grade level sight words in a memory game by tapping on cards. * Phonics Kids learn the sounds made by vowel-combinations and complex consonant-combinations within the context of a word. * Spelling Kids practice spelling 4, 5, and 6 letter words. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

V 1.30 Updates - New UI Controls (with actionbar added to v2.x handsets) - Improved audio handlers, especially while in a call - Minor bug fixes - Thanks again to everyone for great feedback - we take all comments into consideration, and a number of additions/repairs suggested by you are included in this update. The West Virginia 511 Drive Safe mobile app provides drivers with audible, hands-free traffic alerts from their smartphone. Open the app when you get in the car to begin your drive then set the phone aside while driving. The WV 511 Drive safe app will use your phone's speaker and GPS location to provide you with the audible travel advisories near your current location as you drive. In the settings menu you can customize the app to adjust the advisory replay interval and the number of miles radius for which you are interested in receiving advisories. HOW IT WORKS While driving you will receive audible updates on nearby construction, crashes, traffic delays, weather advisories and other helpful traveler information on nearby interstates and other high priority roadways while being able to keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road. The WV 511 Drive Safe app will continue to update you with nearby advisories as your vehicle continues to move. The application gives you audio player controls for Play, Pause, Stop, Skip, and Replay All. If the GPS signal is not available the device will utilize the highest precision location tool available (whether it be GPS or cell tower triangulation). You do not need to register to use this app or to get these alerts. We don't get or record any identifying information about you or your phone. By default, you will be elected into reporting your device-determined speed along with your location to our servers, but you can elect to opt-out from within the application. You must opt-out of this selection each time the application is restarted. The Technology The application is based on Information Logistics’ patent pending "Open Microphone Platform", which is a queue-driven streaming technology platform used in combination with your phone's built-in GPS. The data for the system is the WV travel advisory data. IMPORTANT - Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. IMPORTANT - NON-GPS DEVICES This application will have some limited functionality on these devices.

Pull the lever down for a chance to win extra coins, an instant $100, or even have your last shopping trip paid for. - Earn even more by referring friends, completing short surveys, scanning item barcodes, and submitting receipts regularly. - Quickly level up and complete monthly challenges to earn more spins at the Hog Slots - Enjoy a totally uncluttered wallet - Receipt Hog digitizes & stores your receipts in one secure place so that you don't have to keep the paper ones HOW RECEIPT HOG WORKS: Receipt Hog offers a unique opportunity to join an exclusive market research panel whose purchases and opinions influence the products and promotions that brands and retailers offer. By joining this exclusive panel, your receipt data and any answers to survey questions will be made anonymous and summarized in market research reports for brands. As a result, you’ll not only get paid for using Receipt Hog, but you’ll also be part of a small group that influences the products offered at your local stores. HERE'S WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING: "For those of you who want to be smart with your money, this app is for you. Snap pictures of your receipts, make some money, and have fun doing it!" "Anything that pays you back for things you normally buy anyway is great in my book!" "Many of the apps that allow you to earn points, rewards, or $ are only good if you live in a large city with lots of chain stores. This app is great regardless of where you live." "This is a seriously bad a** app. Get paid for doing your normal shopping. What's not to love?" "I am a Receipt Hog queen! I've cashed out several times through PayPal. This app is a must have! I love that you can save all of your digitized receipts for your personal record. Pretty cool if you ask me!" "Thank you for helping with my children's Christmas gifts! I love Receipt Hog!" "I do a lot of shopping for me and my family and it only takes a second to submit a picture of a receipt! Receipt Hog is hands down the easiest way to make extra cash."

Or use the ‘Feedback’ button in the app. We use your comments to improve the Mobile Banking App.

description: 今天，你應該知道的十件事，就看「天下每日報」！ 現在開始，透過智慧型手機，隨時隨地掌握天下事！ 更快、更方便、更容易！ 慶祝新版每日報app上架，全功能限期免費開放!!! 4大特色： ◆ 每日新聞：每日摘錄國際重點新聞，深入解讀，讓您輕鬆掌握國際大事。 ◆ 離線閱讀：下載後即可離線閱讀，節省您的行動網路流量。 ◆ 圖文縮放：內文與圖表均可縮放，閱讀更輕鬆！ ◆ 有聲新聞：不方便閱讀時，戴上耳機，一樣可以完整聆聽。 ===========關於《天下雜誌》=========== 天下雜誌以深度、理性報導風格, 前瞻國際視野, 是華文世界最優質的財經雜誌。創刊32年來, 持續引介讀者最新趨勢與議題, 備受各界肯定, 獲獎無數, 是決策者最倚重的財經媒體。 「天下」取名自「天下為公」,表示對一個美好社會的嚮往與追求。 每個關鍵時刻, 「天下」都以積極、前瞻、放眼天下的態度, 試圖為台灣在世界前進的潮流中找到定位, 為企業因應政經巨變找到出路, 為領導人與中產階級搭起溝通的橋樑, 為台灣追求一個美好而公平的社會。
release_text: 慶祝新版每日報app上架，全功能限期免費開放!!! ．全新設計界面 ．新增語音播放，用聽的瞭解今天大事

description: Re-discover banking with official Mobile Banking app for Android phones and Android tablets from ING Vysya Bank (now Kotak) There's a lot that the app lets you do apart from viewing your Accounts & Deposits, opening FD/RD, Funds Transfer, Bill Payment, Shopping & more including: - A balance meter that gives quick updates just with a tap. - Built-in SMS to beneficiary as soon as a fund transfer is done. - Alerts on mobile calendar for Bill Pay. Say 'No' to late fees. - Forget cheque counterfoils. Snap with your phone camera & store cheques in your App. - Send e-Gift Vouchers right from your phone. - Locate nearest ATMs/Branches & contact us with a tap. ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) requires following permissions: - Contacts: This is required to allow you send SMS after Funds Transfer. - Calendar: This is required to set reminders for your Bill payments. - Camera: This is to take pictures of your cheque and store it for your reference. - Location: This is required for Branch / ATM locator. - Photos / Media / Files: This is required to let you access gallery / click an image to set profile picture.  - Phone: This is required for let you dial customer contact centre. - Please note that ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) fetches this data only when initiated by user and not otherwise. Steps to start using ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) Application on your Android Phone/Tablet: - Login with your Net Banking ID & Password *If you are not a Net Banking user you can directly register for Mobile Banking on the app and access your accounts
release_text: Version 3.3 1. Connectivity issues for some handsets fixed : Issue with app getting stuck on welcome screen on some models rectified 2. UI enhancements 3. Improved Loading time

description: 지루할때, 심심할때, 따분할땐 만화함께! 언제 어디서나 느낄 수 있는 즐거움! 재미있는 만화를 언제어디서나 즐겨보세요! ---- 개발자 연락처 : 서울특별시, 강남구 연주로 647 TEL : 070-4066-6557 When you get bored, when bored, with a cartoon when you're bored! Anytime, anywhere to feel pleasure! Enjoy a fun cartoon anytime, anywhere!

꽉찬 구성으로 여러분의 마음을 충족 시켜 드리겠습니다. 매일 매일 확인 하여 보세요! 매월 월간 운세가 업데이트 됩니다. “나에게 무슨 일이 생길까” 라는 궁금증을 해결 시켜 주고자 제작! 어떻게 생각하고 행동해야 오늘 보다 더 낳은 삶을 살아갈 수 있을까요? 봄, 여름, 가을, 겨울이 돌고 돌듯 자연은 멈춤이 아니라 계속 순환합니다. 이처럼 1년 12달도 자연의 움직임과 기운에 따라 사람에게 영향을 미칩니다. 사람마다 받는 기운의 흐름이 다르므로 자신의 운기에 따라 알찬 계획을 세우시기 바랍니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 서울특별시, 강남구 연주로 647 TEL : 070-4066-6557 Increase to add fullness to the configuration, we will meet with your heart. Please check each day! Monthly Horoscopes are updated monthly. Now to address the question of production give "me what's saenggilkka"! How to think and act I can live a better life than today? Spring, summer, fall, winter, nature will continue to cycle round doldeut not stop. Thus one years 12 moon Affect a person depending on the nature of the movement and energy. Since the flow of incoming energy varies from person Please establish a quality plan based on their Meridian.

★탁상달력 2013이 출시되었습니다.★ 2012년 간단한 탁상달력! 내 손안에 12년 달력 2012년이 밝았습니다. 내 스마트폰에도 달력이 하나쯤은 있어야 한다면, 달력 기능에 충실한 이런 앱 하나쯤은 있어야 되지 않을까요? ★이런 기능을 합니다 √보기가 편한 달력 √한국의 공휴일, 기념일 표시 √음력이 1일, 15일 단위로 표시 √위젯설정으로 이번달 달력 보기 ★이런 분들께 추천 드립니다 √여러 기능 다 필요 없고, 달력만 딱 볼수 있으면 좋겠다는 분 √날짜가 크고, 잘 보이는 달력을 원하시는 분 √일상생활중, 업무중, 회의중, 공부중 등 바로 볼수 있는 달력을 원하시는 분 √한국형 달력을 간단히 볼수 있으면 좋겠다고 생각하시는 분 √위젯으로 달력을 설정하고 싶으신 분 ☆위젯 설정하는 방법 -홈 화면의 빈 공간을 2~3초 정도 길게 터치합니다. -[위젯]을 선택! -[2012 달력] 위젯을 추가해 보세요. ☆위젯의 업데이트 간격 -안드로이드 스마트폰의 기본 위젯 업데이트 시간 (대게 30분) 입니다. -다음날로 바뀌는 12시부터 30분 이내에 위젯이 갱신됩니다. -업데이트 간격을 기본으로 두어서 배터리나 단말기의 리소스를 적게 소모하기 위함 입니다.
release_text: [v1.9 업데이트] -2013년 달력 링크 버튼 추가 [v1.8 업데이트] -2013년 달력 링크 추가 [v1.7 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.6 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.5 업데이트] -고해상도 단말기 위젯 오늘 표시 문제 수정 (갤럭시노트, 갤럭시넥서스, 등) [v1.4 업데이트] -위젯이 1월로 고정되어 갱신되지 않는 문제 긴급수정 (불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송합니다.) [v1.3 업데이트] -위젯 달력에 오늘 날짜 표시 [v1.2 업데이트] -기타 버그 수정 [v1.1 업데이트] -총선,대선,수능 날짜 추가 -카카오톡 선물보내기 추가

description: For all the kids and the old ones who love to play word game, A new Word Shuffle game for you to learn words. According to an old study, games can be a great way to learn, so from now on, help your child learn the language and words in a fun way. Get ready to test your word power and speed in the all New Word Game – The Word Craze. It's an Easy yet Addictive game, where you have to form the words using the given set of five Alphabets. Do keep a look at the time running out. To Find out or mark words from a rectangular grid of apparently random letters is difficult but to create the words is even more challenging, yet full of fun. So are you up for the challenge? An eye contagious interface and easy to understand Game play, makes the game even more fun. In case, you find any difficulty with the game, feel free to contact us through inkling.help@gmail.com For latest news on new games released : -- Subscribe to our Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/teaminkling -- Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/teaminkling -- Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/InklingArts

Are you interested in learning Turkish, but just don't have the time? Let's face it, not everyone can commit full-time to learning a language. We know there are many things going on in your life: school, work, the kids, that special someone. That's why we developed WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite for the ultra-busy, 21st century lifestyle. There's absolutely no reason to miss out on all the benefits of learning Turkish just because you're light on time. With WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite, you'll start down the road to fluency and reap the rewards that go with it. With WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite, you'll master 200 of the most frequently used words and phrases in the Turkish language right on your Android device! The app doubles as a mini travel guide packed with cultural insights and practical Turkish phrases. Learn Turkish with audio recordings of a native Turkish speaker and a voice recorder so you can master perfect pronunciation anywhere, anytime. This list of the 200 most frequently used Turkish words is compact enough to fit a little review into you busy schedule. Study at your convenience at times and places that work for you! WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite also comes with an addictive Word of the Day alert and free Turkish audio lessons when you sign up for a free TurkishClass101.com account inside the app. What makes WordPower so effective? It's Fun, Fast and Easy to Use! WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary Lite FEATURES: - Completely redesigned UI. The user interface has been redesigned from the ground up to be much cleaner, beautiful, and more user friendly - New! Android Tablet support - Turkish Top 200 Words: A special list of words specific to daily life in Turkey. You’ll learn handy cultural insights with every entry transforming Word Power into a mini travel and cultural handbook (3G or WiFi required to access Wikipedia links within the app) - Essential Turkish vocabulary all in one place showing you the spelling, translation, pronunciation, image, and class. (Note: You will need an internet connection for the initial download) - Sample Sentences: See and hear practical sample sentences with every word entry - Free Audio Lessons: Learn more than just words! Access the newest TurkishClass101.com audio lessons when you sign up for a Free Lifetime Account within the app - Updated Basic Resources: Want to explore the Turkish language even more? Learn everything you need to know with this comprehensive source of Turkish learning tips, information and material - Easy to Use Design: Intuitive Android swipe navigation allows visual learners to browse vocabulary images quickly. Find everything you need without excessive swiping and tapping - Custom Flashcard Settings: You're in control of your study sessions. Mix up question types (recognition, production, audio and visual) for a full understanding of each word - Listening Practice: Hear each word's proper pronunciation by a native speaker - Perfect your Pronunciation: Compare your pronunciation to the native speaker's with the Voice Recorder, easily accessible throughout the app - Personalized Word Bank: Save difficult or useful words, with their audio files, to review at any time - Advanced Search Function: Search entire database in English or Turkish - Progress Bar: Keep track of how many words you have really mastered - Authentic Turkish pronunciation 200 words not enough? Upgrade to WordPower Learn Turkish Vocabulary full edition to get 2000 more words and phrases!

Met de Stop Heling app kunt u met serienummers van elk product controleren of het gestolen is of niet. De app zoekt uit of het product als gestolen geregistreerd staat in de database van de Nederlandse politie. Let wel: een product dat niet is geregistreerd kan alsnog gestolen zijn! Soms is er geen aangifte gedaan of is de aangifte nog niet verwerkt. De app kan kentekens en een groot deel van de serienummers automatisch inscannen. Tevens biedt de app de mogelijkheid om uw eigen spullen inclusief serienummer en foto op te slaan. Erg handig voor de verzekering of een eventuele aangifte. Het is u dus aan te raden om eenmaal door uw huis heen te lopen en al uw eigendommen te registreren. Deze informatie blijft op uw toestel staan en wordt niet opgeslagen door de politie. Wel biedt de app de mogelijkheid om de lijst met uw eigendommen naar uw e-mailadres te sturen. Het kopen van gestolen goederen is heling en dat is strafbaar. Wie gestolen spullen koopt, stuurt de inbrekers op pad. Bij het kopen van tweedehands spullen is het dan ook belangrijk om alert te blijven. Let wel: een product dat niet is geregistreerd kan alsnog gestolen zijn (de database gaat overigens niet verder terug dan 1 januari 2010). Bij het kopen van tweedehands spullen is het dan ook belangrijk om alert te blijven. Als iets te mooi lijkt om waar te zijn, is het dat meestal ook! Keywords: politie, serienummer, diefstal, stopheling The Stop Healing app allows you to check serial numbers of each product or it is stolen or not. The app finds out whether the product is registered as stolen in the database of the Dutch police. Note: a product that is not registered can still be stolen! Sometimes there is no declaration made or the declaration has not yet been processed. The app can badges and a large part of the serial numbers to scan automatically. This app also allows you to store your own stuff including serial number and photo. Very useful for insurance or any declaration. It is therefore recommended that you walk by your house once back and record all your belongings. This will remain on your device and is not stored by the police. However, the app offers the ability to send the list of your belongings to your email address. Buying stolen goods is healing and that is punishable. Who buys stolen goods, send the burglars set off. When therefore buying second hand goods, it is important to stay alert. Note: a product that is not registered can still be stolen (the database incidentally does not go back to 1 January 2010). When therefore buying second hand goods, it is important to stay alert. If something seems too good to be true, it is usually too! Keywords: police, serial, theft, stop healing

description: Music Bounce is an app that allows you to imagine, sculpt and construct musical tones by simply manipulating shapes and choreographing physical collisions! Get rid of the old musical notes, and let your imagination do the magic together with the highly interactive graphical interface! Add SoundFrames of different shapes, into which you can add various SoundBalls. The SoundBalls will continously bounce inside each frame, producing distinct sounds whenever they collide with the frame. You can edit the shape of the frame or change the speed of the balls to get tones of different beats and tempos. Add as many SoundFrames you like to create that masterpiece you've always dreamed of. The app also contains a fully fledged Help page, to assist you in discovering the many features of this app. It gets better. You could also save your creations to a file, and import them later if you want to tweak the settings. Once complete, you can share your music composition with others on the FreeBounce Exchange! This feature of the app will also allow you to download and listen to creations from other MusicBounce users around the world. Over the next few weeks, we have decided to keep our ears open for masterpieces that will emerge from our users, and so if you are feeling lucky, please upload your creations to the FreeBounce Exchange through the app. If you are really keen, you could save your masterpiece to a file and email it to savithru.j@googlemail.com with the subject "Music Bounce". We will select a few and publish them on our website too! :) This app has been debugged and tested on the following devices: > Samsung Galaxy SII > Samsung Galaxy SIII > Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 > ASUS Transformer Pad > Samsung Galaxy Ace And finally as always, comments and reviews are always welcome.

Access all of your device's sensors and record and save data from each of them! Sensor Logger also has real-time colour graphs which display the time history of the measurements from each sensor. Supports sensor data export into plain text and CSV files. Obtain additional data about the sensor's hardware such as its resolution, delay, power and vendor. Tested on: - Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2.2) - Samsung Galaxy SII (Android 4.0.3) - Asus Transformer Pad TF300T (Android 4.1.1) - Samsung Galaxy Ace (Android 2.3.6)

One Click App2SD One Click App2SD allows you to get more free internal storage space. With the help of this simple utility you can move any application from your phone to your SD card. After installation you will see the full list of apps which can be migrated to SD, just click on app to move it to your card and vice versa. Long click to freeze app on phone storage.

Pahelika: Revelations is a Hidden Objects Adventure game about exploration and puzzle solving in a mysterious world. Fresh from his success in obtaining the hidden magic book Pahelika, Sudesh Budkoti thought he was about to get some well earned rest. He thought wrong. Not only was he not about to get any rest, he would be called upon to save the world from an ancient evil he had unknowingly unleashed… ☆ Critic Quotes ☆ "It is a puzzle adventure game worthy of the detective skills of Edgar Allan Poe's Auguste Dupin." - Adventure Classic Gaming "The locations are realistically rendered and do create a fantastical atmosphere in the magical world, which feels mysterious and encourages you to discover its secrets." - Adventure Gamers ☆ Description ☆ Explore beautifully designed locations, converse with people to obtain clues, brew magic potions, inscribe scrolls, cast magic, and solve creative puzzles in this immersive game that will entertain you for hours. ☆ Fun things to do ☆ • Brew potions, then use them to solve puzzles • Inscribe scrolls, cast spells • Combine items to create new objects • Repair machine, craft objects to solve problems • Great music! Use Headphones if possible! ☆ Please rate the game if you like it! ☆ Find mysterious objects, solve clever puzzles, as you seek the solutions to the answered questions facing you. Is it possible that there is a reason to the nightmares, or are they, like most things in life, purely by chance? The promise of secrets hidden deep into the layers of time beckon you, and you know that this is not merely a matter of locating some hidden object, or avoiding a trap. This is something that can change the entire mankind. Pahelika: Revelations is a pure adventure game. It does not feature any hidden objects scenes. That said, there are objects hidden in the game which need to be found out, so fans of the hidden objects game genre will not be disappointed... For Updates to Pahelika: Revelations and news on release of new games, follow us on Twitter or Facebook (Copy & Paste the links in your browser). Twitter Handle: http://twitter.com/Ironcode_Gaming Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/Ironcode.Gaming Website: http://www.ironcode.com
release_text: Pahelika: Revelations: Hidden Object Adventure Now supports over 5300 Devices!

description: ¡Toda la información que necesitás para andar en bici por Buenos Aires, en un solo lugar! La aplicación cuenta con: 1) Mapa de disponibilidad: - Ver en tiempo real la disponibilidad de Ecobicis y anclajes en cada estación (sistema público de bicicletas de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires). - Ver la ubicación de cada estación de Ecobicis. - Bicicleterías con información de contacto, bicicleteros para estacionar tu bici, bicisendas y locales con descuentos por ir en bici. - Muestra tu ubicación actual en el mapa mediante gps o internet. - ¡No es necesaria una conexión a Internet! Si te quedaste sin conexión de datos, ¡no importa! vas a tener toda la información disponible. - Desde el menú podés seleccionar qué categorías ver, para visualizar mejor el mapa. - Desde el menú escribinos si ves información faltante o incorrecta en el mapa y la agregaremos! 2) Acceso rápido para llamar al sistema de ecobici y retirar tu bici de forma más rápida. 3) Cronómetro para no olvidar cuando devolver tu bici. En Bici es una aplicación independiente, no dependemos del Gobierno de la Ciudad. ¡Los comentarios/sugerencias son bienvenidos! All the information you need to ride a bike in Buenos Aires, in one place! The application features: 1) Map Availability: - View real-time availability of Ecobicis and anchors at each station (public bicycle system of the City of Buenos Aires). - See the location of each station Ecobicis. - Bicycle Shops contact information, bikers to park your bike, bike paths and places with discounts for cycling. - Show your current location on the map using GPS or the Internet. - No Internet connection is needed! If you stay offline data, no matter! you'll have all available information. - From the menu you can select which categories see, to better visualize the map. - From the menu escribinos if you see missing or incorrect information on the map and add! 2) quick to call the system and remove your bike EcoBici faster access. 3) Timer to remember when returning your bike. Bike is a standalone application, not rely on the Government of the City. The comments / suggestions are welcome!
release_text: - Nuevo diseño! - Muestra en tiempo real la disponibilidad en las nuevas estaciones 24 hs de Ecobici. - Cronómetro para no olvidar cuando devolver la bici. - Formulario para contactarnos.

description: Play MagnoBot, a small robot with amazing powers. Your family has been kidnapped by mysterious strangers! Pick up the trail by following the oil puddles left by your leaky brother LubriBot. Wander around Zhu-Ji, the city oppressed by humans. Armed with your powerful magnets, control metal objects around you and dodge obstacles in front of you! Ready for the challenge? Crazy Magnets was created by students from ISART Digital, the Video Game and 3D Animation/VFX school, as part of their graduation project (class of 2013): David GIBAUD / Game Designer / Project Management Michel TOPUZOGLU / Game Designer / Project Management Léo MILLOT / Game Designer / Scénario / Narrative Alexandre LEBOURGEOIS / Game Designer / Level Design Romain DUBUC / Game Designer Programmer / Gameplay developer Clément MARCHAL / Game Programmer : I.A. / Gameplay developer Florian RENEAU / Game Designer Programmer / Gameplay developer Matthieu GOERIG / Game Artist / 3D Artist / Modeling Pauline GOSSELIN / Game Artist / 2D-3D Artist Xavier RYSINSKI / Game Artist / 3D Artist / 3D Animation Kevin DE LAURE / Music Sound Designer / Music Yannick TASSIN / Music Sound Designer / SFX

Set alarms to repeat by powerful date rules, which no other apps could do the same. This app is exactly the same as Power Alarm Clock. NO AD, NO IN APP CHARGE. Power Alarm Clock main features: 1. Define alarm and workday in complex date repeat rules. For example, "last Saturday of every month", "12, 16 and 23 of every month". See details in below section. 2. Combine two or more complex date rules to get more powerful result. For example, "from Monday to Friday of every week", plus "last Saturday of every month", then subtract "date range from 25/12/2012 to 28/12/2012". 3. Disable alarm of single time. For example, you set an alarm to ring at 7:30 every morning. It's possible to just disable the alarm of tomorrow morning, while all other alarms will still went off. 4. Disable alarms of selected date range. 5. Select any music in your device as alarm ringtone. 6. Ringtone & vibrate fade in when alarm went off. 7. Set an alarm to only ring or only vibrate. 8. Very large snooze button (turn on in preference). 9. Lock "Dismiss" and "Snooze" button for 2 seconds after alarm went off to prevent misoperation. 10. Lock "Dismiss" and "Snooze" button when device was in pocket to prevent misoperation. 11. Snooze time is configurable. 12. Show next alarm time and remaining time in status bar for easy access (can be disabled in preference). 13. Snoozed alarm will shown in status bar, you can dismiss it immediately. 14. If you don't response the alarm for sometime, it will automatically snooze for 3 times, then dismiss to save battery power. An notification message will leave in status bar so you know you miss it. 15. Speak alarm's name when rings (turn on in preference, currently only English supported). Date repeat rules supported: 1. Selected Dates. 2. Everyday. 3. Day of Week (Monday and Friday of every week). 4. Day of Week in Month (Second Monday and Tuesday of every month). 5. Last Day of Week in Month (Last Friday of every month). 6. Day of Month (3, 10 and 18 of every month). 7. Day Month Range (from 10 February to 15 March of every year). 8. Day Month Year Range (From 12/25/2012 to 12/28/2012). 9. Alarm X Off Y Days (Start from 12/24/2011, alarm 21 days then off 7 days in cycle). With these powerful date repeat rules, it is possible to set alarms just once, then it will went off on time so you don't have to worry about it everyday! Feel free to send me mail if you have any ideas, suggestions or needs any help for this app. (C) InfiniteSpace Studio, 2013 Jimmy F. Klarke, For Real Life

The South Carolina 511 mobile application provides real-time access to traffic and traveler information supplied by the South Carolina Department of Transportation (South Carolina DOT). Maps depict current traffic conditions, as well as incident and construction events that can impact traffic on all Interstate, U.S., and State Routes. DMS, HAR, alert, and weather information is also available. The map indicates the location of roadside cameras, which allow users to view current traffic conditions. As users move through the highway network, the app can keep track of their location on the map. South Carolina DOT's Twitter feeds are also accessible and provide information impacting traffic across the state's regions.
release_text: - Fixed an issue with the Evacuation Routes link.

description: Get notify about recent job vacancy over the Bangladesh. Very easy interface and user friendly with background job synchronization. No more wasting time finding your preferred job, its now in your hand.

The Marathon's World (www.marathonsworld.com) App is Here! Marathon's World is a social media website geared toward runners. Marathon・s World is picking up the pace in the running community. This dynamic website integrates races for runners to interact and share experiences and expertise. The App has finally arrived! Get Started: - Choose either running or cycling. - Clean, easy-to-read interface. - Per-kilometer pace table. - Real time map display of your route. - Post immediate results on the Marathon・s World website. - Fill in all details including, location, weather, as well as your post-run physical conditions for all running stats. - Upload and share photos. Wall: - An area for everyone to share their journals. - 'Like' your favorites and leave messages for other users. - View updates from both friends as well as others in your area. My Journal: - Display your personal log journal. - Easily track your monthly progress. - Friend List at your fingertips. - Personal information including running experience, total distance, cycling distance, annual distance, race schedules and stats. Races: - Displays most recent events. - Share and discuss all tracked races. - Add personal race stats. Post results, rankings and comments, as well as upload pictures to share. Home: - Display monthly and weekly running statistics. - Display notifications such as comments and messages. -With cloud interface you can easily log on to update, view or share your tracked information at any time.
release_text: - Fixed the bug from the home page crash

Mental challenge allows you to streamline your mind in a fun way! The game consists of four basic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division), in four different game modes, in the course of each of these, the application randomly select operations to solve. The game features a high score table where the highest scores appear in every game type. The 4 modes are: >60 seconds -. In this game you have to answer as many operations as you can in a minute. >Hit and increase.- You count with 60 seconds, each correct answer will increase 3 seconds and each incorrect answer will subtract 2 seconds. >Number lost.- Here you have to calculate the missing number in the operation. >Training.- Here you can make as many operations as you want with no time limit.
Are you tired to forget where are you parked your car in the mall?

Tulum is an asian(blacksea) ethnical instrument which has similarities with Bagpipe. It's sound is more dramatic then BagPipe. It is a harmonic instrument. It can sound 2 notes simultanously. It is the most different wind instrument in the world. With this app you can play realistic Tulum. description: Meteo Aeronautica Militare. Un'applicazione non ufficiale che fa uso delle immagini fornite dal sito dell'aeronautica militare italiana, meteoam.it. L'applicazione fornisce previsioni fino a 4 giorni di distanza, indicando la stato di agitazione del mare e la direzione dei venti sul mediterraneo. Le immagini fornite offrono l'altezza delle onde, il loro periodo e la direzione e velocità del vento. La WHDD fornisce l'altezza delle onde (Immagine di default). La WPDD fornice il periodo delle onde. La Normale fornisce lo stato del vento e del mare a 10 metri. Se l'applicazione si blocca all'avvio, o durante l'utilizzo, e' probabilmente dovuto ad una cattiva connessione internet. “Informazioni elaborate dal Servizio Meteorologico dell’Aeronautica Militare e  pubblicate sul sito www.meteoam.it” [tags] moto ondoso meteoam meteo am weather forecast sea level 10 metri correnti marine pesca traina fondale altezza onde periodo onde direzione media Weather Air Force. An unofficial application that makes use of images provided by the Italian Air Force website, meteoam.it. The application provides forecasts up to 4 days apart, indicating the state of agitation of the sea and the wind direction on the Mediterranean. The images are provided that the height of the waves, their period, and the direction and speed of the wind. The WHDD provides the height of waves (Image by default). The fornix WPDD the period of the waves. The Normal provides the status of the wind and sea to 10 meters. If the application crashes on startup, or during use, and 'probably due to a bad internet connection. "Information compiled by the National Weather Service and published on the website www.meteoam.it " [Tags] wave meteoam am weather weather forecast sea level 10 meters above current sea fishing trolling backdrop average height wave period, wave direction
release_text: Adesso l'applicazione, nel caso in cui l'Aeronautica Militare non abbia aggiornato le immagini, carichera` quelle della giornata precedente.

And best of all, you can create your own puzzles and share them with your friends! Can they beat your score? Find great alternatives to fast food wherever you are. Food Tripping locates the closest eateries, juice joints, farmers’ markets, microbreweries, and more. Driving in America, you see signs for fast food at every exit. But how do you find the better spots? Food Tripping, the GPS-based app, shows you great options close to you with a fun, simple interface that puts the good stuff at your fingertips. With a growing database of eateries, healthy food markets, farmers’ markets, juice joints, artisanals, microbreweries, organic coffee spots and more, Food Tripping makes it simple to find healthier and more thoughtful food while you’re on the road, or at home looking for inspiration. It’s a collaboration from SHFT.com and Ford Motor Company, in a partnership dedicated to helping conscious consumers find better options. Food Tripping has done a lot of the work, but we need you, the user, to share the many hidden gems and add to the options we’ve supplied. Be a part of the community we’re building on the shift toward a healthier, tastier food future. Features: • Discover healthy, sustainable food options near you or in the place you’re traveling to. • Search by location, name, popularity, and category. • Track the places you’ve been to and mark your favorite spots to come back later. • View contact details for each location. • Suggest new businesses offering healthy, local, sustainable fare. • Share the places you discover with your friends via Facebook, Twitter, and email. • Connect with SHFT to learn more about living a conscious lifestyle.

Daily expenses note is a note that students and also anyone who want to mark down or record down their expenses in every expect, most importantly is their food expenses. A lot of people like to control their own financial by using paper notes or books to record their daily or monthly expenses. But the traditional way of recording things is way too old and most of the people now uses smart phones to record every thing in their daily lives. That is why a Daily Expenses Note is needed for everyone of us, this application will automatically sum up your daily expenses recorded in the apps.A lots of students aren't well funded to study in universities and colleges, most of the students are relying on loans to further their studies in getting their degrees and diplomas certificates. Which is why they need a budget control and to control their own financials, first by controlling their expenses. Students don’t use books and notes any more and if they use their computer to mark down, they need to wait for the computer to turn on which is quite slow for an old computer.

Optimize your time and learn Japanese smartly. JA Audiobook is a unique and entertaining Japanese reading assistant that helps you acquire effective communication in Japanese, whether you are a beginner or you already have an intermediate level. JA Audiobook contains a series of texts in order of increasing difficulty with sound and background music for each text that will entertain and help you stay focused, or even touch you and make you laugh! At any time, press on a sentence in the text for detailed information: • Complete grammar fact sheets that explain the structures used. • Fact sheets on the Japanese particles and counters encountered in the sentence. • Many additional comments. • A list of words used in the sentence with their meaning. • A detailed Kanji sheet accompanied by a tool that will assess your writing. • The complete conjugation and verbal constructions for each verb. • Assess your understanding of the text with a quiz at the end of each text, and get access to the translation of the text. JA Audiobook is like a teacher who remains at your side, ready to assist you when you are stuck. The objective is to rapidly familiarize yourself with authentic Japanese content and easily assimilate it for reuse in your own statements. You may already know many Japanese words and have read many lessons, but you are still unable to understand and express yourself naturally. Working with the JA Audiobook texts: • You memorize syntactic patterns that become natural and automatic. • You will learn words in context. • You will learn how to read Kanji (Japanese characters) in texts. • Your reading of Hiragana and Katakana will flow better without you noticing. • You will have more confidence in your level in Japanese, and you will thus progress faster. JA Audiobook is the missing link between your knowledge of the language (a set of individual words and grammar rules) and communicative competence that you want to achieve. Because you do not want to become an encyclopedia of the Japanese language, but simply to talk with your Japanese friends or to watch Japanese shows on TV. By the numbers: • 20 texts for a total listening length of more than 60 minutes • 877 different words • 577 different Kanji used • 80 different grammar sheets • 74 different particle usages • 19 Japanese counters • Over 40MB of carefully crafted Japanese material and data to install • 9 Japanese native speakers to bring more variation and improve your listening List of texts included: • Usagi- san, an Unexpected Hero: funny and moving tale for beginners. (7 texts) • The Strange Encounter of Kenta: story between a young boy and an old lady, for beginners. (5 texts) • Don't be late for the meeting! : dialogue between two colleagues to learn the polite oral form. (1 text) • Tomoko’s Journal: introduction to the informal style in writing. (1 text) • City or Country?: argumentative conversation to express your opinion in Japanese. (1 text) • Barbecue with Friends: telephone conversation between two students in informal speech. (1 text) • Yumi - Not easy to be a father: humorous text between an overwhelmed father, and his daughter. Colloquial and oral language is highlighted. (1 text) • Yumi - I want a tablet! : dialog between two schoolgirls. Oral forms are used. (1 text) • Cultural Experience in Japan: learn to tell about your trip to Japan in Japanese with more complex sentences that prepare you for the next level. (2 texts) These texts will mainly help you to take the JLPT N5 and JLPT N4. Once the texts are downloaded, no Internet connection is required. JA Audiobook is fully available in ENGLISH and FRENCH. To fully utilize JA Audiobook, it is advisable to know Hiragana and Katakana. If this is not the case or if you do not know what it is, install the free JA Sensei application, a complementary and comprehensive application which will teach you all the necessary basics and much more.

description: A super simple baby name generator app called Kick to Name. Kick to Name let's unborn babies kick to choose their own name! Parents, take a load off, and let your baby make the big name decision. And what fun to tell them one day that that they chose their own name! Open the app to the "Kick" page, choose whether you want a girl name or boy name. Then, place phone face down on mommy’s tummy while baby is active. When a kick is found, the app will sound a chime and display your baby's name choice from a list of thousands. You will have the option to "Add to Favorites" or "Discard" the name given by the baby name generator. -- Also, search baby names from the "List" page where there are thousands to choose from. Add as many as you want to your Favorites. -- Let baby kick to choose from your Favorites list (aka, your short list!) -- Even add your own crazy baby names to the Favorites list (if you somehow cannot find it on the Kick to name baby name generator list.) Then let baby kick his or her choice! Kick to Name, the end all baby name generator app for android has put the fun factor back in the baby naming process. Let the baby naming begin! Ready, Set, Kick! Apphouse Software has created this app purely for "kicks", pardon the pun, and for the fun of expectant parents everywhere. Enjoy!

Description: Also Try our new game "Mutant Penguins" a fast paced brain game https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jaykalabs.penguin Real Water Falls 3 Live Wallpaper animates a single photo of a small cascading waterfall flanked by flowers into a really flowing spectacular and realistic Water Fall using OpenGL. It is not a cheap frame loop. It also consumes very less memory and battery. If you like this app try day dream of this at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jaykalabs.waterfalls3dd Permissions Real Water Falls 3 is absolutely free of ads. We do not access any information from your phone. Usage Real Water Falls 3 does not get displayed in launcher. It is available in live wallpaper selection menu only. You can customize the speed of water by changing the "Speed Factor" in settings. For best quality set a value between 1 to 2 (1.0 is recommended) Credits Image uses stock image from Free range stocks http://freerangestock.com/ We are planning to add more free android live wallpapers. Please continue to motivate us by rating this app. For feedback and complaints you may contact us.

MagicMarker is a simple touch-paint program for writing and drawing neon-style on a black background. It includes easy options to set your drawings as wallpaper or share via mail/mms/facebook/twitter. The permissions for Internet access are used only for displaying an ad on the color screen. Ads can be disabled with a one-time purchase via Menu/Remove.
release_text: Create and share neon-style drawings - Version 3.52

INCLUDES 6 THEMES FOR THE PRICE OF 1 GO SMS Girly Zebra Theme GO Launcher Girly Zebra Theme GO Contacts Girly Zebra Theme GO Locker Girly Zebra Theme Girly Zebra Keyboard Skin Girly Zebra GO Keyboard Theme Requirements This theme requires ALL of the following be installed on your device to use the complete theme. All applications listed below can be downloaded for free from the Google Play Store. GO Launcher (Free) GO SMS Pro (Free) GO Contacts (Free) GO Locker (Free) Keyboard Application (Smart Keyboard Trial or Pro version, Perfect Keyboard Pro, etc.) Description This is a Zebra theme with a Girly zebra print with colors of black, purple, and pink! If you LOVE Girly zebra print then this is the theme for you! Very girly yet still clean and classy. Features *1,000 Girly zebra icons *2 Custom Zebra print wallpapers *Custom font (see installation instructions below) Installation GO SMS: 1. Open GO SMS Pro 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Contacts: 1. Open GO Contacts 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Locker 1. Open GO Locker 2. Press the menu button on your phone 3. Select Themes 4. Select the theme and hit apply GO Launcher 1. Press the menu button on your phone after installing GO Launcher 2. Select Themes 3. Select the theme and hit apply Custom Font To install the custom font in GO SMS Pro follow these steps: 1. Open GO SMS Pro 2. Select Settings 3. Select Advanced Settings 4. Select Appearance Settings 5. Scan font packages You can then change each of the different areas (conversation, conv. list, and Popup window) to you liking and change the font. The font that is used is called Zebra [ Girly Zebra Theme]. You can also install the custom font in GO Launcher by going to Preferences, Visual Settings, Font, then select Scan font and then just select the Zebra Font. description: I am proud to present you the Steampunk GOkeyboard Theme. Thank you for trying it out. I've been away for a a few years and stopped development of themes. I hope to continue this year and will bring some freshly rusted Steampunk stuff along real soon. Thank you again. Please read instructions below to get this theme working. You will need to download the latest GOkeyboard Application from the market before applying this theme. Grab it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jb.emoji.gokeyboard Once you have the above installed. Open GoKeyboard from your app drawer. Then Tap Menu > Display > Themes > Installed Themes > Tap Steampunk > Apply. Reboot your phone, as I find this helps top clear the cache and once it's restarted - you should hopefull;y have the Steampunk Keyboard. If not drop me an email using the links below and I will assist you further I hope you all like this as much as you have my others. Please contact me directly by email if you experience any issues before rating low. A very big thank you to all you great people who always go out of your way to contact me and rate my apps. You know who you are :) You guys and girls rock - thank you very much. If you would like to contact me, please use any of the means below. I'm always happy to hear from you. Don't be shy. Follow: https://twitter.com/@mindseedDesign Like: http://www.facebook.com/mindseed.design Plus: https://plus.google.com/109275982008448960608/posts Visit: http://www.mindseed.co.za Email: mindseed.design@gmail.com

description: NOW JOBS WILL FIND YOU! Complete your profile in just a few seconds and start receiving the most relevant job offers, generated by our own unique algorithm. Key features: [+] PERSONAL SUGGESTIONS : you no longer have to waste time on a time-consuming job search! Thanks to our job matching algorithm - that looks for matches through over a million job offers - you won’t miss a job opportunity again. [+] SEARCH JOBS : do you prefer searching for jobs yourself? You can also search for jobs with incredible ease, filtering by city, sector or simply entering keywords relevant to your dream job. [+] MANAGE OFFERS : browse conveniently through your applied, discarded or saved jobs. You can also track how your applications are progressing and be contacted by your future employers! [+] OTHERS : apply any time and anywhere with just one swipe, check your brand new mobile resume, be the first to notice a new job opening that match your preferences - and all of this is 100% FREE! Please send your suggestions or questions about our job search app, jobandtalent, to: app.support@jobandtalent.com
release_text: V2.2.6 Hi! I'm Ana from jobandtalent. On top of my multiple duties, I'm now in charge of telling you what's new in our latest versions... This time we bring you, besides tons of bugfixing, a brand new signup experience. It is easier to understand, much more leaner and beautiful. Hope you like it!

description: 4W is a simple tool for the management of jobs and small projects. It is an essential tool for contractors, small businesses and personal use. Our users are saying: -------------------------------- 4W Job Management is a must have for any trade. It does everything you need to track jobs, customers and scheduling. (Rob Drewsironworks) WOW!! The most AMAZING APP for my work! I have been scouring the android app list for months. Finally an app that meets my work needs. Plus many benefits I thought would NEVER BE OFFERED. This is a lifesaver, Light years ahead of all the other managers. THANKS!!!!! (John Dickson) Features: • Manage your jobs with an intuitive job description: Who, What, Where and When (4W). • Simple to use CRM features. • Add your own custom fields. • Seamlessly integrate your Contacts, Calendar Events and SMS messages. • Enter a simple or extensive job description, text and voice notes, and job/meeting locations. • Jobs can include a hierarchical list of job items. Jobs and job items can include a to do list. • Time and mileage entry with data export to csv file. (For Excel etc.) • Sync your phone and tablet data plus optionally send task and job data to others. (Sync is a payable subscription service) The application has... • Basic finance features only. (no estimates, no invoices no financial reports) • [Tech: No support for app2sd for database performance reasons] Permissions: To understand more about how the app is using permissions, scroll down to the Understanding Permissions below. Please note that 4W Task Manager is optimized for phone-sized screens. However, it is fully operational on tablets. 4W Task Manager was previously called OnTheJob Job Management. This application is not related to the Macintosh software called On The Job. Target users: Contractors, Small businesses and more. Understanding Permissions ------------------------- The app is using a variety of permissions, all required to make it easier to do your job. Many of the permissions are required to use the full- featured Calendar. If you want to know more about which permissions are needed for what, read on… • Modify/delete USB storage contents: Allows voice recordings and pictures taken within the app to be stored on the SD card saving internal phone memory. • Read/Edit SMS or MMS: Required to display all SMS/MMS messages exchanged with your customers and allows you to delete a message. Note that the app does not send SMS/MMS messages itself, but instead opens your normal SMS/ MMS app. • Display system-level alerts: Allows the app to show the 4W widget while in a phone call. • Prevent phone/tablet from sleeping: Required by the Calendar to enable all its features. • Record audio: Used by the built-in voice recorder. Voice recording can be used for notes and job descriptions. • Google mail • Use the authentication credentials of an account • Add or modify calendar events and send email to guests • Read calendar events: Required by the Calendar to enable all its features. • Read/write contact data: Allows the app to integrate your phone contacts as customers. You can then edit contacts from inside the app. • Read sensitive log data: In case of an application crash, the app automatically creates an email with log crash information and asks for your permission to send it to Job Crafts. No information is ever sent without your approval. • Full Internet access: Required by the Calendar. • Intercept outgoing calls, Read phone state and identity: Allows the app to show the 4W widget while in a phone call, which allows you to open the 4W app without leaving the call screen. • Receive data from Internet: This Google cloud messaging (GCM) permission is used for 4W data sync. • Discover known accounts, Control vibrator: Required by the Calendar and used by the task alerts.
release_text: Version 2.7.0.2: • Resolved a sync server issue introduced by Google on July 18th, 2015. ------------------------------------------------- Version 2.7: • Added distinct view and edit modes for job screen. • Added an option to move/copy job item and its children to another job. • Added an option to sort job list by description. • Added an option to add To Do/Schedule/Time to job items directly from a job's item list.

You can switch between ounces and milliliters and Water tracker update take care of all magnitudes for you. * Easy use. You can create 3 different types of containers which facilitates and speeds up data entry . With an eye-catching and easy to use interface Water tracker is the best option to keep track of your hydration. Download it now only play in google

This a a free trial for the app Paramedic Meds. This is a full version trial that allows you to run the app 3 times. Paramedic Meds is a great tool for medics in the field. This medical app contains nearly 100 of the most common used drugs and drips for quick reference at your finger tips. It also includes calculators to give you either mL/hr or gtt/min. With each drug you will quickly be able to see its class, action, indications, contraindications, precautions, side effects, routes, adult dosing, and pediatric dosing. Paramedic Meds also gives you the standard infusion rates for certain medications. You can add your own drugs, customize any drug, and hide drugs that you don't use. Internet access is required to use this trial, however it is NOT required for the paid version. STORAGE permission is required for the Backup/Restore feature. Medications included: Acetaminophen Activated Charcoal Adenosine Albumin Albuterol Aminophylline Amiodarone Amrinone Amyl Nitrite Aspirin Atenlol Atropine Bretylium Bumetanide Calcium Chloride Calcium Gluconate Captopril Cefotaxime Cimetidine Clopidogrel Dexamethasone Dextrose 25%, 50% Diazepam Digoxin Diltiazem Dimenhydrinate Diphenhydramine Dobutamine Dopamine Epinephrine (both 1:1000 and 1:10000) Epinephrine Drip Esmolol Etomidate Famotidine Fentanyl Flumazenil Furosemide Glucagon Haloperidol Heparin Hydrocortisone Hydromorphone Hydroxyzine Insulin Ipratropium Isoetharine Isoproterenol Ketorolac Ketamine Labetalol Levalbuterol Lidocaine Lorazepam Magnesium Sulfate Mannitol Meperidine Metaproterenol Methylprednisolone Metoclopramide Metoprolol Midazolam Morphine Nalbuphine Naloxone Nicardipine Nifedipine Nitroglycerin (Drip and SL) Nitropaste Nitroprusside Nitrous Oxide Norco Norepinephrine Ondansetron Oxygen Oxytocin Pancuronium Phenobarbital Phenylephrine Phenytoin Pralidoxime Procainamide Prochlorperazine Promethazine Propanolol Propofol Racemic Epinephrine Rocuronium Sodium Bicarbonate Succinycholine Terbutaline Thiamine Torsemide TPA Vasopressin Vecuronium Verapamil We also offer great support for this app. Want us to add a drug? New: The creator of Iowa Police Field Reference has release a new app to make drunk driver testing easier and more accurate. Scroll down or search the market for "SFST Wizard" to learn more. Iowa Police Field Reference is an application for police officers, deputies, attorneys, criminal justice students, and other law enforcement professionals in the state of Iowa. It features a browseable, searchable database of the entire Iowa Criminal Code, Iowa Traffic Law, and other selected chapters that are useful in the daily duties of a law enforcement officer as well as a variety of additional reference material. Users can also mark commonly referenced statutes as "favorites" for even faster access. Features include: No internet access required Complete Iowa Criminal Code Chapter 321 - Iowa Traffic Law Fine Compendium Speeding Citation Calculator Court Date Finder Driver's License Classes/Endorsements/Restrictions. Dark interface for use night or day. Flexible search system to rapidly find the appropriate statute for any situation. Ability to share statutes with friends or fellow officers via email or text message. APCO 10 Codes (Radio Ten Codes) Uniform Bond Schedule Miranda Warning Phonetic Alphabet Drug Endangered Children Protocols
release_text: Changed in 2.0.2: -Fixed bug that was causing search to crash for some users. Changed in 2.0.1: -Updated Iowa Code (Effective 1/1/2015. Will update for laws effective 7/1/2015 as soon as Iowa publishes them) -Updated Compendium (7/1/2015)

description: In 1930, the prestigious Prof. Baboo teaches Archeology at the university. Although he is actually pretty clueless, Baboo always wants to impress his favorite student, Dorothy, for whom he feels "something special". Dorothy is a nerdy student; even though she is not very attractive, she is sharp and determined. Both will live an incredible adventure inside the Pyramid of Khafre. After getting lost in a university trip, they end up in the most dismal chamber of the pyramid. After desecrating it, they fall under the curse of Anubis, being hopelessly trapped. Together they must find a way to break the curse, and face the fearsome Mummy that inhabits the pyramid, as well as other dangers and mysteries. Prof. Baboo and the Chamber of Chaos is a game that blends action and adventure with the spirit of the classics. Step into the characters’ shoes and explore scenarios, delve for secret passages, examine the maps and make use of helpful objects to make progress in the adventure. Unravel the mysteries of the secret chambers, including the Chamber of Chaos, the most enigmatic of all. Luckily, there are clues hidden in the notes and maps that the eminent archeologist J.L. Burckhardt left scattered long after his investigation of the pyramid’s secrets. But the adventure has just begun, and, in the end, the most amazing and best kept archeological secret will be revealed.

The power of magic Candy is in your hands! Switch and match 3 or more Candy to walk through more than 100 levels in this completely new puzzle adventure. Candy Deluxe is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles! With Candy style Candy to eliminate in each level, Candy Deluxe is twice the fun but familiar to play. So let's get started now! How to Play: - Swap the Candy to match 3 or more in a line to remove them - Match the Candy until the board become Translucent - If all block boards where the Candy exists are translucent,you win,if not,you lose.good luck! Game Features: - Match 4 Candy can win 1 Lighting Candy. - Lighting Candy can eliminate Candy in one row or column - Match 5 Candy can win the Color-changing Candy. - The Color-changing Candy can eliminate to any other colored Candy. - Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface. - Sharp and animated visuals bring this Candy tale to life. - Easy and fun to start but a challenge to get 3 stars in each level Thanks for playing!

EcoDrive Speedometer is a unique GPS speedometer allowing you to save your fuel, time and also enhancing safety. Besides, it helps you to avoid penalties and reach the destination first! ● The motion efficiency indicator on the base of velocity, speedup and elevations analysis, permits you to correct your driving style and reduce fuel consumption in real time. ● Personalized audio warnings help you to keep maximum speed allowed and not exceed it, at the same time keeping an eye on the road and saving your time. EcoDrive Speedometer is a powerful and handy instrument. ● All useful indicators are on the main screen, thus allowing you to control the elapsed distance, time, acceleration, height, maximum and average speed. You can switch between indicators of maximum and average speed, haul and time of various periods with a single touch. ● All the speedometer functions are available in a background mode too, even when the screen is off, while the speedometer window shows the speed above other applications (i.e. navigation software) and can be in every point of the screen*. ● EcoDrive Speedometer is supported all types of overland, aerial and naval transport and also all sports, where speed, distance, time and acceleration are important. Walking, bicycling or mountain skiing - anytime and anywhere you want to know speed or altitude/distances you overcome, how long your workout lasted, you cannot do without EcoDrive Speedometer. The main unique features: • Versatile scale of analogue speedometer → Customizable manual or automatic 1-1000 ml/h (km/h) scale limit → Customizable indicator type (an arrow or a bar) • Digital speed indicator • System of units options • Indicator of instant and average fuel (energy) efficiency for various time frames • Audio warning of overspeed (three customizable parameters) • Floating (overlay) speedometer window over all other applications • Background mode • Extended statistics for various time frames* and user's counter → Mileage → Overall time → Running time → Stop time → Maximum speed → Average speed → Average efficiency → Maximum acceleration and braking (ml/h per sec or km/h per sec) → The highest and lowest points of the track (above sea level) Good luck on the roads! * In free version, "floating window" option is available for 7 trial days. * In free version, the statistics for some periods is not available.

象棋巫师Android版是象棋百科全书网委托jpcxc工作室开发的移动平台象棋游戏，与象棋巫师Windows版一样有着超群的棋艺，是手机用户感受中国象棋乐趣的最佳选择。 　　象棋巫师Android版开局灵活多变，中残局也具有相当的对弈水平，另有多种难度和让子设置，可增加对弈的趣味性；支持一键分享，通过微博记录精彩对局，同时分享给好友；内置上千盘杀局习题，提供存档、指导等功能，帮助象棋爱好者提高棋艺、体验象棋乐趣。 　　象棋巫师Android版内置了竞技场，与象棋巫师Windows版的竞技场同步。竞技场模拟20多种不同水平的对手，适合各种层次的象棋爱好者评价自己的棋艺；采用ELO等级分评级系统，跟众多象棋爱好者一起参与成绩的排名，享受棋艺进步的快乐。 Chess Wizards Chess Encyclopedia Android version is network commissioned jpcxc studio developed mobile platform chess game, chess wizard with the same Windows version has a superior chess, Chinese chess is a fun mobile phone users experience the best choice. Chess Wizards flexible start Android version, the chess pieces also have considerable levels, and a variety of difficulty and let the child set, increase the fun of chess; support for a key share, through the microblogging record exciting game, while sharing Tell a friend; built-disc scrapping thousands of exercises, providing archiving, guidance and other features to help improve chess chess enthusiasts to experience the fun of chess. A must have for any Muslim. With Masjid Now, you can check your local salah times for any day of the year, find nearby mosques, and determine the direction of the Qiblah using your phone's compass capabilities. Set notifications so that you are alerted when the time for salah arrives, or a reminder so that you know there is only a few minutes left before the next salah comes in. Masjid Now also allows you to add mosques to our ever-growing database, helping other Muslims to find a place to pray when they are traveling. Features: - Islamic Prayer Times *University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi *Islamic Society of North America *Muslim World League *Umm al-Qura, Makkah *Egyptian General Authority of Survey *Institude of Geophysics, University of Tehran *Jafari/Ithna Ashari - Find/Add Masjids - Determine Qiblah direction - 4 Muezzins for Adhan - Time Left until next salah - Reminders to pray - DayDream with next prayer time - NEW - Four (4) sizes of prayer widgets

description: "Recommended by Appgovideo.com ( http://www.appgovideo.com/ )" Review video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2qaoTuJWJaM The key different feature for this app are: 1. Hide the app icon in your phone. This need your phone call permission, because the only way to open this app is: Call a secret number. 2. Hide the record file from camera. 3. Take picture in silent mode without root your phone. So no one can know you have a camera app in your phone. Please try the trial version to make sure everything works in your phone, the HD video did not work in some phone. The app name is notepad after installed, this will help you to hide the purpose of this app. If you input a wrong password it will open a fake notepad app. 1. Take low resolution picture silently, if you remove the camera sound file, you also can take video and high resolution picture silently. The silent camera function may have sound for video, but if you check the FAQ, you will find the solution for it. 2. Press the volume up/down (+/-) button, or touch the screen, it will take picture or start/stop taking video. 3. Support gesture, you can use gesture to change the fake preview background or the transparency of the fake preview, very handy. 4. Continuous shot automatically, you do not need to press anything, just hold the phone and it will take picture automatically. 5. Multiple fake preview style. Easy changed transparent screen. It just turn your phone to a hidden camera. No one will notice you are using camera. 6. High resolution video support. 7. Autohide picture into magic files. Turn your camera be a private camera. 8. Password protection for the app. 9. Very greatful way to hide the picture into magic file. This is the key feature it is not just add a nomedia file or rename your picture file name. 10. Create shortcut to the home screen, very useful. 11. It also can be a photo vault, video vault to hide the picture and video and other files. 12. Schedule Snap is support now, set a time to take picture automatic. 13. You can use the nomedia feature to hide the picture folder from the gallery app. 14. Support frond camera when taking picture. I searched in market, it looks this is the only app which support front camera. 15. Another amazing feature is instant camera function, you can set a wake up action, when you wake up the phone, this action will be start automatic, it will save the camera starting time, so you will not miss any chance to take a good picture. You can take picture as fast as you can. 16. Another amazing feature to hide the app icon from your phone, no one can find this app unless he know your secret number, you can dial that secret number to open this app. 17. You also can change the preview size now. Change it to a smaller window to hide the camera action. 18. The camera zoom function is support now, press menu button you can zoom camera, either zoom in/out are only support in picture mode, it does not support video mode now. So if you want to take a picture or video of your friend without him knowing? This app has got you covered, so to speak. The app isn't limited to those basic functions--it boasts many useful features. These include the ability to take continuous pictures every five seconds (or whatever time interval you set), various preview screen modes, and the ability to schedule photos and videos in advance. It suppresses shutter sounds, flash, and other giveaways. Take a picture or a video by simply and unobtrusively pressing the volume key or tab screen. Totally sneaky and well faked screen style. Compared to: SilentSnap, Silent Camera, sneaky camera, One Eye, Now it summer time, use this app, you can take a picture with girls in the street or beach or bus station without any awkward moment. description: SONGoLOGIST is a mobile songbook, guitar chord library, and sheet music editor in one. Browse hundreds of songs from pop, rock, country, jazz, R&B and more. A comprehensive chord dictionary with over 1000 chords is accessible from within each song so you’ll never miss a beat to switch apps. You can also create, edit and share your own songs via email or QR code. Each song in the app is checked for accuracy and presented using easy to read chord charts. Songologist is the best alternative to tab websites and an indispensable tool for musicians of all levels. SONGoLOGIST's 700+ song library, browsable by artist, title, genre, country, or language, is expanding on a daily basis with the most popular songs from around the world. Songs are displayed on your phone, tablet, or computer using standard chord symbols (e.g. C, G-, F7b9) in a chord sheet format. Tap or click any chord symbol to reveal a chord diagram for guitar. Song transposition is fully automated to accommodate any vocal range. The SONGoLOGIST editor allows you to create, publish, and share your own songs. The groundbreaking ChordBoard allows you to enter chords as though you were using a word processor complete with copy, cut and paste. Many elements of standard musical notation can be used such such as repeats, codas, bar lines, and section symbols (ABCD, V, PC etc) and a variety of time signatures (3/4, 4/4, 6/8, and even 5/4, and 7/8).
release_text: • Chord chart symbol displays just the selected chord • Chord-slashes are shown on empty beats • Chord chart view has been updated to display both bar-lines and chord-slashes • In edit mode user can now add new chord variations • Settings screen is updated, now Chord Slashes and Grid can be toggled • Transpose Song form is simplified • Song Submission screen is fixed

description: Caribbean Poker is an American casino game similar to five-card stud poker. However, unlike in standard stud poker game, you play against the house rather than against other players. There is no bluffing or other deception. Real poker strategy is applied. This app is a great time-killing solo game that allows you play anywhere on your phone or tablet with or without WiFi. If you're a poker fan, it also helps you sharpen your skills without risking a cent. Enjoy and good luck! P.S. The first release is dedicated to my wife, Alice Teh, for her birthday.

You may switch it on in the settings. 1.6 Airpush has been removed.

description: Do you like to solve crossword puzzles? Or do you make crossword puzzles? Then this app will stand with you side by side to face the challenge. - Large word/clue collection: the app is built on top of a database of 240K+ words and over 2 million clues, which were collected from major daily newspapers in the past 50 years! - Bi-directional search: the app has two modes: CLUE TO WORD and WORD TO CLUE. CLUE TO WORD mode is for crossword solvers, while WORD TO CLUE is for crossword puzzle makers. - No microSD card required. Your phone/tablet doesn't have a microSD slot? No problem. Unlike some other large apps, it doesn't need one. Note: When you run Crossword Clue Finder for the first time, it will automatically install the database. The process may take a few minutes to finish, but you only need to do it once.

This is the Pro version of IELTS Vocabulary. Here're the highlights: - About 8500 words (4000 more than the lite version) - No ads IELTS, or International English Language Testing System, is an international standardized test of English language proficiency. There are two versions of the IELTS: the Academic Version and the General Training Version: - The Academic Version is intended for those who want to enroll in universities and other institutions of higher education and for professionals such as medical doctors and nurses who want to study or practice in an English-speaking country. - The General Training Version is intended for those planning to undertake non-academic training or to gain work experience, or for immigration purposes. IELTS is accepted by most Australian, British, Canadian, Irish, New Zealand and South African academic institutions, over 3,000 academic institutions in the United States, and various professional organizations. It is also a requirement for immigration to Australia and New Zealand. In Canada, IELTS, TEF, or CELPIP are accepted by the immigration authority. Being able to use a rich vocabulary is a major advantage in the IELTS and will certainly help you get a higher score. It will also be beneficial in your academic, personal and professional life. This IELTS Vocabulary Pro app will help you achieve your goal more efficiently: - The database contains a list of about 8500 IELTS words with pronunciation and a brief definition. - It uses 3 different approaches (Word List, Flashcard and Quiz) to fit in different students’ study habits. - You may mark the words that you’re not familiar with and review only those marked words in Flashcard mode. - It tracks your progress and results for all quizzes you take. Be better prepared!

Bitcoin ticker widget with crash detector Homepage: http://jurekovac.wix.com/bitcrash Functions: - Bitcoin exchanges: Major bitcoin exchanges are supported: Bitstamp, MtGox, BTC-e, BTCChina, Vircurex, Kraken. Support for other exchanges and currencies will be added in future versions. Several alts within these exchanges, are also supported. - Crash Detector: BitCrash detects when currency change diminish drastically over short period of time and indicates the crash by lightning icon in info area and notification. - Trend indicator arrows: Instant trends are indicated by nice graphical arrows on the left. Also, on the right, there is an info icon that indicates long term trends and trend reversals. - Alarm Notifications: Alarm notifications can be enabled to alarm you of currency crash. Also high and low alarms can be set to alert you of currency value above or below certain level. NOTE: - Allow at least 30 ticks before info icons (long term trends, crashes) start showing. - This app is early work: Feedback and contributions of any kind are deeply appreciated to support further development. Ski Buddy is not your typical "ski tracker" app that gives your ski statistics at the end of the day, after the fact. Instead, Ski Buddy gives your ski statistics in real time as you ski by speaking over your earphones. Your speed, altitude, distance traveled, and time of day are spoken at user selected intervals. In addition, a unique "ski mode" gives statistics for each run as it is completed. When you get off the lift at the top and start skiing down, you will hear "Starting new run". Ski Buddy will record your top speed, average speed, distance, vertical, and duration as you ski down the run. When you get on the lift at the bottom and start back up, a run report will automatically be spoken. Run reports can also be sent to your Android Wear watch. When you get off the lift at the top again and start back down, the process will repeat. Run statistics are saved as is the track for the run. At any time, you can review the statistics for your runs as well as view the track of the run on a map. Ski Buddy is truly a new kind of ski app that gives your ski statistics in real time as you ski. Plus Features: - Expanded reporting in Ski Mode. Top speed, average speed, vertical drop, distance traveled and duration are reported for each run. Both spoken reports and notifications to Android Wear include these statistics. - A Ski Statistics display provides viewing of cumulative values for duration, distance and vertical, and overall top speed and average speed across all runs. In addition this display allows viewing of the stats for each individual run. - Runs can be viewed on Google Maps which shows ski lifts and runs for many resorts. Markers show the locations of the run start, top speed, and finish. Pan and zoom are supported, as are normal, satellite, hybrid, and terrain views. - Screen colors can be customized to your liking. - Option to Suppress Repeats. When this option is set, speed and altitude values will not be spoken if they are the same as the previously spoken value. - Application audio is automatically muted during incoming phone calls. - If music is playing, it will be paused while the app speaks. - Option to calculate altitude from barometric pressure instead of GPS.
release_text: - Added support for Android Wear - Run reports can be sent to your Android Wear smartwatch - A new setting was added to enable/disable notifications to smartwatches - Bug fixes

description: ■どんなゲーム？ だいたい死ぬADV。 場所の移動や選択肢を選ぶ際に、 「次の展開に重要そうだな」と思うアイテムを選んでから、行動してみてください。 うまく危機を回避できるかもしれません。 間違うと、うっかり死にます。 むしろ死なないと、回避の糸口がわからないと思います。 ※入手しただけではアイテムは効果を発揮しません。 「次に重要なアイテムを考える」で選択しておく必要があります。 　　　 ■ストーリー 夏の雨の夜、大学生の内井涼（うちい　りょう）は山で遭難してしまう。 運良く洋館を見つけるが、そこで幽霊少女の綾月初希（あやつき　はつき） によって閉じ込められてしまう。 洋館から生還するには、初希が仕掛けてくる危機を回避しきらなければならない。 果たして、初希の罠を回避して、館から脱出することは可能なのか？

MNLaw Series - Prevention of Cruelty to Animals - Chapter 343 - Minnesota Law / Statutes. *NEW APP DESIGN - Easier search This app is designed for police and law enforcement professionals but could be beneficial to those who want to learn more about the laws of the State of Minnesota. Need to know the prayer times with a more convenient way? Introducing iSolat (Info Solat) for your Android smartphone! It can display the daily prayer times for all the major cities of Malaysia, as well as remind you when it's time for prayer. Features: - ✔ Display prayer times for all major cities of Malaysia. ✔ Locations can be changed automatically or manually. ✔ Prayer times data throughout the year. ✔ Suitable for those that didn't subscribe the data plan. ✔ Display the prayer times for a specific date. ✔ Display prayer times using widget. ✔ Prayer times only needs to be downloaded once a year. ✔ Prayer times from JAKIM / State Islamic Council. ✔ Prayer times notification (adhan, takbir or notification tone). ✔ Qibla indicator. ✔ Nearest mosque & musholla ✔ Accurate hijri date. ✔ No ads. ✔ Awarded for free. Note: - Qibla indicator depends entirely on your smartphone's built-in compass, to get the right direction: i) Calibrate your phone, if the qibla indicator not point to the right direction, it's most likely that you didn't calibrate your phone, calibrate your phone by holding the phone in your hand and move the device in a figure 8. example: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sP3d00Hr14o ii) Keep your phone away from any electrical equipment. example: computer, TV, radio, etc.. iii) Not stay in a vehicle during getting the qibla direction. iv) Not getting the qibla direction while charging the battery. - Prayer times and qibla indicator are for Malaysia only. - If you force the app to close, please rerun iSolat to reactivate the prayer times notification (adhan or notification tone). Please leave your review and rating!
