description: enTeacher is a collection of exercises and tests for learning and improving English language on different difficulty levels. You can learn new words, correct usage of words in various contexts, grammar and use of English in various situations. Options Choosing Options from the main menu you can change the language of the interface and sound options. Attention: Do not mute all the sounds when you are going to do Listening Comprehension exercises. Modes Each exercise can be launched in LEARN or TEST mode. In LEARN mode, when you give a wrong answer, the question will be repeated later, and the exercise will end only when you finally give correct answers to all the questions. In TEST mode, each question is asked only once, and you will get a mark in 1-6 scale at the end of the test based on the percentage of good answers. Types of exercises There are 6 types of exercises. Each type is represented by a different look of icons: - Choose the proper caption for the picture. - Drag the words and put them under the corresponding pictures. - Type the name of the object in the picture. - Choose the word or phrase which best completes the sentence. - Listen to the material and then choose the correct answer. Difficulty levels Different difficulty levels are represented by the colour of icons: - Very easy - Easy - Lower intermediate - Upper intermediate - Difficult - Very difficult Over 500 exercises (50 exercises are free, rest are paid). If you want to contact us, have questions or suggestions, send e-mail to support@nahliksoft.com or SMS to +48 601 453 194

Introducing FanMango movie review app, providing reviews has never been so easy & interesting. This can become the next Indian IMDB movie review App. It quickly provides rating & reviews of the latest, upcoming movies currently showing in theaters. FanMango is an engaging, fast & user friendly movie review app in the market. Want to go for a movie but tired of searching the web for movie reviews on your smartphone while deciding which movie to watch in the theater? FanMango app provides movie information & ratings at your fingertips. You can also Rate & Review any movie using this app. FanMango features : View Now Showing Movies View Coming Soon Movies View Rating & Review Rate & Review Movie Rate/Review & Share Search Movies Watch Movie Trailer View Movie Release Date Bollywood Movie Reviews View details of Movie like Cast, Director, Release Date, Genre etc Share Reviews. Share it using Whatsapp, Google+ etc Play Quiz based on movies (Hollywood & Bollywood) Earn Points by reviewing movies.

This app will be a useful guide in finding all Bangalore Bus Routes, Bus Number and Timing info related Bangalore Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC). It covers all the areas in Bangalore served by BMTC. Key features of the app are as follows, •Find bus route between two Bus stops. •See Timings for the searched bus routes. •Get Bus Fare and distance info. •Search buses based on bus number. •Get list of all bus stops in a route. •For searched routes get bus stop info and location on Map •Covers all AC and non-AC buses in Bangalore BMTC including Bangalore International airport (BIA) buses. •Suggests possible transient locations, if no direct bus route is available. This app is built to be fast, simple, easy to use and lightweight. With less than 400kB of app size, it won’t consume much of your phone resources. It uses internet connection to gather details. This app will be useful for everyone in bangalore city who use bus transport. All suggestions for improvement are welcomed.

Fall in love with magical jewels and diamonds. Listen to the amazing background music and sound effects. Magic Jewels is a peaceful, beautiful game which helps you to relax. The aim of the game is to pass all the levels and collect all the gold stars. To do that you have to clear the board from jewels. The more you play the more levels are complicated. It is type of the match-2 or match-3 game. So the rules are simple. To remove magic jewels you have to tap at least two same diamonds. You have to remove proper number of jewels (depending on the given level) to move to the next level. Now you can compete with other players around the world. More challenges with achievements. Try to collect all achievements and get Magic Jewel! Game supports: - leaderboards - achievements - different themes (see settings) - smooth animations - many different levels - different jewels - different board sizes - undo last move option (see MENU during the game) - reseting the current level - playing new board - traversing completed levels - background music and sound effects Enjoy the game!
release_text: Better levels design, especially for tablets and hi-end phones. Dialog about cookies policy for EU users added.

description: Do Your Friends always borrow your phone to play Games?Are You concern about your private data then don't worry Applock helps you out. Applock is a light weight app protector tool to protect your privacy in mobile apps. There is Two lock one is pattern lock and another is Number Lock. in number lock you can set number as password and in pattern lock you have to draw pattern for open the application. Applock having these features: 1.Forgot Password 2.Change background. 3.Make Pattern visible or invisible. 4.Choose Pattern Lock or Number Lock. 5.Simple UI. 6. Option to Ask Password Every Time or after a particular time(Re lock Policy) For any support queries, please feel free to write to us at support@katyayini.in and we will get back in less than 24 hours.

One of the best free coloring drawing and painting tool on the Android market!! Use this super entertaining app to draw pictures with your fingertips! Pick your favorite tool between a pencil, a felt-tip and a paintbrush to set your fantasy free. Show your friends what you are able to create. Kids will enjoy painting using their creative ideas. There are also a lot of predefined cartoon pictures divided in different categories such as animals, vehicles, people and farm. The animal categories contain a mighty tiger, a panda bear, laughing zebra, a talking parrot, a quick rabbit (bunny), a big crocodile a smart fox and many more. The vehicles category will be especially liked from boys as it contains cars, trucks, some ancient ships, a space shuttle, rockets etc. In the people category you can find some nice pictures, of a cute princess, some toys, a clown etc. The farm category contains farm animals with some of their enemies, some happy vegetables, a house and much more. You can also add some doodle drawings made by you, to the predefined templates. If you would like your pictures to stick out of the screen, use the glowing pencil and everything you color will be bright like a neon light. Discover the artist in you. Advice : The glow effect will be seen the best if you use it on a black background. ★ Stickers : Thanks to this fantastic option you will be able to give your photos a personal touch. Take the selected picture and start personalizing by choosing between numerous stickers. You will be spoiled for choice in selecting the coolest sticker. It contains stickers with various subjects like, smiles with different face expressions, flowers with bright colors, fruit, some funny figures such as a nice baby, a squirrel, some dogs, butterflies etc. Let your Photos communicate something or create some comics by writing some fun stuff into text bubbles. Features: ✔ You can create your own drawings and draw with your fingers right on the screen ✔ The app includes loads of drawings ✔ Each drawing can be easily colored and modified. ✔ Nice and colorful stickers to enrich your art masterpieces Children will love this fantastic free application! It can be also very entertaining for adults that want to try a new form of painting.

Dive into the underwater world of the beautiful mermaid princess. Talk to the beautiful princess. She will answers with her cute voice and react to what you say or your touch. The app contains many cool games and a lot of extra content! Catch a glimpse of the princess’ everyday life and join her in her funny activities. Discover ancient treasures, meet her neighbors and fish friends, watch her cool acrobatic evolutions, etc. She will also get a brief visit from a lovely dolphin and dance with other mermaids. ★★★ Features: ★★★ ✔ High quality 3D video graphics ✔ Cool voice interaction ✔ Jellyfish Piano ✔ Many different animations ✔ Amazing soundboard with many funny sounds: cat, rooster, scream, music, bomb, etc. ✔ Video animations of a princess and a fairy who is telling fairytales to a baby such as: The turtle and the rabbit, The Grasshopper and the cold winter etc. Extra content: ★ Exciting touch game with 20 levels inside ★ Great numbers game ★ 1to60 game ★ Catch the girl at the house game and pay attention to the different animals that will try to deceive you. Check your high score! ★ Comics & Cartoons: We have comics involving different subjects as for example: holidays, tv, dogs, birds, other animals and many more. ★ Jokes Collection: Funny jokes divided in different categories ★ General knowledge: Do you know all the things about history, machines, biology, environment, economy, science etc.? ★ Photo Fun Functionality: Create funny and fake images/pictures and send per mail, share pictures with Whatsapp, Twitter, Skype, another Messenger Tool or upload them to Facebook, Flickr, Dropbox etc. Upload your pics and turn yourself or your friend into a penguin, a dancing smiley, an alien, a sweet baby, a squirrel, etc. ★ Great and wonderful images out of the space. ★ Video Trailers: Video section with different trailers of hot apps. ★ Kids paint: Super entertaining tool to try and draw a picture with your fingertip. There are also a lot of predefined cartoon pictures that can be colored such as a mighty tiger, a turtle, a jumping Kangaroo, horses, a sea star, ships, fast rockets and many more. Discover the artist in you! ★ Pairs: Find the same looking images on the board and train your memory with this cool match-2 game. ★ Sliding puzzle: Touch and slide the pieces of the puzzle where they belong to recreate the original image. ★ Pair Up: Match up the pictures that belong together (that have something in common). ★ Two Players Super Duel: Challenge your friends and discover who has got the faster reflexes. ★ Quiz: Put your general knowledge to test. It offers children of all ages a lot of fun, especially girls will love to play with it.

developer: KavraKids - best games for boys,girls and toddlers
description: * Kids memory game: animals is the classic board game, which help develop memory skills of children. * Playing this game with your kids will help them improve their recognition while having fun. * Kids memory game contains very cute images of animals as lion, cat, dog, etc., which are on memory cards. * Animals memory game is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. Both, boys and girls will love this game. HOW TO PLAY ANIMALS GAME FOR KIDS: Initially you will see all cards turned face down. Tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both memory cards will be the same, they will stay opened and you can continue with the next pair. Otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try. Try to find all matched cards as fast as possible. FEATURES ( of animals memory game for kids ): - 6 different difficulty (very easy: 2x3; easy: 2x4; medium: 3x4; hard: 4x5; very hard: 4x6; insane: 5x6) - develops recognition, concentration and motor skills of kid - cute sounds for kids - colorful HD graphic designed for toddlers - contains beautiful images of animals - visual memory training - highscore * Simple and intuitive interface which is easy to use and easy to play, specially designed for children. * Animals memory game for kids is also optimized for tablets (including HD pictures). * This free kids memory game will keep your kids quiet and entertained in car, in a restaurant or everywhere.
release_text: * Minor bug fixes and features. * All levels unlocked from start.

description: Tro mod Camping Cheque ånden vil denne praktiske applikation give alle campister mulighed for til enhver tid at finde adresserne på de 640 smukkeste pladser i Europa. Uanset hvor man befinder sig på sin rejse vil Camping Cheques netværk være frit tilgængeligt uden internetforbindelse, for når man først har downloadet applikationen, så er den til rådighed uden, at man skal være logget på internettet. I kan lokalisere de nærmeste pladser, der hvor I befinder Jer, eller søge en plads via søgemaskinen og få en komplet beskrivelse frem af hver plads: åbningsdatoer, faciliteter, aktiviteter og billeder, der kan hjælpe med at vælge lige netop den plads, der passer til Jer… I kan også kontakte pladsen med et enkelt klik på telefonnummeret eller e-mailen. Applikationen giver også mulighed for at registrere jeres foretrukne pladser under «jeres favoritter» eller i telefonens adressekartotek, således at I nemmere kan finde dem. Tjek og modtag desuden alle nyheder fra Camping Cheque netværket. Og der venter Jer flere funktioner senere… Faithful to the Camping Cheque spirit, this useful application campers the opportunity at any time to find the addresses of the 640 most beautiful squares in Europe. No matter where you are on his journey to the Camping Cheque network freely available without internet connection, because once you have downloaded the application, so it is available without having to be logged on the Internet. You can situate the closest campsites from wherever you are, or look for a place through the search engine and get a complete description of each: opening dates, facilities, activities and images that can help you choose just the space suit to you ... You can also contact site with a single click on the phone number or e-mail. The application also allows you to save your favorite campsites in 'your favorites' or in the phone's address book, so that you can more easily find them. Check and receive all the news from the Camping Cheque network. And that you'll find more features later ...
release_text: • Netværk 2015 Applikationen tilbyder nu at opleve Camping Cheques netværk for 2015 Pladserne har opdateret deres informationer, blandt andet datoer for modtagelse af camping cheques, og nye pladser er tilføjet.

description: Faithful to the Camping Cheque spirit, this useful application allows the motor home owner, caravan owners and other campers to find good addresses amongst the 640 most beautiful campsites of Europe. On the road, in France or abroad, the Camping Cheque network is within reach in all freedom and without an internet connection since once the application has been downloaded, it remains accessible in an off connection mode. You can situate the closest campsites from wherever you are, or look for a campsite through the search engine and have access to a complete description of each of them : opening dates, services and activities, or even photos to help in your decision making process… You can also contact the campsite at the touch of a button on its phone number or its email. The application also allows you to save your favourite campsites in ‘your favourites’ or in your telephone’s address book to be able to find them more easily. Check and receive all the news from the Camping Cheque network. Further uses still await you…
release_text: • Network 2015 The application now offers to discover the Camping Cheque network in 2015. Campsites have updated their information, including dates of Acceptance for camping cheques, and the newcomers have been added.

With the CBC Mobile Banking app, you can bank on the go where and when you want. It's packed with great features that let you: - transfer funds in real time between your own accounts or to accounts at other banks - check your account balance and transactions going back up to a year and even search for specific transactions. - as a business person easily differentiate between your personal and business affairs in both the account overview as well as with regard to beneficiaries and credit cards - manage your beneficiary details - load your CBC Prepaid Card in real time and view its and your credit card's details at any time - enter and manage planned transaction orders, like savings orders or credit transfers with an execution date in the future - make payments quickly between two smartphones using the CBC Mobile Banking app - set a limit for the amount you can transfer - use the MobileCash function to withdraw cash without your bank card using your smartphone from any KBC/CBC ATM - send a message to your branch, agent or relationship manager using the contact function - use the MobilePay function to pay for your online purchases without a card reader – ideal for making quick and secure payment of invoices in Doccle or for items purchased in an online shop - view and pay electronic invoices from CBC Insurance or those sent to you through Zoomit. - receive notifications and check your account balance on your smartwatch You'll see that the CBC Mobile Banking app is very easy to use. With your personal PIN, logging in and signing transactions is as easy as one, two, three! You can use additional functionalities like managing your limits or making a transfer in excess of the standard limit with your card reader. Interested? Download the app and try out the demo version. Just register using your bank card and card reader and you're off! Learn more at m.cbc.be/mobile. The app will ask you for a number of permissions, which CBC will never use improperly. Such permissions are required for: • Storage (modifying or deleting the contents of your USB storage) This allows you to save photos to the app. • Network communication (full Internet access) This allows you to connect to the bank. • Phone calls (reading phone status and identity) This allows you to contact CBC directly using the telephone numbers listed in the Contact option in the menu. • Hardware settings (creating photos and videos) This allows you to use the camera to add personal photos to your profile and/or CBC Save for Goals accounts.

(상담가능시간 : 평일9시~18시) - 금융감독당국의 지침에 따라 전자금융 사고방지를 위해 임의개조(탈옥,루팅)한 스마트 기기에서는 이용이 불가하며, 특정 앱을 설치하는 과정 및 설치된 특정 앱에 의해서도 루팅으로 인식될 수 있습니다.(A/S센터 문의 및 초기화 권장) - 안드로이드 OS버전 업그레이드 권장(제조사 홈페이지, A/S센터 문의) ■ 서비스 화면 나의 일상과 함께하는 편하고 친근한 내 손 안의 금융스토리 ‘KB스타뱅킹’을 만나보세요. ① 나의 맞춤형『홈화면』 나의 계좌조회는 물론 거래내역조회 및 즉시이체로 바로 이동할 수 있고, 내가 원하는 메뉴(아이콘)를 순서대로 설정할 수 있습니다. ② 나의 금융페이지『MY KB』 나의 기본정보와 KB스타클럽 등급, 피싱방지 이미지, 보안수준조회, 관심상품 목록 및 이벤트 응모내역, 만기일도래 현황 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있습니다. ③ 상품가입에서 상담 및 관리까지!『금융센터』 나에게 맞는 자산 진단 및 전문적인 금융상품 정보, 그리고 나에게 필요한 테마별 상품 추천부터 스마트 상담까지, 상품별 케어서비스와 자산 관리를 경험할 수 있습니다. ④ 모든 서비스가 한 화면에~『전체메뉴』 전체메뉴를 터치(슬라이딩)하면 다양한 금융서비스로 직접 이동할 수 있고, 스마트알리미를 통해 새로운 메시지(Push알림)와 환경설정을 이용할 수 있습니다. ■ 새로워진 서비스 ① 한층 강화된 보안 : 이중로그인 방지, 나의 보안수준, 앱위변조 방지/탐지, 해킹의심거래 차단, 계좌중심 홈화면으로 피싱앱과의 식별 ② 인증서 복사절차 간소화 : 스마트기기간에 인증서 복사, QR코드를 통한 인증서 복사 ③ 빠른로그인 : 1개 인증서 이용시 바로 해당 인증서암호 입력창으로 이동 ④ 빠른메뉴 : 원하는 메뉴(아이콘)를 순서대로 설정하여 홈화면에서 이용 ⑤ 출금계좌순위 : 출금계좌가 보여지는 순서를 설정하여 홈화면에서 이용 ⑥ 큰글씨이체 : 실물통장이미지의 계좌조회, 큰글씨로 간소화된 조회 및 이체화면 ⑦ 송금메시지 : 이체 후 예쁜 감사카드와 마음을 담아 카카오톡으로 이미지 전송 ⑧ 월간분석 : 월단위 입출금거래내역을 그래프 챠트로 분류하여 안내 ⑨ 단축이체 : 자주쓰는 이체를 등록하면 이체시 입력절차 간소화 ⑩ 스타뱅킹NOW : 고객이 관심을 가지고 있는 정보나 상품에 대한 정보 공유 ⑪ 위젯뱅킹 : 스마트폰 바탕화면에서 빠르게 서비스 접속 ⑫ 유익한 콘텐츠 : 무료 e-Book, 인문학/생활공감 등 ■ 사용안내 - 대상 : 개인인터넷뱅킹 가입 고객 - 안전한 금융거래를 위해 루팅 등 운영체제가 변조된 경우 서비스 이용이 제한됩니다. - 이동통신사 3G/LTE, 무선인터넷(Wi-Fi)를 통해 다운로드할 수 있으며, 3G/LTE에서는 정액요금제에서 정해진 용량이 초과된 경우 데이터 요금이 부과될 수 있으니 유의하시기 바랍니다. ■ 문의 : ☎ 1588-9999, 1599-9999, 1644-9999 (해외:+82-2-6300-9999) [Notice] - I wonder who point to the KB Star Banking, please contact the customer service center ☎1588-9999 (0-3-2) at any time. description: [重要] 2015年4月以降に発売のauのAndroidスマートフォンをご利用の方は、プリインストールされております「データお預かり」アプリをご利用下さい。 http://www.au.kddi.com/mobile/service/smartphone/safety/data-oazukari/ お客様のAndroidスマートフォンに保存している電話帳やブラウザのお気に入りなどの大事なデータを、かんたん操作でSDカードにバックアップできます。 もちろん、SDカードにバックアップしたデータも、かんたん操作でスマートフォンに復元できます。 （ご注意） au以外のスマートフォンをご利用の方はSDカードへのバックアップ機能のみご利用いただけます。 復元はauの4G LTE対応スマートフォンにて行ってください。 ＜アプリに関する情報＞ ■対応OSバージョン：Android2.2以上 ■プライバシーポリシー 本アプリは外部との通信を行って個人情報を送信する機能はありません。 ■通信機能および個人情報の扱い 　・SDカードへのデータバックアップ時にパスワード設定機能はありますが、SDカードに保存されたバックアップデータを他の端末で復元できないことを保証するものではございません。データのお取り扱いには十分ご注意ください。 　・Friends Noteをご利用の場合、アドレス帳データを端末内に復元後、端末内のデータにてFriends Noteサーバのデータを更新するために通信を行う場合がございます。 [Important] the direction of 2015 available Android smartphone launch of au in April or later, please use the we have been pre-installed "custody data Contact" app. http://www.au.kddi.com/mobile/service/smartphone/safety/data-oazukari/ The important data, such as a telephone book or browser favorites that are stored on your Android smartphone, you can back up to SD card with a simple operation. Of course, the data that was backed up to SD card, you can restore to the smartphone with a simple operation. (Note) Those who use a smartphone other than au is only available backup function to the SD card. Restore please go at 4G LTE support smartphone of au. ■ corresponding OS version: Android2.2 or more ■ Privacy Policy This application does not have the ability to send personal information by communicating with the outside. ■ communication functions and personal information handling Password setting function at the time of data backup to SD card there is, there is not intended to ensure that it is not possible to restore the backup data stored on the SD card in the other terminal. Please pay attention to the handling of data. • If the Friends Note of use, after restoring the address book data in the terminal, there are times when communication is performed in order to update the data of Friends Note server in the data in the terminal.
release_text: ・505エラーでインストールできない問題を修正しました。 ・ダイレクトデータ移行機能を追加しました。2台のスマホ間での直接のデータ移行が可能になりました。詳細や対応機種等は下記をご参照ください。 http://www.au.kddi.com/mobile/service/smartphone/safety/backup/ ・起動時などに黒画面になる問題を修正しました。 ・Android 4.4に対応しました。 ・アプリのバックアップ/復元機能を追加しました。 [アプリのバックアップ]/[アプリの復元] からご利用いただけます。 ・バックアップ/復元の進捗表示を追加しました。 ・ケータイアドレス帳 (vCard) の復元機能を追加しました。 お使いのケータイでSDカードにアドレス帳データを保存後、[ケータイアドレス帳復元] からご利用頂けます。 ・定期自動バックアップ機能を追加しました。 [自動バックアップ設定] からご利用頂けます。

description: • 서비스 소개 KEB하나은행의 기업인터넷뱅킹 및 KEBiNet을 가입한 고객이 스마트폰을 통해 결재, 계좌현황조회, 이체, 실행하기를 이용하실 수 있는 기업 스마트폰 전용 어플리케이션입니다. • 서비스 특징 “기업스마트뱅크”는 거래선 앞 대금 지급 등을 위해 상위 결재자의 결재와 반려 기능 및 계좌현황조회, 이체등을 스마트기기를 통하여 제공함으로써, 기업고객 이용자가 언제 어디서나 편리한 금융거래를 이용할 수 있도록 지원하며, 알림(Push)메시지를 통하여 결재요청, 결재완료 등 거래결과를 실시간으로 통지 받을 수 있습니다. 출장 혹은 외출중인 결재자와 실무자간의 편리한 결재 및 대금 지급, 거래내역 확인 등 동일 사무공간에서이루어졌던 일련의 업무 프로세스가 스마트기기를 통하여 시간과 장소에 구애없이 가능하게 되었습니다. • 서비스 종류 조회 : 원화/외화/펀드/대출계좌 현황조회, 거래내역조회 이체 : 계좌이체, 이체결과조회 결재함 : 결재하기, 결재진행내역조회, 결재완료내역조회 거래함 : 실행하기, 거래요청내역조회, 거래완료내역조회 환경설정 : 버전확인, 결재단계알림메시지, 고객안내용알림메시지, 알림메시지설정 서비스관리 : 사용자정보조회, 자주조회하는계좌, 자주입금하는계좌, 결재비밀번호관리, 결재비밀번호초기화, OTP보정거래, 스마트폰서비스가입안내,스마트폰서비스해지 인증센터 : 인증서발급/재발급, 타행/타기관인증서등록, 타행/타기관인증서등록해지, 인증서갱신, 인증서폐기, 인증서암호변경/삭제, 인증서내보내기, 인증서가져오기 고객센터 : 공지사항, 이용안내, 영업점/ATM찾기, 고객센터 • 홈페이지 : http://keb.co.kr • Introduction Services KEB is one Customers who sign up for the bank's corporate banking and KEBiNet payment via smartphone, account status inquiries, transfers, enterprise smartphone-only applications available to run. • Service Features "Companies smart bank" by providing through smart devices to approval and disapproval functions and account status inquiries, transfer of top gyeoljaeja for such customer base front payment, corporate customer users when support everywhere to take advantage of the convenient financial transactions, , payment through a notification (Push) message request, you can be notified in real-time trading results, such as the payment is complete. Convenient payment and payments between being a business trip or outing gyeoljaeja and practitioners, a set of business processes that were done in the same transaction confirmation, including office space has been made possible without regard to time and place through a smart device. • Type of Service Views: currency / foreign currency / fund / loan account status inquiries, transaction history Transfer: Bank Transfer, Transfer Result Inquiry Payment should: a payment, payment history inquiry in progress, complete payment history inquiry Trading should: Running, History & Status transaction requests, transactions complete breakdown Views Preferences: version check, payment notification step, not the customer information, alerts, and notifications settings Service Management: User information queries, queries that accounts frequently, often to deposit accounts, payment password management, password reset payments, OTP compensation deal, smartphone subscription service descriptions, service revocation smartphones Certification Center Certificate issued / reissued, Ta / other organizations registration certificate, Ta / other institutions revoked certificates registration, certificate renewal, certificate revocation, certificate password Change / Delete, Export Certificate, the Certificate Import Customer Service: Announcements, using descriptions, branch / ATM finder, Customer Service • Website: http://keb.co.kr

app_name: 漢字 書き順ドリル ～間違いやすい漢字 編～
description: 書道ロイドの「間違いやすい漢字」バージョンです。 正しい筆順(書き順)をアニメーションで見ることができます。 書道ロイドとは？ 書道セットや用具を用意することなくAndroidで習字が楽しめる書道アプリです。 「とめ」・「はね」・「はらい」にも対応。 筆の太さも小筆から大筆まで。ペン習字のような文字も書けます。 好きな色で書けるので、お絵かきとしてもおすすめです。 文字といっしょに画像をそえることもできます。 ひまつぶしにどうぞ！ 機能一覧 ・色選択 ： 好きなカラーを選択してください。 ・筆の太さ ： 筆の太さを選択できます。 ・クリア ： 書いたものをクリアします。 ・画像読み込み ： ギャラリーから画像を選択できます。 ・保存 ： 書いたものをファイルに保存します。 ・壁紙 ： 書いたものを壁紙に設定します。 ・送信 ： 書いた画像をほかのアプリに送信できます。

"The shodo-roid" is japanese shodo set. Ths app is an free on which you can enjoy virtual Japanese calligraphy known as shodo("the way of writing"). It is easy but looks like the real thing. Only drag the finger, and you can write everything you like. The real brush texture will satisfy you and also you can choice a brush color which you like. Enabling the use of touch pressure and acceleration, line thickness can change. There are some copybook of calligraphy. when you can choice a copybook ,a copybook is shown. Then you can trace it . this is a general method that practice Japanese calligraphy. In addition , you can publish your works on Twiter etc. Have fun ! If you want a copybook, please request by Twiter with hashtag(#shodoroid). Features: ・Select color : you can choice a color of brush. ・Line thickness : you can choice the thickness of a brush. ・Clear : clear the canvas. ・Load a image : you can load a image on the canvas from galley and be set the position and size by dragging the image. ・Save ： save the image on SD card.(directory is shodoroid) ・Wall ： you can be set as a wall which you draw. ・Send ： you can send your works on Twiter etc. About: Japanese Calligraphy is traditional art. We draw the characters with brush and India ink.

Usage： １．A katakana sheet is displayed on the lower page. ２．Click the katakana which wants to practice the writing order. ３．The model of a katakana is displayed on the upper page. （the writing order -- with ） ４．It can trace in the way of calligraphy The main functions ： The color of a brush Thickness of a brush clear A Japanese writing paper katakana sheet

This is a ground-up rewrite of Screebl, focusing on hardware compatibility, battery consumption, new features, and stability. If you're having trouble with Screebl on your device, this is a good option to try. Get your Screen on! Screebl is an application that controls your screen based on orientation, proximity, and movement. It's better than SmartStay and it works on any phone, not just Samsung. Never have the screen turn off again while using your phone, and SAVE BATTERY too. It's possible with Screebl! The fundamentals of Screebl are based on a simple observation: we generally hold our phones or tablets in roughly the same positions when we're using them. Screebl uses the accelerometer in your mobile device to detect how you're holding your phone, and when your device is within a configurable range, the screen is kept on. Move out of that range, and Screebl releases the lock and the screen is allowed to go off. It sounds simple (and it is), but it works amazingly well! How does Screebl save power? Well, it's simple. On most phones, the screen is the single largest consumer of battery power. With Screebl running it's possible to reduce the average amount of time that your screen is on by only keeping it on when you're ACTUALLY using your phone. The amount of savings can vary significantly by device and usage patterns, and some users see a small net cost rather than savings. However, it is not uncommon for users to see savings of 20% or more. See our web site for more details. The reviews are in, and the experts LOVE Screebl! "Screebl is ingenious..." -- KnowYourMobile.com "Screebl also helps you extend your battery life..." -- AndroidAuthority.com "Screebl is a far more effective way to utilize our screen timeouts..." -- Android Spin.com "Works out of the box..." -- AndroidTap.com "Screebl offers an intelligent solution to the problem of screen control..." -- AndroidGuys.com "Excellent customization..." -- Phandroid.com Pro-only Features: - PocketLock locks your phone when you put it into your pocket, unlocks when you take it out - AppExceptions let you turn Screebl off when certain apps are running in the foreground - Locale Plug-ins and Tasker integration provide automated control and customization of Screebl - Look-and-feel customization lets you make Screebl look the way YOU want - Better detection algorithms - Screen timeout set from Screebl

description: Autism is best discovered early, one of the tools that was developed for the screening process is called the Modified Checklist for Autism in Toddlers (M-CHAT). M-CHAT is a validated developmental screening tool for toddlers between 16 and 30 months of age. It is designed to identify children who may benefit from a more thorough developmental and autism evaluation. The M-CHAT can be administered and scored as part of a well-child check-up, and also can be used by specialists or other professionals to screen for developmental delay. However most of the time it is either not done or not done properly and the tools provided are opened for many interpretations and ambiguity due to cultural and language differences especially in an Asian or Middle Easten context. The other challenge which could prevent a thorough evaluation is that most of the time, children at that age might have strangers’ anxiety when meeting up with someone for the first time. It is more effective to observe them during the time when they are most relax and comfortable. Parents and caregivers have a lot of contact time with their child/ward and it will be ideal if they can observe their behaviour in the normal everyday life. The mobile M-Chat could facilitate them through the process.
